title: Full eGPU acceleration on the Pi 500 with a 15-line patch
summary_en: This article discusses enabling full eGPU acceleration on the Raspberry Pi 500+ using a 15-line patch. By connecting an AMD RX 7900 XT via an M.2 to OCuLink adapter, the author achieved significant performance improvements in gaming and local LLM inference, demonstrating the potential for high-performance computing on the Pi 500+.
summary_zh: 本文讨论了如何通过一个15行的补丁在 Raspberry Pi 500+ 上实现完整的eGPU加速。作者通过 M.2 转 OCuLink 适配器连接 AMD RX 7900 XT，在游戏和本地 LLM 推理方面取得了显著的性能提升，展示了 Pi 500+ 在高性能计算方面的潜力。
best_quote_en: But 1 lane of PCIe Gen 3 is all we need to have some fun.
best_quote_zh: 但1条 PCIe Gen 3 通道足以让我们玩得开心。

title: HSBC Claims Quantum Trading Breakthrough
summary_en: HSBC claims a quantum trading breakthrough. The article promotes various subscription options to the Financial Times, offering access to global news, expert analysis, and digital features. Different tiers include access to FT apps, newsletters, and digital or print editions.
summary_zh: 汇丰银行声称在量子交易方面取得突破。文章推广了《金融时报》的各种订阅选项，提供全球新闻、专家分析和数字功能。不同的订阅级别包括访问FT应用程序、新闻通讯以及数字或印刷版。
best_quote_en: Stay informed with global news & in-depth analysis.
best_quote_zh: 随时了解全球新闻和深入分析。

title: Amazon will refund $1.5B to 35M customers allegedly duped into paying for Prime
summary_en: Amazon will refund $1.5B to 35M customers for allegedly deceptive Prime enrollment practices. The FTC accused Amazon of using manipulative user interfaces to trick customers into signing up for Prime and making cancellation difficult. The settlement includes a $1 billion civil penalty and consumer redress. Former FTC chair Khan expressed dissatisfaction with the settlement.
summary_zh: 亚马逊将向3500万用户退还15亿美元，原因是其Prime会员注册方式涉嫌欺骗。联邦贸易委员会指控亚马逊使用操纵性用户界面诱骗顾客注册Prime会员，并使取消会员变得困难。和解协议包括10亿美元的民事罚款和消费者赔偿。前联邦贸易委员会主席Khan对和解结果表示不满。
best_quote_en: "A $2.5 billion fine is a drop in the bucket for Amazon and, no doubt, a big relief for the executives who knowingly harmed their customers."
best_quote_zh: “25亿美元的罚款对亚马逊来说只是九牛一毛，毫无疑问，那些明知会损害客户利益的高管们也因此松了一口气。”

title: Ode to Libraries from a Remote Worker
summary_en: The author, a remote worker, discusses the challenges of working from home, including the lack of separation between work and personal life. They explore alternatives like coffee shops and co-working spaces, ultimately finding solace and productivity in libraries. Libraries offer a free, quiet, and stimulating environment away from the distractions of home.
summary_zh: 作者是一位远程工作者，探讨了在家工作的挑战，包括工作和个人生活缺乏分离。她探索了咖啡馆和联合办公空间等替代方案，最终在图书馆中找到了慰藉和效率。图书馆提供了一个免费、安静且刺激的环境，远离了家庭的干扰。
best_quote_en: Being at home while working AND while resting, my brain just can’t switch off between work and rest, drawing a line between bad and good.
best_quote_zh: 当工作和休息都在家进行时，我的大脑无法在工作和休息之间切换，也无法划分好与坏的界限。

title: Ask HN: Why don't we have a mobile app to screen for skin cancer?
desc:
We already have the data, knowledge, and technology to build this. Why can’t I just use my phone camera to check if a spot on my skin looks concerning? It wouldn’t need to give a full diagnosis—just suggest whether I should see a doctor about a specific area.

If such apps exist, why aren’t they widely available?

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=45383834

Points: 1

# Comments: 0
summary_en: The author is asking why there isn't a widely available mobile app for screening skin cancer using phone cameras. They believe the data, knowledge, and technology exist to build such an app, even if it only suggests whether to see a doctor about a specific spot.
summary_zh: 作者提问：为什么没有广泛可用的手机应用可以通过手机摄像头来筛查皮肤癌？他们认为数据、知识和技术已经存在，即使只是建议是否就特定部位去看医生，也应该可以开发出这样的应用。
best_quote_en: We already have the data, knowledge, and technology to build this.
best_quote_zh: 我们已经拥有了数据、知识和技术来构建这个。

title: Kitchen Is Full of Microplastics
summary_en: Microplastics are pervasive in our food and water, entering from cookware, packaging, and processing. They are found in various foods, including meat, vegetables, and even honey. Washing and rinsing certain foods can reduce microplastic exposure, but avoiding ultra-processed foods and reducing overall plastic use are crucial steps. Microplastics are also found in tap and bottled water. Reducing plastic debris could halve the amount of ingested plastics.
summary_zh: 微塑料普遍存在于我们的食物和水中，通过炊具、包装和加工过程进入。它们存在于各种食物中，包括肉类、蔬菜甚至蜂蜜。清洗某些食物可以减少微塑料的暴露，但避免过度加工食品和减少塑料的总体使用是关键步骤。微塑料也存在于自来水和瓶装水中。减少塑料垃圾可以减少人们摄入塑料的量。
best_quote_en: "There's a lot of low-hanging fruit in your house that's really easy to address," says Sheela Sathyanarayana. "I do feel like it gives people a sense of control over their own lives, and we do have that a little bit more than we might think."
best_quote_zh: 希拉·萨蒂亚纳拉亚纳说：“在你的房子里有很多容易解决的问题。”“我确实觉得这让人们对自己的生活有了一种掌控感，而且我们拥有的可能比我们想象的更多。”

title: Scream AI – Create Viral Y2K Horror Photos with Ghostface
summary_en: Scream AI is an AI platform that transforms selfies into Y2K horror photos with Ghostface. It blends 90s aesthetics with horror elements, creating viral content for TikTok and Instagram. It's free, offers unlimited generations, and requires no signup. Users have generated over 10 million views.
summary_zh: Scream AI是一个AI平台，可以将自拍照转化为带有鬼脸的Y2K恐怖照片。 它融合了90年代美学和恐怖元素，为TikTok和Instagram创建病毒式内容。 它是免费的，提供无限生成，并且无需注册。 用户已经产生了超过1000万的浏览量。
best_quote_en: When you use Scream AI, you're not just creating photos - you're creating trending content that captures the zeitgeist of modern social media.
best_quote_zh: 当你使用Scream AI时，你不仅仅是在创作照片——你是在创造捕捉现代社交媒体时代精神的潮流内容。

title: Supply chain security for the 0.001% (and why it won't catch on)
summary_en: This article discusses securing a development environment against supply chain attacks, focusing on macOS. It explores using sandbox-exec to restrict package manager access to sensitive files and network connections. While complex, it aims to prevent credential exfiltration during package installation. The article also touches on challenges related to environment variable cleanup and practical implementation.
summary_zh: 本文讨论了如何保护macOS开发环境免受供应链攻击。文章探讨了使用sandbox-exec来限制包管理器对敏感文件和网络连接的访问。 虽然该方法较为复杂，但旨在防止在软件包安装过程中泄露凭据。文章还提到了与环境变量清理和实际执行相关的挑战。
best_quote_en: The package takeovers will continue to happen and it will only take time before I’m affected by accident.
best_quote_zh: 软件包劫持事件将会持续发生，我迟早会意外地受到影响。

title: YouTube Music Stats
summary_en: YTMusic Stats analyzes your YouTube Music history from Google Takeout data. It transforms data into insights, revealing top artists, most played songs, and listening statistics. It offers features like smart data processing using YouTube API enrichment and provides a personalized dashboard for exploring your music taste, while prioritizing user privacy and open-source transparency.
summary_zh: YTMusic Stats 分析你从 Google Takeout 中导出的 YouTube Music 历史数据。它将数据转化为有意义的见解，揭示你最喜欢的艺术家、播放最多的歌曲以及收听统计信息。它提供智能数据处理等功能，利用 YouTube API 丰富数据，并提供个性化仪表板，让你探索你的音乐品味，同时优先考虑用户隐私和开源透明度。
best_quote_en: Your data stays private, and the code is open for everyone to review and contribute.
best_quote_zh: 你的数据保持私密，且代码对所有人开放，欢迎审查和贡献。

title: Go's builtin 'new()' function will take an expression in Go 1.26
summary_en: The author is blocking crawlers with generic HTTP User-Agent headers like 'Go-http-client/1.1' to reduce the load on his blog 'Wandering Thoughts.' These crawlers, often used for LLM training, are considered excessively suspicious. The author emphasizes the need for clear and specific User-Agent headers for non-browser software, including identifying the user.
summary_zh: 作者正在屏蔽具有通用HTTP User-Agent标头（如“Go-http-client/1.1”）的网络爬虫，以减少其博客“Wandering Thoughts”上的负载。这些爬虫通常用于LLM训练，被认为具有过度的可疑性。作者强调需要为非浏览器软件提供清晰且具体的User-Agent标头，包括识别用户。
best_quote_en: All HTTP User-Agent headers should clearly identify what they are, and for non-browser user agents, they should identify not just the software involved but also who specifically is using that software.
best_quote_zh: 所有HTTP User-Agent标头都应清楚地标识它们是什么，对于非浏览器用户代理，它们不仅应标识所涉及的软件，还应标识具体是谁在使用该软件。

title: How Patient execution beats aggressive capital – Kumar Vembu
summary_en: Kumar Vembu reflects on Zoho's success driven by patient execution and building a global tech brand from India. Key lessons include starting small, continuously investing, understanding market leaders while competing on one's own terms, and focusing on customer lifetime value. Strong cash flow, an ownership mindset, and investing in people are also crucial. Zoho's journey embodies the idea that perseverance leads to success, even when odds seem against you.
summary_zh: Kumar Vembu 反思了 Zoho 成功的驱动力，即耐心执行和在印度建立全球科技品牌。主要经验包括从小处着手、持续投资、理解市场领导者同时按自己的方式竞争，以及关注客户终身价值。强大的现金流、主人翁意识和对人员的投资也至关重要。Zoho 的旅程体现了坚持不懈就能成功的理念，即使在逆境中也是如此。
best_quote_en: Patience is always rewarded with opportunities.
best_quote_zh: 耐心总是会带来机会。

title: Dismissed as a joke, UK's first rice crop ripe for picking after hot summer
summary_en: The UK's first rice crop is ripe for picking after a hot summer, surprising many. This trial aims to explore future food options for Britain amidst climate change. Nine rice varieties are being tested to see if rice can be grown widely in the UK. Further, the project could help to tackle climate change by flooding peat soils which could reduce greenhouse gas emissions.
summary_zh: 英国首个水稻作物在炎热的夏季后成熟待收，令许多人感到惊讶。该试验旨在探索英国在气候变化背景下的未来食品选择。目前正在测试九个水稻品种，以确定水稻是否可以在英国广泛种植。此外，该项目可以通过淹没泥炭土壤来帮助应对气候变化，从而减少温室气体排放。
best_quote_en: "We don't want people thinking we're the 'crazy rice farmers' - this is about rethinking the whole system and making it work for everyone."
best_quote_zh: “我们不希望人们认为我们是‘疯狂的稻农’——这是关于重新思考整个系统，并使其为每个人服务。”

title: Queueing to publish in AI and CS
desc:
I analyzed some surprising properties of the conference publication system and paper acceptance using queueing theory. I added an interactive model you can play with.

It turns out that if you accept papers based on a fix percentage of submission number, increasing rates of acceptance reduces the pool of unaccepted paper and this larger percentage of the smaller queue ends up giving about the same number of accepted papers overall.

I also have this funnel simulation https://i.postimg.cc/gz88S2hY/funnel2.gif

+ Same number of new produced papers per time unit.

+ Different acceptance rates.

+ But... *same number of accepted papers* on equilibrium! With lower rates you just review more.

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=45411291

Points: 4

# Comments: 0
summary_en: This article analyzes the impact of low acceptance rates in AI and CS conferences. A model shows that reducing the acceptance rate increases reviewing load significantly without dramatically changing the number of accepted papers. It also leads to authors abandoning acceptable papers due to increased waiting times. The author suggests exploring alternative conference models.
summary_zh: 本文分析了人工智能和计算机科学会议中低接受率的影响。一个模型表明，降低接受率会显著增加审稿负担，而不会显著改变接受论文的数量。由于等待时间增加，这还会导致作者放弃可接受的论文。作者建议探索其他的会议模式。
best_quote_en: In the ideal case, by reducing the rate of acceptance, we end up accepting the same amount of papers, and we just review more.
best_quote_zh: 在理想情况下，通过降低接受率，我们最终接受的论文数量相同，而我们只是审阅了更多论文。

title: Data on AI Models
summary_en: This document provides data on AI models, tracking factors driving machine learning progress. It highlights that the training compute of AI models has been doubling roughly every six months, with a growth rate of 4.4x per year since 2010, driven by increased spending and hardware improvements.
summary_zh: 本文档提供了关于人工智能模型的数据，追踪驱动机器学习进步的关键因素。它强调，自2010年以来，人工智能模型的训练计算量大约每六个月翻一番，年增长率为4.4倍，这主要得益于支出增加和硬件改进。
best_quote_en: The training compute of notable AI models has been doubling roughly every six months.
best_quote_zh: 著名人工智能模型的训练计算量大约每六个月翻一番。

title: Show HN: Genesis DB: GDPR-ready event-sourcing database (say hello to CE soon)
desc:
I've developed Genesis DB, an event-sourcing database. It's already production-ready, with features like hash chaining, CloudEvents-native design, and built-in GDPR erasure support.

I'm thinking about releasing a Community Edition that's free and unlimited, but with a slightly reduced feature set. It could lower the entry barrier for indie developers.

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=45411263

Points: 1

# Comments: 0
summary_en: Genesis DB 1.1.0 focuses on accessibility and performance, expanding event sourcing to developers at every level. Key features include gRPC endpoint support, a built-in MCP server, and a Community Edition (CE) with free usage and core functionality. The CE aims to make event sourcing accessible worldwide. They encourage community collaboration.
summary_zh: Genesis DB 1.1.0 专注于可访问性和性能，将事件溯源扩展到各个级别的开发者。主要功能包括 gRPC 端点支持、内置 MCP 服务器以及具有免费使用和核心功能的社区版（CE）。CE 旨在使事件溯源在世界范围内普及。他们鼓励社区协作。
best_quote_en: The Community Edition represents our commitment to making event sourcing technology available to developers worldwide, regardless of their economic situation or project budget.
best_quote_zh: 社区版代表了我们致力于向全球开发者提供事件溯源技术的承诺，无论他们的经济状况或项目预算如何。

title: In C++ modules globally unique module names seem to be unavoidable
summary_en: The article discusses the unavoidable requirement for globally unique module names in C++ modules to avoid linking issues. It highlights the complexity of current module integration approaches and argues that accepting this requirement simplifies the build setup and makes it more reliable. Duplicate module names lead to broken code, making global uniqueness a technical necessity, not just a best practice.
summary_zh: 本文讨论了 C++ 模块中全局唯一模块名称的必然要求，以避免链接问题。文章强调了当前模块集成方法的复杂性，并认为接受此要求可以简化构建设置并使其更可靠。重复的模块名称会导致代码损坏，因此全局唯一性是一项技术必需品，而不仅仅是最佳实践。
best_quote_en: Globally unique modules names is thus not a 'recommendation', 'nice to have' or 'best practice'. It is a technical requirement that comes directly from the compiler and standard definition.
best_quote_zh: 因此，全局唯一的模块名称不是“建议”、“最好有”或“最佳实践”。这是一项直接来自编译器和标准定义的技术要求。

title: Examples Are the Best Documentation
summary_en: The author argues that examples are often the best form of documentation, especially for developers switching between projects. Formal documentation can be too complex and lack practical examples, hindering quick understanding. Community-driven example repositories like clojuredocs.org are invaluable for providing clear and practical usage scenarios.
summary_zh: 作者认为，示例通常是最好的文档形式，尤其对于在不同项目间切换的开发者。正式文档可能过于复杂，缺乏实际示例，阻碍了快速理解。社区驱动的示例仓库，如clojuredocs.org，对于提供清晰实用的使用场景非常有价值。
best_quote_en: When I'm searching for docs, 95% of the time a single example would suffice.
best_quote_zh: 当我在搜索文档时，95% 的情况下一个简单的例子就足够了。

title: Why Heavy Codes of Conduct Are Unnecessary for Open Source Projects
summary_en: The article discusses the debate surrounding Codes of Conduct (CoC) in open source projects. It traces the evolution of CoC, from practical solutions to maintain healthy collaboration to encompassing participant safety. Critiques by DHH and ESR highlight concerns about strict CoC being tools for troublemakers. The author argues for right-sized norms suitable for individual projects.
summary_zh: 本文探讨了开源项目中行为准则（CoC）的争议。它追溯了CoC的演变，从维护健康协作的实际解决方案到包含参与者安全。DHH和ESR的批评突出了对严格CoC成为问题制造者工具的担忧。作者认为应该采用适合各个项目的适当规范。
best_quote_en: ESR went even further, asserting that CoC are nothing more than a “tool for troublemakers” and that the best course of action is to delete them entirely from projects.
best_quote_zh: ESR更进一步，断言CoC只不过是“问题制造者的工具”，最好的做法是从项目中完全删除它们。

title: Bcachefs Removed from the Mainline Kernel
summary_en: Linus Torvalds removed bcachefs from the mainline kernel in version 6.18. It was previously marked as 'externally maintained' in 6.17. The reason for removal is that it became a DKMS module, making the in-kernel code stale and potentially causing version confusion.
summary_zh: Linus Torvalds 在 6.18 版本中将 bcachefs 从主线内核中移除。之前在 6.17 版本中被标记为“外部维护”。移除的原因是它已成为 DKMS 模块，导致内核代码过时，并可能引起版本混淆。
best_quote_en: It's now a DKMS module, making the in-kernel code stale, so remove it to avoid any version confusion.
best_quote_zh: 它现在是一个 DKMS 模块，导致内核代码过时，所以要移除它以避免任何版本混淆。

title: Google's dev registration plan 'will end the F-Droid project
summary_en: Google's plan to enforce developer registration for app installation may end the F-Droid project, according to F-Droid board member Marc Prud'hommeaux. F-Droid argues this move consolidates Google's power and restricts an open ecosystem. They are appealing to regulators and competition authorities.
summary_zh: F-Droid董事会成员Marc Prud'hommeaux表示，谷歌强制应用安装开发者注册的计划可能会结束F-Droid项目。F-Droid认为此举巩固了谷歌的权力，并限制了一个开放的生态系统。他们正在呼吁监管机构和竞争管理机构进行审查。
best_quote_en: "If it were to be put into effect, the developer registration decree will end the F-Droid project and other free/open source app distribution sources as we know them today."
best_quote_zh: “如果开发者注册法令生效，它将终结我们今天所知的F-Droid项目和其他免费/开源应用分发来源。”

title: "Nightmare bacteria" are rapidly spreading
summary_en: Nightmare bacteria, resistant to most antibiotics, are rapidly spreading, posing a significant threat. Infections rose by 70% between 2019 and 2023 in the U.S., with a 461% jump in NDM gene-carrying CRE infections. Factors include improper hygiene, insufficient testing, and increased antibiotic use during the COVID-19 pandemic. These infections can lead to pneumonia, bloodstream infections and meningitis.
summary_zh: 具有抗药性的“梦魇细菌”正在迅速蔓延，构成重大威胁。2019年至2023年间，美国感染病例增加了70%，其中携带NDM基因的CRE感染病例激增461%。原因包括卫生不当、检测不足以及新冠疫情期间抗生素使用增加。这些感染会导致肺炎、血液感染和脑膜炎。
best_quote_en: Nightmare bacteria are very much the stuff of waking life.
best_quote_zh: 梦魇细菌已经成为现实生活的一部分。

title: The Beer Can
summary_en: The Beer Can, or vertical tower, at the South Pole Station connects the comfortable living zone above and the critical infrastructure zone below. This corrugated metal cylinder contains 90 stairs and a freight elevator and is the transition element between the modern elevated station and the buried arches, which house essential industrial facilities.
summary_zh: 南极站的“啤酒罐”，即垂直塔，连接着上方的舒适生活区和下方的关键基础设施区。这个波纹金属圆柱体包含90级楼梯和一个货运电梯，是现代高架站和埋藏拱顶之间的过渡元素，拱顶内设有重要的工业设施。
best_quote_en: But it’s the physical and conceptual separator between our living zone and our infrastructure zone, and I think that’s neat.
best_quote_zh: 但它是我们生活区和基础设施区之间的物理和概念上的分隔，我认为这很棒。

title: Sam Altman on Sora 2
summary_en: Sam Altman introduces Sora 2, a new app combining the Sora 2 model with easy video creation, sharing, and viewing. It aims to revolutionize creativity, enabling easy idea-to-result transitions. Concerns about addiction and misuse are acknowledged, with efforts to prioritize long-term user satisfaction, user control, creation, and the achievement of users' goals through diverse content and personalized experiences.
summary_zh: Sam Altman介绍了Sora 2，这是一款结合了Sora 2模型的新应用，可以轻松创建、分享和观看视频。它旨在彻底改变创造力，实现从想法到结果的轻松过渡。承认了对成瘾和滥用的担忧，并努力优先考虑长期用户满意度、用户控制、创作以及通过多样化的内容和个性化体验来实现用户目标。
best_quote_en: Creativity could be about to go through a Cambrian explosion, and along with it, the quality of art and entertainment can drastically increase.
best_quote_zh: 创造力可能即将经历一次寒武纪大爆发，随之而来的是艺术和娱乐质量的急剧提高。

title: Online debate in US is botted
desc:
As soon as we launched our app on an online directory, we were overwhelmed by thousands of bots spamming “TRUMP2028”, followed by a DDoS attack. Our app is a stupid fast 1v1 debate platform judged by AI called Debatable. We built it thinking of dialectic debating, but we were not expecting this. Thanks to AppCheck and Vercel AntiBot Firewall, the platform survived, but hundreds of users and debates had already been created.

It’s a wild first stress test. But how can US survive to this level of debate-contamination?

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=45435360

Points: 2

# Comments: 0
summary_en: An online debate platform, Debatable, experienced a bot attack shortly after launch. Thousands of bots spammed "TRUMP2028" and launched a DDoS, testing the platform's resilience. The app survived thanks to AppCheck and Vercel AntiBot Firewall, but many users and debates were already affected. The author questions the US's capacity to withstand such debate contamination.
summary_zh: 一个名为 Debatable 的在线辩论平台在启动后不久遭受了机器人攻击。数千个机器人发送垃圾信息“TRUMP2028”并发起了 DDoS 攻击，测试了该平台的弹性。 尽管AppCheck 和 Vercel AntiBot Firewall 帮助该应用幸存下来，但是许多用户和辩论已经受到影响。作者质疑美国承受这种辩论污染的能力。
best_quote_en: But how can US survive to this level of debate-contamination?
best_quote_zh: 但是美国如何才能在这种辩论污染中幸存下来？

title: Pidgin 3.0 Experimental 4 (2.93.0) has been released
summary_en: Pidgin 3.0 Experimental 4 (2.93.0) has been released, marking a pre-alpha stage. This release includes a developer migration guide, backend improvements for data persistence, conversation persistence, a new application icon, and color scheme preferences. It's not intended for end users due to bugs and unfinished features. Experimental 5 is scheduled for 2025-12-31.
summary_zh: Pidgin 3.0 Experimental 4 (2.93.0)已发布，这是一个pre-alpha版本。 包括开发者迁移指南、数据持久性后端改进、会话持久性、新的应用程序图标和配色方案偏好。 由于存在错误和未完成的功能，它不适合最终用户。 Experimental 5 计划于 2025-12-31 发布。
best_quote_en: Just like the previous experimental releases, this is a timed release. It is a snapshot of what we currently have and is something we think other tinkerers and developers may want to start playing with, but again, it is not meant for end users.
best_quote_zh: 与之前的实验版本一样，这是一个定时发布版本。 它是我们目前拥有的东西的快照，我们认为其他修补匠和开发人员可能想开始使用，但同样，它不适合最终用户。

title: The 10-Year Overnight Success
summary_en: The concept of "overnight success" is misleading. True success often results from years of unseen compounding efforts, including experiments, failures, and small wins. Media narratives compress this reality, focusing on the visible breakout while ignoring the decade of hard work. Perseverance and learning from failures are key components of long-term success.
summary_zh: “一夜成名”的概念具有误导性。真正的成功往往源于多年不为人知的积累，包括实验、失败和小小的成功。 媒体叙事压缩了这个现实，专注于可见的突破，而忽略了十年的努力。 坚持不懈和从失败中吸取教训是长期成功的关键组成部分。
best_quote_en: Timing, perseverance, and ten years of trying will eventually make you look like an overnight success.
best_quote_zh: 时机、毅力和十年的尝试最终会让你看起来像是取得了“一夜成名”的成功。

title: Quantum Computing Market – Forecasts from 2025 to 2030
summary_en: The quantum computing market is projected to grow from US$1.79 billion in 2025 to US$7.08 billion by 2030, at a CAGR of 31.64%. This growth is driven by government investments, partnerships, and the increasing application of quantum technologies across various industries like security, banking, and healthcare. Governments worldwide are investing in quantum innovation to revolutionize businesses.
summary_zh: 量子计算市场预计将从2025年的17.9亿美元增长到2030年的70.8亿美元，年复合增长率为31.64%。 这一增长得益于政府投资、合作伙伴关系以及量子技术在安全、银行和医疗保健等各个行业的日益广泛的应用。 世界各国政府都在投资量子创新，以彻底改变商业模式。
best_quote_en: Governments around the world recognize the vital significance of quantum innovation, which has the potential to revolutionize different businesses.
best_quote_zh: 世界各国政府都认识到量子创新的重要意义，它有可能彻底改变不同的业务。

title: Musk becomes first half-trillionaire
summary_en: Elon Musk became the first person to achieve a net worth of over $500 billion, driven by the increasing value of Tesla, SpaceX and X (formerly Twitter). While his wealth briefly dipped, it highlights his position as the world's wealthiest individual, surpassing Oracle founder Larry Ellison. Musk's focus on his companies rather than politics has been welcomed by investors.
summary_zh: 埃隆·马斯克成为首位净资产超过5000亿美元的人，这主要得益于特斯拉、SpaceX和X（原Twitter）价值的增长。尽管他的财富曾短暂下降，但这也突显了他作为世界首富的地位，超越了甲骨文创始人拉里·埃里森。投资者欢迎马斯克将更多精力放在他的公司而非政治上。
best_quote_en: The milestone further cements Musk's status as the world's richest person, well ahead of rivals in the global tech sector.
best_quote_zh: 这一里程碑进一步巩固了马斯克作为世界首富的地位，远超全球科技领域的竞争对手。

title: A Tutorial for the Sam Command Language
summary_en: This article reviews Rob Pike's Sam text editor's command language. Sam's 'x' command, functioning as a 'for each' loop, and its composability are highlighted. The author contrasts Sam with sed and Awk, emphasizing Sam's ability to nest commands and drill down into complex selections, offering a concise and powerful approach to text manipulation.
summary_zh: 本文回顾了 Rob Pike 的 Sam 文本编辑器的命令语言。重点介绍了 Sam 的 'x' 命令，它作为 'for each' 循环的功能，以及它的可组合性。作者将 Sam 与 sed 和 Awk 进行了对比，强调了 Sam 嵌套命令和深入复杂选择的能力，从而为文本操作提供了一种简洁而强大的方法。
best_quote_en: Ideally, you make your language elements work together in useful ways, and then have as few as you can get away with.
best_quote_zh: 理想情况下，您应该使您的语言元素以有用的方式协同工作，然后尽可能少地使用它们。

title: Ordering work: a skill and culture gap
summary_en: The order of software engineering work significantly impacts project success by influencing feedback frequency. Choosing the right order is a crucial skill often overlooked. Emphasizing the order in which work is done and adapting based on feedback leads to better outcomes. Cultural changes are needed to prioritize this skill.
summary_zh: 软件工程工作的顺序通过影响反馈频率来显著影响项目成功。选择正确的顺序是一项关键技能，但经常被忽视。强调完成工作的顺序并根据反馈进行调整可以带来更好的结果。需要进行文化变革来优先考虑这项技能。
best_quote_en: Engineers must be encouraged to internalise that the order of the work they do is of primary consequence, and they must be empowered to continually set that order.
best_quote_zh: 工程师必须被鼓励将他们所做工作的顺序内化为首要因素，并且他们必须被授权不断地设置该顺序。

title: Show HN: Dakora – OSS tool to manage LLM prompts without redeploys
desc:
Ever get lost in all the prompts in your project? I did. Hardcoding them works fine for POCs and small apps, but once you have dozens it turns into “prompt hell”: giant strings in code, every tweak needs a redeploy, and changes are hard to track.

So I built Dakora — a small open source tool that:

- Stores prompts in a central vault (files under git) - Lets you edit them in a simple UI playground - Syncs them into your app without redeploys - Works with Python out of the box (pip install dakora)

Curious how others are managing prompts in production. Feedback welcome.

GH: https://github.com/bogdan-pistol/dakora

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=45460233

Points: 1

# Comments: 0
summary_en: Dakora is an open-source tool for managing LLM prompts without redeploys, designed for Python developers. It offers features like type-safe inputs, interactive playgrounds, and hot-reloading of prompts. Dakora supports Jinja2 templating, semantic versioning, execution logging and includes a CLI interface and thread-safe caching.
summary_zh: Dakora是一个开源工具，专为Python开发者设计，用于管理LLM提示词，无需重新部署。它提供类型安全的输入、交互式playground和提示词热重载等功能。Dakora支持Jinja2模板、语义版本控制、执行日志记录，并包含CLI界面和线程安全缓存。
best_quote_en: Manage, version, and hot-reload prompts with type-safe inputs, interactive playground, and zero-deploy updates.
best_quote_zh: 使用类型安全的输入、交互式playground和零部署更新，管理、版本控制和热重载提示。

title: Ask HN: How would you use an AI-powered browser agent?
desc:
I’m exploring the idea of AI powered browser agents tools that can navigate the web like a human: clicking, typing, scraping, filling forms, or even completing multi step workflows. All you do is prompt the task.

If you had such an agent, what would you use it for?

- Automating repetitive tasks? - Gathering and cleaning data? - Handling customer or internal workflows? - Something else entirely?

I’d love to hear how the HN community imagines using this.

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=45460226

Points: 1

# Comments: 0
summary_en: The author is exploring AI-powered browser agents that can mimic human web navigation for tasks like clicking, typing, and form completion. They are asking the Hacker News community for ideas on how such an agent could be used, such as automating repetitive tasks, gathering data, or managing workflows.
summary_zh: 作者正在探索AI驱动的浏览器代理，该代理可以模仿人类的Web导航，以执行诸如单击、键入和完成表单之类的任务。他们正在向Hacker News社区寻求有关如何使用此类代理的想法，例如自动化重复性任务、收集数据或管理工作流程。
best_quote_en: I’m exploring the idea of AI powered browser agents tools that can navigate the web like a human: clicking, typing, scraping, filling forms, or even completing multi step workflows.
best_quote_zh: 我正在探索AI驱动的浏览器代理工具的想法，该工具可以像人类一样浏览Web：单击、键入、抓取、填写表单，甚至完成多步骤工作流程。

title: Despite opposition, UK government intends to move forward with Digital ID scheme
summary_en: The UK government plans to introduce a digital ID system despite public opposition. The government argues it will tackle illegal migration, simplify access to services, and improve efficiency. It won't be compulsory, but mandatory for some applications like 'right to work' checks. Concerns exist about privacy and mass surveillance. A public consultation is planned.
summary_zh: 尽管公众反对，英国政府计划推出数字身份系统。政府认为这将解决非法移民问题，简化服务访问，并提高效率。该系统并非强制性的，但对于某些应用（如“工作权利”检查）是强制性的。目前存在对隐私和大规模监控的担忧。政府计划进行公众咨询。
best_quote_en: We will introduce a digital ID within this Parliament to help tackle illegal migration, make accessing government services easier, and enable wider efficiencies.
best_quote_zh: 我们将在本届议会内引入数字身份，以帮助解决非法移民问题，使访问政府服务更容易，并实现更广泛的效率。

title: Sora 2 is vulnerable to prompt injection
summary_en: Sora 2 is vulnerable to prompt injection through the "cameo" feature. Users can set a text prompt in their "Cameo preferences" that influences the appearance and subverts the prompts of others who use their cameo in videos. Examples include forcing characters to speak Spanish or changing the height of people in generated videos.
summary_zh: Sora 2通过“cameo”功能存在提示注入漏洞。用户可以在“Cameo偏好设置”中设置文本提示，影响外观并破坏其他人在视频中使用其cameo的提示。例如，可以强制角色说西班牙语或更改生成视频中人物的身高。
best_quote_en: You can use your cameo in your own generated videos, and you can also grant your friends permission to use it in theirs.
best_quote_zh: 你可以在自己生成的视频中使用你的客串角色，你也可以授权你的朋友在他们的视频中使用它。

title: FSF Celebrates 40 Years
summary_en: The Free Software Foundation (FSF) celebrates its 40th anniversary in 2025 with various events, including LibreLocal month, an in-person celebration in Boston, and a free software hackathon. The FSF encourages everyone to participate and support their mission and invites sponsorship. These activities are designed to bring the international free software community together, and discuss the future of free software.
summary_zh: 自由软件基金会（FSF）将于2025年庆祝其成立40周年，届时将举办包括自由本地月、波士顿现场庆祝活动和自由软件黑客马拉松等各种活动。FSF鼓励大家参与并支持他们的使命，并邀请赞助。这些活动旨在将国际自由软件社区聚集在一起，并讨论自由软件的未来。
best_quote_en: When we look back to 1985, we can see just how many stepping stones on the road to software freedom we've already laid together.
best_quote_zh: 当我们回顾1985年，我们可以看到我们在通往软件自由的道路上已经共同奠定了多少基石。

title: Selling Legal Tech SaaS Portfolio – Pre-Revenue but Validated ($8,500)
summary_en: The text describes an issue encountered on X.com (formerly Twitter) where JavaScript is disabled or privacy extensions are interfering with the site's functionality. It provides instructions for enabling JavaScript, switching browsers, or disabling privacy extensions to resolve the problem.
summary_zh: 该文本描述了在 X.com (前身为 Twitter) 上遇到的问题，JavaScript 被禁用或隐私扩展干扰了网站功能。 其提供了启用 JavaScript、切换浏览器或禁用隐私扩展的说明，以解决此问题。
best_quote_en: Some privacy related extensions may cause issues on x.com. Please disable them and try again.
best_quote_zh: 某些隐私相关的扩展程序可能会导致 x.com 出现问题。请禁用它们并重试。

title: Why AI won't work as a software development abstraction
summary_en: The idea of using LLMs as a software development abstraction faces challenges due to complexity and processing costs. Software is dynamic, and changes add complexity. AI might encounter the same problems faster. Regenerating the codebase is costly, and slow feedback loops hinder development. Processing information carries an energy cost, making current machine computation less efficient than human effort.
summary_zh: 将LLM用作软件开发抽象面临复杂性和处理成本的挑战。软件是动态的，变更会增加复杂性。AI可能更快地遇到同样的问题。重新生成代码库成本高昂，缓慢的反馈循环会阻碍开发。处理信息需要能量成本，使得当前的机器计算不如人类努力有效。
best_quote_en: Software development depends on feedback loops measured in seconds or minutes, not hours or days.
best_quote_zh: 软件开发依赖于以秒或分钟为单位的反馈循环，而不是以小时或天为单位。

title: Piracykills
summary_en: The author discovered that many people were trying to pirate their art tool, JustSketchMe. Instead of fighting it, they created pages targeting these searches and offered a discount code to potential pirates. Surprisingly, this discount code became the most used one, proving empathy and positive incentives can convert potential pirates into paying customers.
summary_zh: 作者发现很多人试图盗版其艺术工具 JustSketchMe。他们没有直接打击盗版，而是创建页面针对这些搜索，并为潜在的盗版者提供折扣码。令人惊讶的是，这个折扣码成为使用最多的折扣码，证明了同理心和积极的激励措施可以将潜在的盗版者转化为付费客户。
best_quote_en: In some ways this is taking advantage of a good search term. In others it's showing empathy and adding delight, creating a positive incentive to purchase to someone who otherwise wouldn't have.
best_quote_zh: 从某种程度上说，这是在利用一个好的搜索词。而从另一方面来说，这是在展示同理心并增添乐趣，为那些原本不会购买的人创造了积极的购买动机。

title: Classic 8×8-pixel B&W Mac patterns
summary_en: The author created a website featuring the original 8x8-pixel black-and-white Mac patterns from System 1.0 (1984). He extracted the patterns from a System 6 disk using Mini vMac and various utilities, converting them into .pbm format. The goal was to preserve the authentic patterns in an easily parseable format, driven by nostalgia for the classic Mac aesthetic.
summary_zh: 作者创建了一个网站，展示了来自System 1.0 (1984)的原始8x8像素黑白Mac图案。他使用Mini vMac和各种实用工具从System 6磁盘中提取了这些图案，并将它们转换为.pbm格式。此举的目的是以易于解析的格式保存真实的图案，这源于对经典Mac美学的怀旧之情。
best_quote_en: Ultimately, I wanted to extract the exact original data from the source (or close enough copy thereof) and have the patterns in a format I considered archival for this limited purpose (.pbm files are trivial to parse and manipulate).
best_quote_zh: 最终，我想从源头（或足够接近源头的副本）提取精确的原始数据，并将这些图案以我视为可存档的格式保存，以达到这个有限的目的（.pbm文件易于解析和操作）。

title: Open Source Google Maps Street View Panorama Downloader
summary_en: This project provides a Google Street View Panorama Downloader as both an API and a command-line tool. It's optimized for asynchronously downloading millions of panoramas. Key features include full asynchronous downloading, black tile detection, handling image differences, configurable zoom levels, and scalability. It covers installation, usage as CLI and library, technical details about zoom levels, limitations and disclaimer.
summary_zh: 该项目提供了一个谷歌街景全景下载器，既作为API又作为命令行工具。它针对异步下载数百万个全景图进行了优化。主要功能包括完全异步下载、黑块检测、处理图像差异、可配置的缩放级别和可伸缩性。内容涵盖安装、作为CLI和库的使用，以及有关缩放级别、局限性和免责声明的技术细节。
best_quote_en: This project is intended for educational and research purposes only.
best_quote_zh: 本项目仅用于教育和研究目的。

title: 'I have your nudes and everything to ruin your life'
summary_en: The article investigates the rise of sextortion, where scammers, often in Nigeria, blackmail teenagers for explicit content. It follows the tragic case of Evan Boettler, who took his life after being targeted. The investigation uncovers 'Hustle Kingdoms,' organized scam operations, revealing the ruthless methods and the grooming of young men into cybercrime. The piece highlights the devastating consequences and difficulties in prosecuting these crimes.
summary_zh: 本文调查了性勒索的兴起，通常在尼日利亚的诈骗者勒索青少年以获取不雅内容。文章讲述了伊万·博特勒的悲惨案例，他在成为目标后结束了自己的生命。调查揭露了有组织的诈骗活动“诈骗王国”，揭示了无情的方法和诱骗年轻人参与网络犯罪的过程。文章强调了这些犯罪造成的毁灭性后果以及起诉这些犯罪的困难。
best_quote_en: "I don't feel bad because I need the money."
best_quote_zh: “我不觉得内疚，因为我需要钱。”

title: Lánczos Interpolation Explained (2022)
summary_en: This article explains Lánczos interpolation, a popular image resizing method. It details the problem of interpolation, framing it as convolutions, and introduces the sinc function as the foundation for Lánczos. The article also discusses why sinc can't be directly used and how it's modified for practical application.
summary_zh: 本文解释了Lánczos插值，一种流行的图像大小调整方法。它详细介绍了插值问题，将其描述为卷积，并介绍了 sinc 函数作为 Lánczos 的基础。文章还讨论了为什么 sinc 不能直接使用，以及如何修改它以用于实际应用。
best_quote_en: Leaving the samples intact is a desirable and guiding property for interpolating functions.
best_quote_zh: 保持样本完整性是插值函数一个理想且具有指导意义的属性。

title: A curated list of resources in the field of electrical grid mapping
summary_en: This is a curated list of resources related to electrical grid mapping, aimed at improving global open data coverage, harmonization, and quality for a sustainable energy transition. It emphasizes the importance of manually verifying data in OpenStreetMap using official satellite data and includes links to datasets, maps, and tools.
summary_zh: 这是一个关于电网地图绘制的精选资源列表，旨在提高全球开放数据的覆盖率、协调性和质量，以实现可持续的能源转型。它强调了在OpenStreetMap中使用官方卫星数据手动验证数据的重要性，并包括数据集、地图和工具的链接。
best_quote_en: Each data point of the transmission network must be set manually and verified with official satellite data provided by the OpenStreetMap community.
best_quote_zh: 输电网络的每个数据点都必须手动设置，并使用OpenStreetMap社区提供的官方卫星数据进行验证。

title: MindAI – A platform designed to help you save your money and time in AI
summary_en: MindAI is an AI platform that consolidates top AI models for writing, coding, images, and audio into one seamless experience. It aims to save users time and money by providing a single subscription with total control, eliminating the need for multiple AI tools and complex setups. It offers fast switching between AI models and automatic integration of new tools.
summary_zh: MindAI是一个AI平台，它将写作、编码、图像和音频的顶级AI模型整合为一体化体验。 旨在通过提供单一订阅和完全控制来节省用户的时间和金钱，无需多种AI工具和复杂的设置。可在AI模型之间快速切换, 并自动集成新工具。
best_quote_en: MindAI puts your focus back on creating, not configuring.
best_quote_zh: MindAI让您重新专注于创作，而不是配置。

title: Show HN: Envirobly – Efficient App Hosting
desc:
This is my, fully bootstrapped, take on an application hosting platform. I designed it primarily for myself, to meet the following goals:

* Utilize the best parts of the cloud, leave expensive value added services behind. * Host anywhere in the world, close to your users. * Batteries included: backups, logging, monitoring, auto-scaling, containerization, databases. * Simple and user friendly.

The journey was tough. It took me round about 3 years to get everything just right. This goes against the conventional wisdom of getting something simple out quick. With a hosting platform however, in my mind, reliability, stability and certain maturity are a must have from the start.

I definitely need to work on the presentation, it's barely covering the basics. But you have to start somewhere :-)

I'd love to hear some critique from the community. Thanks!

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=45488727

Points: 1

summary_en: Envirobly offers efficient app hosting with simple deployment in 30 seconds, a free 14-day trial, and no complex configuration. It integrates with Git and allows deployment from the command line or CI using their CLI tool.
summary_zh: Envirobly提供高效的应用托管服务，30秒内即可完成简单部署，提供14天免费试用，无需复杂配置。它与Git集成，并允许使用CLI工具从命令行或CI进行部署。
best_quote_en: Start deploying within 30 seconds of signing up.
best_quote_zh: 注册后30秒内即可开始部署。

title: Battering RAM – Low-Cost Interposer Attacks on Confidential Computing
summary_en: Battering RAM is a low-cost interposer attack that bypasses memory encryption on Intel and AMD cloud processors. A $50 interposer silently redirects protected addresses, allowing access to encrypted memory, breaking Intel SGX and AMD SEV-SNP. This exposes the limits of scalable memory encryption and requires a fundamental redesign ofmemory encryption.
summary_zh: Battering RAM是一种低成本的中间人攻击，可以绕过英特尔和AMD云处理器的内存加密。一个50美元的中间设备可以静默地重定向受保护的地址，从而访问加密的内存，破坏英特尔SGX和AMD SEV-SNP。这暴露了可扩展内存加密的局限性，需要从根本上重新设计内存加密。
best_quote_en: Battering RAM exposes the limits of today’s scalable memory encryption.
best_quote_zh: Battering RAM 暴露了当今可扩展内存加密的局限性。

title: Deloitte to refund the Australian government after using AI in $440k report
summary_en: Deloitte will issue a partial refund to the Australian government for a $440,000 report that contained errors due to the use of generative AI. The report, commissioned by the Department of Employment and Workplace Relations, had 'hallucinations' and incorrect references. A Labor senator criticized Deloitte for a 'human intelligence problem'.
summary_zh: 德勤将向澳大利亚政府部分退款，原因是其一份价值 44 万美元的报告因使用生成式人工智能而存在错误。该报告由就业和工作场所关系部委托，存在“幻觉”和不正确的参考文献。一位工党参议员批评德勤存在“人类智能问题”。
best_quote_en: Deloitte has a human intelligence problem. This would be laughable if it wasn’t so lamentable. A partial refund looks like a partial apology for substandard work.
best_quote_zh: 德勤存在人类智能问题。如果不是如此令人惋惜，这简直是可笑的。部分退款看起来像是对不合格工作的部分道歉。

title: My wife stole my computer 2 (electric boogaloo)
desc:
ELECTRIC boogaloo (see what I did there)

So anyway yeah after a long and arduous battle with Darlene over my computer, she reluctantly, but generously, threw my computer back through my window into my house. the thousands in glass damage repair and the lobotomy I got from the M.2 SSD flying into my brain at terminal velocity is nothing compared to the value of this previous computer.

Thank you Darlene!!

summary_en: The author's wife, Darlene, returned his computer by throwing it through a window. The author humorously describes the damage (glass repair, brain injury) as insignificant compared to getting the computer back. He thanks Darlene and mentions YC's Winter 2026 application deadline.
summary_zh: 作者的妻子Darlene把他的电脑扔回了他家，穿过窗户。作者幽默地描述了（玻璃维修，脑部受伤）的损害与找回电脑相比微不足道。他感谢Darlene，并提到了YC 2026年冬季申请的截止日期。

title: Cool down with your Digital Dystopia, bro
summary_en: The article criticizes the increasing reliance on smartphones for essential services like banking, transportation, and digital currencies. It argues that these digital solutions, often presented as convenient, lead to decreased user control, increased data vulnerability, and potential for government overreach, questioning the true benefits for consumers.
summary_zh: 本文批判了对智能手机在银行、交通和数字货币等基本服务方面日益增长的依赖。文章认为，这些数字化解决方案通常以方便为名，实际上导致了用户控制权的降低、数据漏洞的增加以及政府过度干预的可能性，质疑了这些方案对消费者的真正益处。
best_quote_en: Slowly, step by step, the idea is to make everyone have to use a smartphone all the time. Not choose if they want to. Have to.
best_quote_zh: 慢慢地，一步一步地，他们的想法是让每个人都必须一直使用智能手机。不是选择他们是否想用，而是必须用。

title: The audit trail for the AI era
summary_en: Auditry provides a developer-first, system-level compliance solution for the AI era. It turns AI workflows into verifiable audit trails, automatically logging models, datasets, API calls, and decisions. With one click, export regulator-ready evidence packages, ensuring compliance by design. Join the early access list to bring audit-ready compliance to your AI systems.
summary_zh: Auditry为人工智能时代提供了一个开发者优先的系统级合规解决方案。它将人工智能工作流程转化为可验证的审计跟踪，自动记录模型、数据集、API调用和决策。一键导出符合监管要求的证据包，确保设计上的合规性。加入早期访问列表，将可审计的合规性引入到您的人工智能系统中。
best_quote_en: Turn every AI workflow into a verifiable audit trail.
best_quote_zh: 将每个AI工作流程转化为可验证的审计跟踪。

title: GPU Instanced Grass Breakdown
summary_en: This article breaks down GPU instancing for grass rendering in Unity, focusing on URP and Shader Graph. It covers basic setup, optional additions like wind simulation and frustum culling, and adapting the setup for indirect rendering. The article discusses changes introduced in Unity versions 2021.2, 2022, and 6, and provides code examples for C#, Shader Graph, and Compute Shader.
summary_zh: 本文分析了Unity中用于草地渲染的GPU Instancing技术，重点介绍了URP和Shader Graph。 内容涵盖基本设置、风模拟和视锥体剔除等可选附加功能，以及间接渲染的设置调整。文章讨论了Unity 2021.2、2022和6版本中引入的更改，并提供了C#、Shader Graph和Compute Shader的代码示例。
best_quote_en: The main advantage of GPU Instancing is that you can render many objects in a single draw call.
best_quote_zh: GPU Instancing的主要优势在于，你可以在一个绘制调用中渲染多个对象。

title: Rust-based web browser project "Verso" no longer maintained
summary_en: The Verso web browser project, aimed at building a browser on top of Servo, is no longer maintained due to limited resources. While Verso contributed to Servo's evolution, it couldn't keep pace with updates. The project's repository will be archived, but there's hope for future revitalization. Verso explores Servo embedding solutions, experimenting with multi-view and multi-window interfaces, and building UI elements entirely from Servo.
summary_zh: Verso Web浏览器项目旨在在Servo之上构建浏览器，但由于资源有限，目前已停止维护。Verso为Servo的发展做出了贡献，但无法跟上更新的步伐。项目仓库将被存档，但仍有望在未来重新启动。Verso探索Servo的嵌入式解决方案，尝试多视图和多窗口界面，并完全从Servo构建UI元素。
best_quote_en: A web browser that plays old world blues to build new world hope.
best_quote_zh: 一个用怀旧的布鲁斯来构建新世界希望的Web浏览器。

title: Clockss: Digital preservation services run by academic publishers and libraries
summary_en: CLOCKSS is a community-led collaboration between academic publishers and research libraries, providing a sustainable online archive for long-term digital scholarship preservation. It ensures open access through Creative Commons licenses and safeguards against digital loss using innovative LOCKSS technology. CLOCKSS operates with global collaboration, preserving millions of journal articles and books.
summary_zh: CLOCKSS是由学术出版商和研究图书馆共同主导的合作项目，旨在提供可持续的在线存档，以长期保存数字学术成果。它通过知识共享许可确保开放获取，并使用创新的LOCKSS技术来防范数字丢失。CLOCKSS通过全球合作运营，保存了数百万篇期刊文章和书籍。
best_quote_en: Together we ensure the long-term survival of our shared intellectual heritage.
best_quote_zh: 我们共同确保我们共享的知识遗产得以长期留存。

title: Manage your tabs with agentic AI
summary_en: The provided content appears to be an error message from X (formerly Twitter). It indicates that JavaScript is disabled in the user's browser, preventing them from using the site. The message suggests enabling JavaScript or switching to a supported browser and provides links to the Help Center, Terms of Service, Privacy Policy, Cookie Policy, and Ads info.
summary_zh: 提供的内容似乎是来自 X (前身为 Twitter) 的错误消息。它表明用户的浏览器中禁用了 JavaScript，从而阻止他们使用该网站。该消息建议启用 JavaScript 或切换到受支持的浏览器，并提供指向帮助中心、服务条款、隐私政策、Cookie 政策和广告信息的链接。
best_quote_en: Something went wrong, but don’t fret — let’s give it another shot.
best_quote_zh: 出了点问题，但别担心——让我们再试一次。

title: Hunyuan Image 3.0 – AI Image Generator (Text-to-Image)
summary_en: Hunyuan Image 3.0 is Tencent's advanced AI image generation model that transforms text descriptions into high-resolution images. It features enhanced quality generation, advanced compression, dual encoder system, RLHF optimization, multi-language support, and flexible aspect ratios, empowering creators with professional-grade AI-assisted visual content generation.
summary_zh: Hunyuan Image 3.0是腾讯公司先进的AI图像生成模型，可以将文本描述转换为高分辨率图像。它具有增强的质量生成、高级压缩、双编码器系统、RLHF优化、多语言支持和灵活的宽高比，可以帮助创作者使用专业级AI辅助视觉内容生成。
best_quote_en: HunyuanImage 3.0 fuses aesthetic skill with reasoning and world knowledge.
best_quote_zh: HunyuanImage 3.0 将审美技巧与推理和世界知识融合在一起。

title: Show HN: Built Open Source AI Coding Assistant Which Rivals to Cursor
desc:
I built a completely FREE, open-source AI coding assistant in Python over a weekend. It works with any codebase, keeps your data local, and rivals paid alternatives.

What is Lynecode? Open Source: You can customize if you want Terminal first: Works with ANY language, ANY project size 30+ tools from ASTSearch to SEMGREP Your data stays LOCAL Built in safety, Auto-backups before every change without even having git

The "Holy Sh*t" moment I built my entire website (https://www.lynelabs.com/) using Lynecode in under 2 hours. That’s when I realized this thing actually works and could rival the expensive alternatives.

Why this matters for developers everywhere: No more $20/month subscriptions draining your budget Data sovereignty: Your code doesn’t leave your machine (or host on your own Azure for extra privacy) Learn from readable code Toolset which can rival it's paid alternative and easily expandable

The bigger picture This isn’t about claiming to be the absolute best (I honestly haven’t tested every tool out there). It’s about showing that you don’t need million dollar funding or fancy marketing to build something useful

summary_en: Lynecode is an open-source AI coding assistant for the terminal, built in India. It works with any language and project, offering features like project indexing, safe snapshots, and intelligent file edits. It's free to use with your own API key from providers like OpenAI, Gemini, and Azure OpenAI. Lynecode emphasizes local data storage and easy integration.

best_quote_en: Lynecode helps you work faster with any project, Build anything you imagine no mess, we’ve got your back. It’s free. Bring your own API key.
best_quote_zh: Lynecode 可帮助您更快地处理任何项目，构建您能想象到的任何东西，并且没有混乱。我们为你提供支持。它是免费的。带上你自己的 API 密钥。

title: The "Corrupted Blood" Incident (Wow, 2005)
summary_en: The Corrupted Blood incident was a virtual pandemic in World of Warcraft in 2005 caused by a debuff spreading beyond its intended game region. It started in Zul'Gurub and spread due to a programming oversight, affecting players and NPCs. The event gained attention from epidemiologists for its simulation of human responses to disease outbreaks.
summary_zh: “堕落之血”事件是2005年《魔兽世界》中的一场虚拟瘟疫，起因是一个Debuff（减益效果）扩散到游戏区域之外。它始于祖尔格拉布，并由于编程失误而蔓延，影响了玩家和NPC。该事件引起了流行病学家的关注，因为它模拟了人类对疾病爆发的反应。
best_quote_en: Epidemiologists, meanwhile, took interest in how MMORPGs, unlike mathematical models, could capture individual human responses to disease outbreaks rather than generating assumptions about behavior.
best_quote_zh: 与此同时，流行病学家对MMORPG如何捕捉个人对疾病爆发的反应（而不是生成关于行为的假设）产生了兴趣，这与数学模型不同。

title: A Story About Bypassing Air Canada's In-Flight Network Restrictions
summary_en: The author collaborated with a roommate to bypass Air Canada's in-flight WiFi restrictions, which only allowed free texting. They explored domain self-signing and DNS port masquerading techniques. The first approach was blocked and the second approach worked, ultimately discovering that arbitrary DNS servers and TCP-based DNS requests were not blocked.
summary_zh: 作者与室友合作，试图绕过加拿大航空仅允许免费文本信息的机上WiFi限制。他们探索了域名自签名和DNS端口伪装技术。第一种方法被阻止，第二种方法起作用，最终发现任意DNS服务器和基于TCP的DNS请求未被阻止。
best_quote_en: After all, with such a long journey ahead, I needed something interesting to pass the 12 hours.
best_quote_zh: 毕竟，在如此漫长的旅程中，我需要一些有趣的事情来打发这12个小时。

title: Show HN: Real-time Docker event watcher with multi-channel notifications
summary_en: Docker Events is a lightweight Go service that watches Docker events in real-time and dispatches rich notifications through configurable channels like Slack, Telegram, and Discord. It offers features like real-time event streaming, human-friendly notifications, multi-channel delivery, opt-in filtering, and event grouping to prevent notification spam.
summary_zh: Docker Events是一个轻量级的Go服务，可以实时监控Docker事件，并通过可配置的通道（如Slack、Telegram和Discord）发送丰富的通知。它提供实时事件流、人性化的通知、多通道传递、选择性过滤和事件分组等功能，以防止通知泛滥。
best_quote_en: It is designed to be small, dependable, and easy to extend with new transports or event processing rules.
best_quote_zh: 它的设计目标是小巧、可靠，并且易于扩展新的传输方式或事件处理规则。

title: The Handle Trait
summary_en: The article discusses the naming of a trait for ergonomic ref-counting in Rust. The author proposes the name 'Handle' for a trait that signifies shared ownership or 'entanglement' of data, distinguishing it from simple cloning which creates independent copies. The key idea is to focus on the semantic concept of sharing rather than the operational details of implementation.
summary_zh: 本文讨论了Rust中符合人体工程学的引用计数的trait命名。作者建议使用'Handle'这个名称，来表示数据的所有权共享或“纠缠”，这与创建独立副本的简单克隆不同。核心思想是关注共享的语义概念，而不是实现的运行细节。
best_quote_en: When you clone the Arc, you don’t get a new value – you get back a second handle to the same value.
best_quote_zh: 当你克隆Arc时，你不会得到一个新值，而是会得到指向相同值的第二个句柄。

title: SSH Security: Why You Should Touch to Verify
summary_en: This article emphasizes the importance of touch-verified SSH for enhanced security. It addresses the increasing threat of malware stealing SSH keys and highlights how touch verification, using hardware isolation and physical confirmation, prevents key exfiltration and silent abuse. The article suggests using tools like Secretive on macOS to implement this.
summary_zh: 本文强调了使用触摸验证SSH来增强安全性的重要性。它指出了恶意软件窃取SSH密钥的日益增长的威胁，并强调了触摸验证如何通过硬件隔离和物理确认来防止密钥泄露和静默滥用。 文章建议在macOS上使用Secretive等工具来实现这一点。
best_quote_en: Touch-verified SSH is an inexpensive, low-impact intervention that helps.
best_quote_zh: 触摸验证的SSH是一种廉价，低影响的干预措施，可以提供帮助。

title: Can an LLM Be a Black-Box Optimizer?
summary_en: This article explores using Large Language Models (LLMs) as black-box optimizers, testing their ability to minimize the Rosenbrock function. The author compares an LLM optimizer to Nelder-Mead and Bayesian optimization, assessing their performance based on the minimum objective function found within a budget of 20 function evaluations. The initial evaluation revealed a tendency for the LLM to guess the minimum at the origin or (1,1), requiring adjustments to the prompt.
summary_zh: 本文探讨了使用大型语言模型（LLM）作为黑盒优化器，测试其最小化 Rosenbrock 函数的能力。作者将 LLM 优化器与 Nelder-Mead 和贝叶斯优化进行比较，根据在 20 次函数评估预算内找到的最小目标函数来评估它们的性能。初步评估显示 LLM 倾向于猜测最小值在原点或 (1,1)，因此需要调整提示。
best_quote_en: What if we could take the intuition that is latent in a large language model (LLM) to guide an optimization process?
best_quote_zh: 如果我们能利用大型语言模型（LLM）中潜在的直觉来指导优化过程，会怎么样？

title: I Triggered a Government Investigation into Microsoft (Update)
summary_en: Trevor Nestor triggered a government investigation into Microsoft for wrongful terminations, ADA noncompliance, and whistleblower retaliation. Despite facing criticism, he decided to double down on going public, encouraged by others who experienced similar issues. He believes that exposing corporate misconduct is a victory in itself, holding Microsoft accountable for labor law violations.
summary_zh: Trevor Nestor因不当解雇、违反 ADA 规定和举报人报复等问题，触发了对微软的政府调查。尽管面临批评，但他决定加倍公开此事，受到其他有类似经历的人的鼓励。他认为，揭露公司的不当行为本身就是一种胜利，可以追究微软违反劳动法的责任。
best_quote_en: The way I see it, even if gatekeepers through formal channels fail to hold Microsoft accountable, by going public and resisting fear and intimidation, I've already won.
best_quote_zh: 在我看来，即使正式渠道的把关人未能追究微软的责任，通过公开此事并抵制恐惧和恐吓，我已经赢了。

title: More Speculations on Arenas in C++
summary_en: This article discusses arena allocation in C++ and how recent C++ standards, particularly C++20, affect memory management and object lifetimes. It revisits the author's previous arena implementation, highlighting potential issues with pointer provenance and the importance of using array new for proper lifetime management. The author also touches on the allowance of starting new lifetimes on top of technically still-alive objects within the arena.
summary_zh: 本文讨论了C++中的arena内存分配，以及最新的C++标准，尤其是C++20，如何影响内存管理和对象生命周期。作者回顾了之前实现的arena，强调了指针来源的潜在问题，以及使用数组new进行正确的生命周期管理的重要性。作者还提到了在arena中，允许在技术上仍然存在的对象之上开始新的生命周期。
best_quote_en: Assignment without a lifetime is invalid. Pointer casts are that much more suspicious in C++, and due to lifetime semantics, in many cases indicate incorrect code.
best_quote_zh: 没有生命周期的赋值是无效的。在C++中，指针转换更令人怀疑，并且由于生命周期语义，在许多情况下表明代码不正确。

title: Video of Kristi Noem blaming Democrats for shutdown rolling out at airports
summary_en: The Trump administration plans to display a video at US airports blaming Democrats for TSA workers' unpaid status during the government shutdown. The video features Kristi Noem, who states that Democrats in Congress refuse to fund the government, impacting TSA operations and employees. This politicizes travelers' airport experience.
summary_zh: 特朗普政府计划在美国机场播放一段视频，将政府关闭期间运输安全管理局（TSA）员工未获得报酬归咎于民主党。视频中，Kristi Noem 声称国会中的民主党人拒绝为政府提供资金，影响了 TSA 的运营和员工。此举将政治带入了旅客的机场体验。
best_quote_en: Democrats in Congress refuse to fund the federal government, and because of this, many of our operations are impacted, and most of our TSA employees are working without pay.
best_quote_zh: 国会中的民主党人拒绝为联邦政府提供资金，因此，我们的许多运营都受到了影响，我们的大多数 TSA 员工都在无薪工作。

title: Run Express server in the browser (2016)
summary_en: The article discusses techniques to improve web application loading times. It explores using ServiceWorker to intercept HTML and display cached content for instant loading. It also covers server-side rendering as an alternative solution, highlighting its performance benefits and SEO advantages. Finally, it connects Express server with ServiceWorker.
summary_zh: 本文讨论了提高Web应用程序加载速度的技术。它探讨了使用ServiceWorker拦截HTML并显示缓存内容以实现即时加载的方法。文章还介绍了服务端渲染作为另一种解决方案，强调了其性能优势和搜索引擎优化优势。最后，将Express服务器与ServiceWorker联系起来。
best_quote_en: The instant page content achieved!
best_quote_zh: 实现了即时页面内容！

title: Scientists may have spotted 'wind' blowing from the Milky Way's black hole
summary_en: Scientists have potentially detected a 'wind' emanating from Sagittarius A*, the supermassive black hole at the Milky Way's center. This wind is evidenced by a cone-shaped gap in the surrounding gas, suggesting the black hole ejects matter, though less dramatically than other black holes like Centaurus A.
summary_zh: 科学家们可能已经探测到来自银河系中心超大质量黑洞人马座 A* 的“风”。这种风的证据是周围气体中一个锥形的间隙，表明该黑洞会喷射物质，尽管不如半人马座 A 等其他黑洞那么引人注目。
best_quote_en: Most supermassive black holes don’t just swallow up matter, they eject it, sometimes in spectacular jets of super heated plasma.
best_quote_zh: 大多数超大质量黑洞不仅仅吞噬物质，它们还会喷射物质，有时会以壮观的超热等离子体喷流的形式喷射出来。

title: Major IQ differences in twins due to schooling, challenging decades of research
summary_en: A new analysis of twin studies suggests that differences in schooling significantly contribute to IQ gaps between identical twins raised apart. When twins have similar education, their IQ scores are nearly as alike as twins raised together.  However, when schooling varies greatly, IQ differences resemble those of unrelated individuals, challenging previous conclusions about the dominance of genetics in intelligence.
summary_zh: 一项新的双胞胎研究分析表明，教育差异显著影响了分开抚养的同卵双胞胎之间的智商差距。当双胞胎接受相似的教育时，他们的智商分数几乎与一起长大的双胞胎一样接近。然而，当教育差异很大时，智商差异类似于无关个体，挑战了先前关于遗传在智力中占主导地位的结论。
best_quote_en: When these twins receive similar educations, their IQ scores are nearly as alike as identical twins raised together, but when their schooling is very different, their IQs can be as dissimilar as those of unrelated strangers.
best_quote_zh: 当这些双胞胎接受相似的教育时，他们的智商分数几乎与一起长大的同卵双胞胎一样接近，但是当他们的教育非常不同时，他们的智商可能与无关的陌生人一样不同。

title: Airbnb: Agent-in-the-Loop: Data Flywheel for LLM-Based Customer Support
summary_en: This paper introduces Agent-in-the-Loop (AITL), a data flywheel framework for continuously improving LLM-based customer support. AITL integrates annotations directly into operations, reducing retraining cycles. A pilot program showed improvements in retrieval accuracy, generation quality, and agent adoption rates, demonstrating the effectiveness of human feedback loops in refining LLM systems.
summary_zh: 本文介绍了一种Agent-in-the-Loop (AITL)框架，这是一个数据飞轮，用于持续改进基于LLM的客户支持系统。AITL将注释直接集成到运营中，从而减少了再培训周期。一个试点项目表明，检索准确率、生成质量和代理采用率均有所提高，证明了人工反馈循环在优化LLM系统中的有效性。
best_quote_en: These results underscore the effectiveness of embedding human feedback loops directly into operational workflows to continuously refine LLM-based customer support system.
best_quote_zh: 这些结果强调了将人工反馈循环直接嵌入到运营工作流程中以持续优化基于LLM的客户支持系统的有效性。

title: The work of AI today is writing a Rust parser for a 20-year-old sensor
summary_en: The article argues that the real frontier of AI lies not in bigger models and more parameters but in improving the connection to physical data. It highlights the unglamorous but crucial work of parsing data from sensors and building the physical stack, which involves dealing with raw, real-world data. This is where a true competitive advantage can be found.
summary_zh: 文章认为，人工智能的真正前沿不在于更大的模型和更多的参数，而在于改善与物理数据的连接。它强调了解析传感器数据和构建物理堆栈这项不光彩但至关重要的工作，这项工作涉及处理原始的、真实世界的数据。真正的竞争优势可以从这里找到。
best_quote_en: The physical stack is 90 percent of the effort and 0 percent of the glamour. And it's where the truth lives.
best_quote_zh: 物理堆栈占据了 90% 的努力，却没有一丝光彩。而真相就存在于此。

title: Flattening the stack, reducing the complexity of a JavaScript runtime
summary_en: The article appears to be a placeholder or an incomplete page from a GitHub repository related to 'librdx' by 'gritzko'. It indicates potential issues with loading content and doesn't provide meaningful information for summarization beyond a project title and author.
summary_zh: 这篇文章似乎是一个占位符或来自GitHub仓库'gritzko/librdx'的不完整页面。它表明加载内容时可能出现问题，除了项目标题和作者之外，没有提供有意义的信息。
best_quote_en: Uh oh! There was an error while loading. Please reload this page.
best_quote_zh: 糟糕！加载时出错。请重新加载此页面。

title: Go Subtleties You May Not Know
summary_en: This article highlights several lesser-known features and subtleties of the Go programming language, covering topics such as ranging over integers, renaming packages, constraining generic function signatures, index-based string interpolation, the 'time.After' function, embedding files, UTF-8 gotchas with 'len()', nil interfaces, invoking methods on nil values, and variable references with ranging over maps.
summary_zh: 本文重点介绍Go编程语言的一些鲜为人知的特性和微妙之处，涵盖了整数范围，重命名包，约束泛型函数签名，基于索引的字符串插值，“time.After”函数，嵌入文件，带“len()”的UTF-8陷阱，Nil接口，在Nil值上调用方法以及在使用map进行范围限定的变量引用等主题。
best_quote_en: One of the best ways to learn something new is to write down something you’ve learned about it regularly.
best_quote_zh: 学习新事物最好的方法之一就是定期写下你学到的东西。

title: Hackers targeted JLR months before cyber attack that halted production
summary_en: Hackers targeted JLR months before the cyber attack that halted production. The article discusses subscription options for accessing the Financial Times for global news, expert analysis, and other features.
summary_zh: 黑客在导致捷豹路虎（JLR）停产的网络攻击发生前几个月就盯上了该公司。文章主要介绍了订阅《金融时报》以获取全球新闻、专家分析和其他功能的选项。
best_quote_en: Stay informed with global news & in-depth analysis.
best_quote_zh: 随时了解全球新闻和深度分析。

title: From Nginx to ngrok: Dogfooding our own website with Traffic Policy
summary_en: ngrok replaced its aging nginx configurations with its own Traffic Policy to fully dogfood its product. The transition involved migrating complex routing rules, redirects, and other configurations to ngrok's more capable API gateway. This showcases ngrok's evolution into a full API gateway solution, simplifying traffic management and improving user experience.
summary_zh: ngrok 使用其自身的流量策略替换了老旧的 nginx 配置，以完全体验自己的产品。 此次迁移涉及将复杂的路由规则、重定向和其他配置迁移到 ngrok 功能更强大的 API 网关。 这展示了 ngrok 演变为完整的 API 网关解决方案，简化了流量管理并改善了用户体验。
best_quote_en: To really embody the spirit of dogfooding, you shouldn't side-step your product gaps and fill those with something else.
best_quote_zh: 为了真正体现内部测试的精神，你不应该回避你产品的不足，并用其他的东西来填补这些空白。

title: Windows 10 support ends on October 14, 2025
summary_en: Windows 10 support ends on October 14, 2025. Upgrade to Windows 11 for security updates and features. Options include upgrading your current PC, buying a new one, or using the Extended Security Updates (ESU) program. Microsoft 365 Apps support on Windows 10 also ends on the same date, but security updates will be provided for three more years.
summary_zh: Windows 10 将于 2025 年 10 月 14 日停止支持。建议升级到 Windows 11 以获得安全更新和新功能。您可以选择升级现有电脑、购买新电脑或使用扩展安全更新（ESU）计划。Microsoft 365 应用对 Windows 10 的支持也将于同日结束，但安全更新将额外提供三年。
best_quote_en: While you could continue to use a PC running Windows 10, without continued software and security updates, your PC will be at a greater risk for viruses and malware.
best_quote_zh: 虽然您可以继续使用运行 Windows 10 的电脑，但如果没有持续的软件和安全更新，您的电脑将面临更大的病毒和恶意软件风险。

title: How one of the longest dinosaur trackways in the world was uncovered in the UK
summary_en: One of the world's longest dinosaur trackways, dating back 166 million years, has been uncovered in an Oxfordshire quarry. The trackways, made by sauropods and megalosaurus, reveal insights into dinosaur behavior, speed, and environment. The 220m trail provides a unique snapshot of prehistoric life in the Jurassic period, offering clues about how these giant creatures moved and interacted.
summary_zh: 在牛津郡的采石场发现了一条世界上最长的恐龙足迹之一，可以追溯到1.66亿年前。这些由蜥脚类恐龙和斑龙留下的足迹，揭示了恐龙的行为、速度和环境。这条220米长的足迹为了解侏罗纪时期的史前生命提供了一个独特的快照，为了解这些巨型生物如何移动和互动提供了线索。
best_quote_en: But with a trackway like this, we've got hundreds of metres of the animal doing its own thing. And it's so important to look at the way animals move freely and naturally, and tracks are the only way we can do that for dinosaurs.
best_quote_zh: 有了这样的足迹，我们可以观察到动物数百米的活动轨迹。观察动物自由和自然移动的方式非常重要，而足迹是我们可以做到这一点的唯一途径。

title: Problem Details for HTTP APIs
summary_en: This document defines a "problem detail" format for HTTP APIs to carry machine-readable error details in HTTP responses. It uses JSON and XML formats to provide finer-grained error information beyond HTTP status codes, allowing API clients to understand the problem and how to resolve it.
summary_zh: 本文定义了一种HTTP API的“问题详情”格式，用于在HTTP响应中携带机器可读的错误详情。它使用JSON和XML格式来提供比HTTP状态码更精细的错误信息，使API客户端能够了解问题以及如何解决它。
best_quote_en: This document defines a "problem detail" as a way to carry machine-readable details of errors in a HTTP response to avoid the need to define new error response formats for HTTP APIs.
best_quote_zh: 本文定义了一种“问题详情”，作为在HTTP响应中携带机器可读的错误详情的方式，以避免为HTTP API定义新的错误响应格式。

title: Technological Optimism and Appropriate Fear
summary_en: The author reflects on the increasing capabilities of AI systems, moving beyond simple tools to exhibit situational awareness, sparking both technological optimism and appropriate fear. He emphasizes the importance of acknowledging AI's reality and mastering our fears to understand and potentially tame it. Ignoring the reality of AI is a guaranteed losing strategy.
summary_zh: 作者反思了人工智能系统日益增长的能力，这些系统不再是简单的工具，而是展现出情境意识，这既引发了技术乐观主义，也引发了适当的恐惧。他强调了承认人工智能的现实并掌握我们的恐惧来理解并可能驯服它的重要性。忽视人工智能的现实是一种必输的策略。
best_quote_en: But make no mistake: what we are dealing with is a real and mysterious creature, not a simple and predictable machine.
best_quote_zh: 但请不要搞错：我们所面对的是一个真实而神秘的生物，而不是一个简单且可预测的机器。

title: Europe's Digital Sovereignty Paradox – "Chat Control" Update
summary_en: The EU's "Chat Control" proposal, mandating scanning of private communications, faces opposition due to concerns about breaking encryption. European tech companies argue this undermines digital sovereignty by forcing vulnerabilities. Policymakers need to understand encryption's crucial role in secure infrastructure for democracy and national security. A coherent tech strategy is needed to bridge the gap between political vision and technical reality.
summary_zh: 欧盟的“聊天控制”提案，强制扫描私人通信，因担心破坏加密而面临反对。欧洲科技公司认为，这通过强行制造漏洞来破坏数字主权。政策制定者需要了解加密在民主和国家安全的安全基础设施中的关键作用。需要一项连贯的技术战略来弥合政治愿景和技术现实之间的差距。
best_quote_en: When Denmark's Justice Minister suggested that the "completely misguided perception" is that everyone has a right to secure communication, he revealed the fundamental gap: policymakers who don't understand that secure infrastructure is the core of today's Internet backbone, not just for the pure sake of democracy (I swear it hurts to have to explain this), but also for the existential security of European countries.
best_quote_zh: 当丹麦司法部长暗示“完全错误的观念”是每个人都有权进行安全通信时，他揭示了根本差距：政策制定者不明白安全基础设施是当今互联网骨干的核心，不仅是为了纯粹的民主（我发誓解释这一点让我感到痛苦），而且也为了欧洲国家的存在安全。

title: Sweater
summary_en: A sweater is a knitted or crocheted garment with long sleeves that covers the upper body. Also called a pullover, jumper, or jersey, sweaters can be made from wool, cotton, or synthetic fibers. They come in various designs, including V-neck, turtleneck, and crew neck, and can be cardigans with an open front.
summary_zh: 毛衣是一种针织或钩织的服装，通常有长袖，覆盖身体的上半部分。也称为套头衫、跳线衫或运动衫，毛衣可以用羊毛、棉或合成纤维制成。它们有多种设计，包括V领、高领和圆领，也可以是开襟衫。
best_quote_en: Sweaters that are more tightly fitted or have a soft drape may conform well to the body without requiring tailoring necessary in a woven garment such as darts, flares, and gores.
best_quote_zh: 更贴身或具有柔软悬垂感的毛衣可以很好地贴合身体，而无需像飞镖、喇叭口和三角形布等梭织服装所需的剪裁。

title: ComfyUI on Nvidia DGX Spark
summary_en: NVIDIA released DGX Spark, a small form factor computer with a Grace Blackwell Superchip and 128GB unified memory. It supports ComfyUI well and can run large models. While not as performant as a desktop 5090, its unified memory allows for workloads that exceed high-end desktops. Benchmarks will be available in a future post.
summary_zh: NVIDIA发布了DGX Spark，一款小尺寸计算机, 具有Grace Blackwell Superchip和128GB统一内存。它良好支持ComfyUI，可以运行大型模型。虽然性能不及桌面5090，但其统一内存允许处理超出高端桌面的工作负载。基准测试将在未来的文章中提供。
best_quote_en: Performance wise it doesn’t beat a full desktop with a 5090 but it can run models and workloads that are too large for even high-end desktop systems.
best_quote_zh: 性能方面，它比不上配备5090的完整桌面电脑，但它可以运行即使是高端桌面系统也无法处理的大型模型和工作负载。

title: Why Your Brain and Mine Agree on What We See
summary_en: A study shows that while individual brains respond differently to images, the relationships between neural responses are consistent across people. This shared relational pattern enables similar perception of the world. Understanding this could improve AI models by mirroring human cognition.
summary_zh: 一项研究表明，尽管个体大脑对图像的反应不同，但神经反应之间的关系在人与人之间具有一致性。 这种共享的关系模式使得对世界的感知相似。 理解这一点可以通过模仿人类认知来改进人工智能模型。
best_quote_en: This relational representation may be the brain’s way of organizing information so that all humans can understand the world in a similar way, even when the underlying neural coding differs.
best_quote_zh: 这种关系表示可能是大脑组织信息的方式，以便所有人都可以以相似的方式理解世界，即使底层神经编码不同。

title: Elixir 1.9.0 Release
summary_en: Elixir 1.19.0 is released with enhancements and bug fixes. Key updates include improvements to Access, Base, Calendar, Code, Enum, Inspect, IO.ANSI, Kernel, Macro, Module, OptionParser, Protocol, Regex, Registry, String, ExUnit, IEx, Logger, and Mix. Bug fixes address issues in Code, DateTime, Enum, File, Inspect, Kernel, Protocol, Regex, Stream, URI, and ExUnit.
summary_zh: Elixir 1.19.0 版本发布，包含多项增强和错误修复。主要更新包括改进了 Access、Base、Calendar、Code、Enum、Inspect、IO.ANSI、Kernel、Macro、Module、OptionParser、Protocol、Regex、Registry、String、ExUnit、IEx、Logger 和 Mix。修复的错误涉及 Code、DateTime、Enum、File、Inspect、Kernel、Protocol、Regex、Stream、URI 和 ExUnit。
best_quote_en: Do not automatically load modules after their compilation, guaranteeing a more consistent compile time experience and drastically improving compilation times.
best_quote_zh: 在模块编译后不再自动加载，从而保证更一致的编译体验并大幅缩短编译时间。

title: Netherlands' renewables drive putting pressure on its power grid
summary_en: The Netherlands' rapid shift to renewable energy, particularly wind and solar power, is straining the country's electricity grid, leading to congestion and power cuts. Despite leading in solar panel adoption, the grid, designed for large gas-fired power plants, struggles to handle the decentralized renewable energy sources. Significant investment is needed to upgrade the grid and avoid hampering economic growth.
summary_zh: 荷兰迅速转向可再生能源，特别是风能和太阳能，给该国的电力网络带来了压力，导致拥堵和停电。尽管在太阳能电池板的采用方面处于领先地位，但该电网是为大型燃气发电厂设计的，难以处理分散的可再生能源。需要大量投资来升级电网，避免阻碍经济增长。
best_quote_en: "Grid congestion is putting the future of the Dutch chemical industry at risk… while in other countries it will be easier to invest."
best_quote_zh: “电网拥堵正在使荷兰化学工业的未来面临风险……而在其他国家，投资会更容易。”

title: Meta partners up with Arm to scale AI efforts
summary_en: Meta and Arm are partnering to enhance Meta's AI systems using Arm's Neoverse platform, optimized for AI in the cloud. This multi-year partnership aims to efficiently scale AI innovation to Meta's billions of users, focusing on low-power deployments and efficiency. Meta is also vastly expanding its data center network to support AI services.
summary_zh: Meta与Arm合作，利用Arm的Neoverse平台增强Meta的AI系统，该平台针对云中的AI进行了优化。这项多年合作旨在有效地将AI创新扩展到Meta的数十亿用户，重点关注低功耗部署和效率。Meta还在大力扩展其数据中心网络，以支持AI服务。
best_quote_en: AI’s next era will be defined by delivering efficiency at scale.
best_quote_zh: 人工智能的下一个时代将通过大规模地提供效率来定义。

title: MNT September 2025 Update
summary_en: MNT's September 2025 update covers the MNT Mini Campaign closing on Crowd Supply, developments on the MNT Quasar processor module and MNT Reform Next, firmware updates for MNT Pocket Reform, Desserto vegan leather adoption and order fulfillment updates. Improved USB 3.0 performance and battery pack design for MNT Reform Next are highlighted. Firmware bugs are fixed, and shipment dates are provided.
summary_zh: MNT 2025年9月更新涵盖了MNT Mini Campaign在Crowd Supply上的结束、MNT Quasar处理器模块和MNT Reform Next的开发，MNT Pocket Reform的固件更新，Desserto纯素皮革的应用以及订单履行更新。重点介绍了MNT Reform Next改进的USB 3.0性能和电池组设计。固件错误已修复，并提供了发货日期。
best_quote_en: This more modular design allows for easier improvements and alternative pack geometries in the future.
best_quote_zh: 这种更模块化的设计允许将来更容易地进行改进和实现替代的电池组几何形状。

title: Mill as an Alternative Android Build Tool
summary_en: Mill is presented as an alternative to Gradle for Android builds, offering ease of use and learning. It supports complex project setups like Jetpack Compose and Android Native. Mill's object-oriented modules provide transparency and hackability, enabling developers to debug and tweak the build process themselves.
summary_zh: Mill被提出作为Gradle的替代品，用于Android构建，提供了易用性和学习性。它支持复杂的项目设置，如Jetpack Compose和Android Native。 Mill的面向对象模块提供了透明性和可破解性，使开发人员能够自行调试和调整构建过程。
best_quote_en: If something doesn’t work, you don’t need to wait for a plugin update, you can open the task in your IDE, see the source, and tweak it yourself.
best_quote_zh: 如果某些东西不起作用，你不需要等待插件更新，你可以在IDE中打开任务，查看源代码，然后自己调整它。

title: Jj Part 4: Configuration
summary_en: This article discusses customizing the Jj version control system through configuration. It covers basic configurations like setting name and email, diff formatters, diff editors, and merge editors. It also explains how to configure default subcommands and revsets. Additionally, the article explores advanced customization options like using custom templates, revset aliases, and template aliases to extend or replace built-in functionality in jj.
summary_zh: 本文探讨了通过配置自定义Jj版本控制系统。它涵盖了基本配置，如设置名称和电子邮件、diff格式化器、diff编辑器和合并编辑器。它还解释了如何配置默认子命令和revset。此外，本文还探讨了高级自定义选项，例如使用自定义模板、revset别名和模板别名来扩展或替换jj中的内置功能。
best_quote_en: Just like git, jj offers tiers of configuration that layer on top of one another. Every setting can be set for a single repo, for the current user, or globally for the entire system.
best_quote_zh: 就像Git一样，jj提供了层层叠加的配置层级。每个设置都可以针对单个仓库、当前用户或全局系统进行设置。

title: The Art of Scaling Reinforcement Learning Compute for LLMs [Meta]
summary_en: This paper presents a large-scale study on scaling reinforcement learning (RL) compute for large language models (LLMs). It defines framework for analyzing and predicting RL scaling, identifies key factors affecting performance and proposes a best-practice recipe, ScaleRL, demonstrating its effectiveness at 100,000 GPU-hours. The work provides a scientific framework and a practical recipe for predictable RL training.
summary_zh: 本文针对大型语言模型（LLM），提出了一种扩展强化学习（RL）计算的大规模研究。它定义了一个分析和预测RL扩展的框架，确定了影响性能的关键因素，并提出了ScaleRL的最佳实践方案，证明了其在100,000 GPU-hours上的有效性。这项工作为可预测的RL训练提供了一个科学的框架和实践方案。
best_quote_en: Our work provides both a scientific framework for analyzing scaling in RL and a practical recipe that brings RL training closer to the predictability long achieved in pre-training.
best_quote_zh: 我们的工作既提供了一个分析RL扩展的科学框架，又提供了一个实践方案，使RL训练更接近于预训练长期以来实现的可预测性。

title: Ask HN: What background color among white or black preferrable for websites?
desc:
These days, it is very common to see websites with dark backgrounds.

I ran a poll within my company and it seems like many love the dark background of our Website.

Www.hexarocket.com

But while speaking to a few folks within my professional network, they say it's better to choose the light background.

Does one really care the background color of a website ?

Or one would just skip reading because of the background color ?

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=45625674

Points: 1

A poll within the author's company showed that many people loved the dark background, but some people in the author's professional network preferred the light background. The author wonders if people really care about the background color of a website or if they would simply skip reading because of it.
