best_quote_zh: 人们真的关心网站的背景颜色吗？或者是否会因为背景颜色而直接跳过阅读？

title: What to do after detecting a signal from extraterrestrial intelligence
summary_en: This paper discusses the progress towards a new version of SETI post-detection protocols by the IAA SETI Committee. The protocols, initially formulated in 1989, have been updated to reflect advancements in SETI research, international participation, and the evolving information environment. A revised Declaration of Principles was presented at IAC 2024, with ongoing refinements based on community feedback.
summary_zh: 本文讨论了国际宇航科学院（IAA）SETI委员会在SETI探测后协议新版本方面的进展。该协议最初于1989年制定，现已更新，以反映SETI研究的进展、国际参与以及不断发展的信息环境。修订后的原则声明已在2024年国际宇航大会上提出，并根据社区反馈不断进行改进。
best_quote_en: The Group recognises the living document nature of the protocols, which will require ongoing refinement to remain relevant and effective in a rapidly changing world.
best_quote_zh: 该小组认识到这些协议是动态文件，需要不断完善，才能在快速变化的世界中保持相关性和有效性。

title: Kerr cell shutter to measure the speed of light
summary_en: A Kerr cell shutter is a high-speed photographic shutter using the Kerr effect in substances like nitrobenzene to achieve nanosecond shutter speeds. It's been replaced by KTN and barium titanate due to toxicity. It was also used in the 1920s-40s to measure the speed of light by diverting a light beam and measuring the time difference.
summary_zh: 克尔盒快门是一种高速摄影快门，利用硝基苯等物质的克尔效应实现纳秒级的快门速度。 由于毒性，它已被KTN和钛酸钡取代。 在1920年代至40年代，它也被用于测量光速，方法是转移光束并测量时间差。
best_quote_en: The cell makes use of the Kerr effect, in which the nitrobenzene becomes birefringent under the influence of the electric field.
best_quote_zh: 该装置利用了克尔效应，在这种效应中，硝基苯在电场的影响下会发生双折射。

title: Testing tricky network services with Linux Namespaces
summary_en: This article discusses using Linux network namespaces, veth pairs, and bridges to create isolated, scriptable test labs for network services like DHCP. It focuses on the DHCP load balancer (dhcplb) and demonstrates how to test relay and server/broadcast topologies on Linux and macOS using Lima. The approach allows for testing on local machines and in CI/CD pipelines, ensuring reliable testing without dedicated hardware.
summary_zh: 本文探讨了如何使用Linux网络命名空间，veth对和网桥来为DHCP等网络服务创建隔离的、可脚本化的测试环境。重点介绍了DHCP负载均衡器（dhcplb），并演示了如何在Linux和macOS上使用Lima测试中继和服务器/广播拓扑。该方法允许在本地机器和CI/CD管道上进行测试，确保在没有专用硬件的情况下进行可靠的测试。
best_quote_en: By combining these three tools, we can build any network topology we can imagine, all on a single Linux host.
best_quote_zh: 通过结合这三种工具，我们可以在单个Linux主机上构建我们能想到的任何网络拓扑。

title: I built an AI that replaces spreadsheets
summary_en: This article showcases a dashboard designed to replace spreadsheets for financial overview. It tracks income, expenses, and balance, allowing users to add transactions, categorize them, and view expense breakdowns through various charts. It also provides options to share and export data.
summary_zh: 本文展示了一个旨在取代电子表格的财务概览仪表板。它可以跟踪收入、支出和余额，允许用户添加交易、对其进行分类，并通过各种图表查看支出细目。它还提供了共享和导出数据的选项。
best_quote_en: No transactions yet. Add your first transaction above!
best_quote_zh: 尚无交易。请在上方添加您的第一笔交易！

title: Show HN: Nova: open-source solution for CAD file conflicts
desc:
Hey HN,

A friend at a hardware startup mentioned how their engineering team struggles with CAD file conflicts as PDM solutions are not affordable. Multiple engineers opening the same SolidWorks part = corrupted files and lost work.

I was motivated and started building Nova. Nova is a open source file locking system, designed to support multiple CAD softwares with real time locking and live dashboard to keep design engineers in sync.

Nova is built with python and Next.js.

Get started with -

  git clone https://github.com/agg111/nova
  cd nova
  pip install -r requirements.txt
  nova start
  nova --help (for more commands)
Open http://localhost:3000 in browser

I am looking for early users to get some feedback and learn about more features or bottlenecks that mechanical design teams currently face.

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=45632630

Points: 1

# Comments: 0
summary_en: Nova is an open-source CAD file locking system designed for team collaboration. It automatically manages file locks for CAD applications like SolidWorks and AutoCAD, preventing conflicts and ensuring seamless workflow. Key features include intelligent locking, a web dashboard for real-time monitoring, zero configuration, and support for major CAD applications.
summary_zh: Nova是一个开源的CAD文件锁定系统，专为团队协作设计。它可以自动管理SolidWorks和AutoCAD等CAD应用程序的文件锁定，防止冲突，确保工作流程顺畅。主要功能包括智能锁定、用于实时监控的Web仪表板、零配置以及对主要CAD应用程序的支持。
best_quote_en: Nova automatically manages file locks for CAD applications (SolidWorks, AutoCAD, Inventor, etc.) to prevent conflicts in team environments.
best_quote_zh: Nova自动管理CAD应用程序（如SolidWorks、AutoCAD、Inventor等）的文件锁，以防止团队环境中的冲突。

title: Security Observability in Kubernetes Goes Beyond Logs
summary_en: Security observability in Kubernetes correlates logs, runtime behavior, and network flow analysis to answer security questions in real-time. It utilizes Kubernetes audit logs, runtime security events, and security metrics to detect and investigate incidents faster. Effective audit log policies and integration with observability pipelines are crucial for proactive security.
summary_zh: Kubernetes中的安全可观测性关联日志、运行时行为和网络流量分析，以实时响应安全问题。它利用Kubernetes审计日志、运行时安全事件和安全指标更快地检测和调查事件。有效的审计日志策略以及与可观测性管道的集成对于主动安全至关重要。
best_quote_en: Security observability gives you investigation superpowers through correlation and context.
best_quote_zh: 安全可观测性通过关联和上下文赋予你调查的超能力。

title: SBI awarded Best Consumer Bank 2025 award by Global Finance magazin
summary_en: State Bank of India (SBI) has been recognized as the 'World's Best Consumer Bank' for 2025 by Global Finance magazine. The award recognizes SBI's advancements in customer service and digital transformation. SBI is focused on customer engagement, digital accessibility with the goal of providing better banking experiences.
summary_zh: 印度国家银行（SBI）被《环球金融》杂志评为2025年度“世界最佳消费银行”。该奖项表彰了SBI在客户服务和数字化转型方面的进步。SBI专注于客户参与和数字可访问性，目标是提供更好的银行体验。
best_quote_en: "Focused on customer engagement, digital transformation, and expanding accessibility, the State Bank of India has secured its leadership role in consumer banking."
best_quote_zh: “专注于客户参与、数字化转型和扩大可访问性，印度国家银行巩固了其在消费银行领域的领导地位。”

title: What Sleep Is
summary_en: Despite research, the true nature and purpose of sleep remain elusive. Often discussed for its necessity and potential negative consequences of deprivation, this perspective may be too utilitarian. Sleep is a bizarre, daily experience impacting health and society. Viewing sleep from an alien perspective as a 'negative image of activity' reveals its planetary-scale significance where billions are asleep.
summary_zh: 尽管经过数十年的研究，睡眠的真正本质和目的仍然难以捉摸。人们通常讨论的是睡眠的必要性以及缺乏睡眠的潜在负面影响，但这种观点可能过于功利。睡眠是一种奇怪的、每天都会发生的现象，影响着健康和社会。从外星人的角度将睡眠视为“活动的负面形象”揭示了其行星尺度的重要性，即数十亿人处于睡眠状态。
best_quote_en: Sleep is the single most bizarre experience that happens to all of us, against our will, every day.
best_quote_zh: 睡眠是发生在我们所有人身上，违背我们的意愿，每天都会发生的最奇怪的经历。

title: Mistaken Dichotomies about Dgit
summary_en: The article clarifies misconceptions about dgit, emphasizing that it's not an alternative to git-buildpackage but a separate layer. Dgit can support complete upstream git history if the maintainer uses it correctly, dispelling the notion that it only synthesizes repositories without history. It works together with tools like git-buildpackage.
summary_zh: 本文澄清了对 dgit 的误解，强调它不是 git-buildpackage 的替代品，而是一个独立的层。如果维护者正确使用 dgit，它可以支持完整的上游 git 历史记录，从而消除了它仅合成没有历史记录的存储库的观念。它可以与 git-buildpackage 等工具一起使用。
best_quote_en: It’s really better to think of dgit as a separate and orthogonal layer.
best_quote_zh: 将 dgit 视为一个独立的，正交的层会更好。

title: Show HN: UltraFaceSwap – Multi-face swap for photos, GIFs, and videos
desc:
Hi HN,

I just launched UltraFaceSwap (https://ultrafaceswap.com), an AI face swapping tool that handles photos, GIFs, and videos with single or multiple face swaps.

*What makes it different:* - *Multi-person swapping*: Swap multiple faces in one image/video (most tools only do one) - *Multi-face GIF support*: First tool I've seen that handles multi-person face swapping in animated GIFs - *Video quality*: Maintains temporal consistency (no flickering between frames) - *Comprehensive format support*: Works seamlessly across photos, GIFs, and videos

*Why I built it:* A friend needed a face swap tool for their project, so I tried every option on the market. They all had limitations: - Only single face swaps - Poor video quality with flickering - No proper GIF support, especially for multiple faces - Clunky UX requiring multiple steps

So I built what I wished existed.

*Pricing model:* - Free trial to test it out - Daily free credits (casual users might never pay) - Pay-as-you-go for volume (no subscription)

*Tech challenges I solved:* - Face tracking across video frames - Handling occlusions (when faces turn away) - Multi-face detection and assignment in animated GIFs - GIF color palette preservation while swapping multiple faces

*Current limitations:* - Processing videos takes time (30s video = ~3-5 min processing) - Works best with clear, well-lit faces - Very fast motion can still cause artifacts

I'm a solo developer and spent 2 months getting the quality right. Would love feedback from HN: - What use cases would you have for this? - Is multi-face swapping something you've needed? - Any concerns about the technology?

Try it out – I think you'll find the quality noticeably better than alternatives.

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=45653516

Points: 1

# Comments: 0
summary_en: UltraFaceSwap is an AI platform that offers multi-face swapping for photos, GIFs, and videos. It features stable multi-face tracking, high-fidelity blending, and a unified workflow for various media formats. It provides realistic results suitable for social media entertainment, professional headshots, and fun content creation.
summary_zh: UltraFaceSwap是一个AI平台，为照片、GIF和视频提供多人脸替换功能。它具有稳定的多人脸追踪、高保真融合以及适用于各种媒体格式的统一工作流程。 它提供逼真的结果，适用于社交媒体娱乐、专业头像和有趣的内容创作。
best_quote_en: Ultra Face Swap delivers a high‑fidelity multi‑face swapping experience across photos, GIFs, and videos.
best_quote_zh: Ultra Face Swap在照片、GIF和视频中提供高保真多人脸交换体验。

title: Show HN: Mocking APIs by just posting them to endpoints
desc:
I made a self-hosted API for crud-ing json data (initially for simple storage use cases). However, I started using to mock APIs, where I have scripts that create/edit random jsons and I make them available as API endpoints through this application.

The API is based on your JSON structure. So the example below is for CRUD-ing [key1][key2] in file.json. The value (which can be anything) is then added to the body of the request. Moreover, there are helper functions for appending and incrementing values.

  DELETE/PUT/GET: /api/file/key1/key2/...

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=45653511

Points: 2

# Comments: 0
summary_en: Emmer is a self-hosted API for CRUD operations on JSON data across various filesystems. It's designed for small projects' data storage or API mocking during development. It uses HTTP endpoints to manage and manipulate JSON data based on its structure. Supports DELETE/PUT/GET operations.
summary_zh: Emmer是一个自托管API，用于在各种文件系统上对JSON数据执行CRUD操作。它专为小型项目的数据存储或开发期间的API模拟而设计。它使用HTTP端点来管理和操作基于其结构的JSON数据。支持DELETE/PUT/GET操作。
best_quote_en: The API is based on your JSON structure.
best_quote_zh: API基于你的JSON结构。

title: What to do to get a colleague promoted
summary_en: The article provides practical steps to help a colleague get promoted, including advocating for them, assigning easy-win tasks, offering coaching, sharing information, facilitating connections, and directly recommending them to their manager. It emphasizes the importance of supporting deserving colleagues for a positive workplace culture.
summary_zh: 本文提供了帮助同事晋升的实用步骤，包括为他们辩护、分配容易成功的任务、提供指导、分享信息、促进联系，以及直接向经理推荐他们。文章强调了支持有价值的同事对于营造积极工作场所文化的重要性。
best_quote_en: Collaboration and mutual support foster a positive workplace culture, and you’d likely appreciate the same advocacy if you were seeking a promotion yourself.
best_quote_zh: 合作和互相支持能够培养积极的工作场所文化，如果您自己寻求晋升，您也很可能会欣赏同样的帮助。

title: October 29:Perihelion and What It Would Mean If 3I/Atlas Is a Mothership
summary_en: The article discusses the upcoming perihelion of interstellar object 3I/ATLAS and the possibility, proposed by Avi Loeb, that it could be an alien mothership. It explores the implications of such a discovery, including scientific, political, and cultural impacts, and suggests a rational response based on coordinated observation, independent verification, and transparent communication.
summary_zh: 文章讨论了星际物体3I/ATLAS即将到来的近日点，以及Avi Loeb提出的它可能是外星母舰的可能性。文章探讨了这一发现的潜在影响，包括科学、政治和文化层面，并提出了基于协调观测、独立验证和透明沟通的理性应对措施。
best_quote_en: Perihelion is not just the object’s closest point to the Sun; it is our closest point to comprehension.
best_quote_zh: 近日点不仅是该物体距离太阳最近的点；它也是我们距离理解最近的点。

title: It's Official: Xbox Has a Full-Blown Identity Crisis
summary_en: The article discusses Xbox's identity crisis amidst the release of the ROG Xbox Ally X and upcoming next-gen Xbox. It highlights concerns about pricing, the blurring lines between console and PC gaming, and the need for Xbox to clarify its vision. The author questions if the Xbox Ally is simply a branded laptop with joysticks, emphasizing the importance of hardware and software integration for a seamless gaming experience.
summary_zh: 文章讨论了 Xbox 在推出 ROG Xbox Ally X 和即将推出的下一代 Xbox 时面临的身份危机。文章强调了对定价、主机和 PC 游戏之间界限模糊的担忧，以及 Xbox 需要澄清其愿景的必要性。作者质疑 Xbox Ally 是否只是一个带有操纵杆的品牌笔记本电脑，强调了硬件和软件集成对于无缝游戏体验的重要性。
best_quote_en: ‘Is it actually just a branded laptop with joysticks?’
best_quote_zh: “这实际上只是一个带有操纵杆的品牌笔记本电脑吗？”

title: Interactive Double Pendulum Simulator
summary_en: This is an interactive double pendulum simulator. Users can adjust parameters like mass, length, and damping. The simulator allows pausing, resetting, and sharing the pendulum's configuration. Users can drag the bobs to set new starting positions and also donate to support the project.
summary_zh: 这是一个交互式双摆模拟器。用户可以调整质量、长度和阻尼等参数。该模拟器允许暂停、重置和分享摆的配置。用户可以拖动摆锤来设置新的起始位置，并且可以捐款支持项目。
best_quote_en: Tip: drag the bobs while paused
best_quote_zh: 提示：暂停时拖动摆锤

title: Bitmasks, Threads, and Interrupts: Concurrent, Colorless Ruby
summary_en: This article explores concurrency in Ruby, focusing on how the Ruby thread scheduler manages threads through interrupts. It discusses interrupt masks, which are used to represent different interrupt events like timer interrupts and terminate interrupts. The article emphasizes the importance of understanding how the thread scheduler rudely interrupts threads for efficiency and fairness, ensuring the runtime operates smoothly.
summary_zh: 本文探讨了Ruby中的并发，重点介绍了Ruby线程调度器如何通过中断来管理线程。它讨论了中断掩码，该掩码用于表示不同的中断事件，如计时器中断和终止中断。文章强调了理解线程调度器为了效率和公平而粗暴地中断线程的重要性，从而确保运行时平稳运行。
best_quote_en: The Ruby thread scheduler is rude. There, I said it.
best_quote_zh: Ruby线程调度器是粗鲁的。我说了。

title: Frames relaunch – A tool for film photographers to log and embed metadata
summary_en: Frames relaunch is a tool for film photographers to log and embed metadata. It helps to effortlessly browse, organize, and manage film rolls, keeping each session structured and easily accessible.
summary_zh: Frames重新发布，是一款供胶片摄影师记录和嵌入元数据的工具。 它有助于毫不费力地浏览、组织和管理胶卷，保持每个会话的结构化和易于访问。
best_quote_en: Browse, organize, and manage all your film rolls effortlessly, keeping each session clearly structured, easy to find, and neatly arranged within your library for quick access anytime.
best_quote_zh: 毫不费力地浏览、组织和管理你的所有胶卷，使每个会话结构清晰、易于查找，并整齐地排列在图库中，以便随时快速访问。

title: Grasp Any Region: Precise, Contextual Pixel Understanding for Multimodal LLMs
summary_en: The paper introduces Grasp Any Region (GAR), a multimodal LLM designed for precise, contextual pixel understanding. GAR utilizes a RoI-aligned feature replay technique for precise perception and interaction modeling between prompts, enabling advanced compositional reasoning. The authors also introduce GAR-Bench for evaluating single-region comprehension and cross-region interactions. Experiments demonstrate that GAR achieves state-of-the-art performance and strong transferability to videos.
summary_zh: 本文介绍了一种名为Grasp Any Region (GAR)的多模态LLM，旨在实现精确的上下文像素理解。GAR采用RoI对齐的特征重放技术，以实现精确的感知和提示之间的交互建模，从而实现高级的组合推理。作者还介绍了GAR-Bench，用于评估单区域理解和跨区域交互。实验表明，GAR实现了最先进的性能，并具有强大的视频迁移能力。
best_quote_en: GAR supports (1) precise perception by leveraging necessary global contexts, and (2) modeling interactions between multiple prompts. Together, it then naturally achieves (3) advanced compositional reasoning to answer specific free-form questions about any region, shifting the paradigm from passive description to active dialogue.
best_quote_zh: GAR通过利用必要的全局上下文来支持（1）精确感知，并通过模拟多个提示之间的交互来支持（2）。综上，它自然实现了（3）高级组合推理，以回答关于任何区域的特定自由形式问题，从而将范式从被动描述转变为主动对话。

title: ChatGPT's Atlas: The Browser That's Anti-Web
summary_en: OpenAI's Atlas browser is anti-web, substituting AI-generated content, requiring command-line-like inputs, and acting as the user's agent. It doesn't prioritize links to original websites, trapping users in a walled garden of AI-generated results. It's a shift away from intuitive, clickable interfaces towards guessing commands. This approach has significant drawbacks.
summary_zh: OpenAI的Atlas浏览器反网络，用AI生成内容代替网页，需要类似命令行的输入，并充当用户的代理。它不优先提供原始网站的链接，而是将用户困在AI生成内容的围墙花园中。这是从直观、可点击的界面转向猜测命令。这种方法有显著的缺点。
best_quote_en: Atlas is a browser, but it is not a web browser. It is an anti-web browser.
best_quote_zh: Atlas是一个浏览器，但它不是一个网络浏览器。它是一个反网络浏览器。

title: AI assistance is only making coders dumb, lazy and prone to replacement
desc:
LLMs like ChatGPT and copilot are like those super saturated junk food like a pizza or burger which feels good in that moment (ready code snippets or answers) but over a period only accumulates weight gain, sugar and diseases (technical debt, brain drain).

We have stopped reading or even looking up official documentation, that has become an extinct skill today. And why would we if an LLM does it for us and tells us only what we need to be told to create that release or fulfill that urgent deadline.

What happened with AWS outage recently is only a brief foreshadow of what might eventually come to pass if this trend continues. Imagine a world where most programmers are primarily LLM prompters with a very shallow understanding of core programming skills or even operational skills pertaining to an app, framework or library. What will we do if a major outage or technical issue occurs then and no person around knows what’s really going on?

And that’s not even mentioning the replacement of human workers problem which is the most discussed topic these days. Eventually, the senior/mid management will think why do we even need these “prompt engineers”, let an agent do that work. After that, senior management will think why do we need these “prompt managers”, let another agentic AI that controls other agents do it! Eventually, the company will be run entirely by robots and shareholders will enjoy their wealth in peace!

As dystopian as the above scenario sounds, that’s the world we are eventually heading towards with all the progress in AI and the commerce oriented environment it’s evolving in. But it’ll still take decades at least considering the state of prevailing systems in public and private sectors. But until that happens, let us programmers equip ourselves with real old school skills which have stood the test of time - like scavenging documentation, referring to stack overflow and wikipedia for knowledge, etc. and coding with humility and passion, not this LLM crap.

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=45679307

Points: 1

# Comments: 0
summary_en: The author argues that AI assistance tools like ChatGPT and Copilot are making coders lazy, dumb, and prone to replacement. Over-reliance on these tools leads to technical debt, brain drain and a shallow understanding of core programming skills. The author urges programmers to maintain real old-school skills like reading documentation.
summary_zh: 作者认为，ChatGPT和Copilot等AI辅助工具正使程序员变得懒惰、愚蠢和容易被取代。过度依赖这些工具会导致技术债务、脑流失以及对核心编程技能的肤浅理解。作者敦促程序员保持阅读文档等真正的老式技能。
best_quote_en: Imagine a world where most programmers are primarily LLM prompters with a very shallow understanding of core programming skills or even operational skills pertaining to an app, framework or library.
best_quote_zh: 想象一下这样一个世界：大多数程序员主要充当LLM提示者，对核心编程技能甚至与应用程序、框架或库相关的操作技能的理解非常肤浅。

title: Netflix optimized its petabyte-scale logging system with ClickHouse
summary_en: Netflix uses ClickHouse to ingest 5 petabytes of logs daily, processing 10.6M events/second. Key optimizations include generated lexers for fingerprinting (8-10x faster), custom serialization, and sharded tag maps reducing query times. This enables engineers to debug issues and monitor microservices rapidly, supporting over 300 million subscribers.
summary_zh: Netflix 使用 ClickHouse 每日摄取 5PB 的日志，处理速度达 1060 万个事件/秒。关键优化包括：用于指纹识别的生成词法分析器（速度提高 8-10 倍）、定制序列化和分片标签映射，从而缩短查询时间。这使得工程师能够快速调试问题和监控微服务，为超过 3 亿用户提供支持。
best_quote_en: At Netflix, scale drives everything.
best_quote_zh: 在 Netflix，规模驱动一切。

title: Show HN: Share your coding agent sessions
desc:
Knowing it might soon be obsolete, I still went ahead and built aisessions.dev - a place to share sessions from Claude Code, Codex, and Gemini CLI.

It was a fun zero-to-one project and an excuse to think through:

- Safely accepting user generated data (security, PII scrubbing, etc) - Building a privacy conscious service - Designing for long-term low-maintenance operation - Developer experience — CLI distribution, onboarding, and good defaults - UI, design, and simplicity - Keeping everything open source

Kudos to AMP and opencode for the inspiration.

If OpenAI, Anthropic, or Google launch native session sharing tomorrow, that’s fine. The experience is well worth the effort (which wasn't that big considering I wrote very little of the code).

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=45692052

title: Singing bus horns in West Sumatra
summary_en: This article discusses the unique tradition of "singing bus horns" (kalason oto) in West Sumatra, Indonesia.  These musical horns, developed by local mechanics, were used on buses in the 1950s to play Minangkabau folk music for migrants. Pak Budahar, a legendary kalason player, is highlighted, showcasing the cultural significance and evolution of this art form.
summary_zh: 这篇文章介绍了印度尼西亚西苏门答腊岛独特的“歌唱巴士喇叭”（kalason oto）传统。这些由当地机械师开发的音乐喇叭在20世纪50年代被用于公共汽车上，为移民演奏米南加保民间音乐。文章重点介绍了传奇的kalason演奏家Pak Budahar，展示了这种艺术形式的文化意义和演变。
best_quote_en: The honk is a scream from within our sealed-in vehicles - “Take heed! There’s a human in here!” But have you ever honked with tenderness, with love, with longing?
best_quote_zh: 喇叭声是从我们封闭的车辆内发出的一声尖叫——“注意！这里有人！”但你有没有用温柔、爱意和渴望来按喇叭？

title: Video‐rate tunable colour electronic paper with human resolution
summary_en: This article introduces a video-rate tunable color electronic paper with human resolution using electrically tunable metapixels of WO3 nanodisks. The technology achieves high pixel density, full-color video capability, high reflectance, strong optical contrast, and low energy consumption, making it a potential solution for immersive virtual reality systems.
summary_zh: 本文介绍了一种具有人眼分辨率的视频速率可调彩色电子纸，它使用WO3纳米盘的电可调超像素。该技术实现了高像素密度、全彩色视频能力、高反射率、强光学对比度和低能耗，使其成为沉浸式虚拟现实系统的潜在解决方案。
best_quote_en: By contrast, electronic paper, which uses ambient light for visibility, can maintain high optical contrast regardless of pixel size, but cannot achieve high resolution.
best_quote_zh: 相比之下，电子纸使用环境光来获得可见性，可以保持高光学对比度，而与像素尺寸无关，但无法实现高分辨率。

title: When Cells Run a Red Light: Double Trouble for Old Models in Cell Division
summary_en: This article discusses the use of cookies on a website. It mentions Google Analytics for website analysis and the Sublime Video player, both of which use cookies. Users can opt-out of Google Analytics data collection using a browser add-on or disable cookies through their browser settings. Links to further information about cookies and Google Analytics are provided.

title: It's the "Hardware", Stupid
summary_en: The article discusses the failure of AI hardware like Humane's AI Pin and Rabbit R1, attributing it to their inability to solve user problems and pass the 'toothbrush test' of daily essential use. It argues that AI should integrate into existing smartphones rather than replace them, highlighting OpenAI's $6.5 billion investment in Jony Ive's team to explore new AI device concepts.
summary_zh: 文章讨论了 Humane 的 AI Pin 和 Rabbit R1 等 AI 硬件的失败，认为其原因是未能解决用户问题，也未能通过每日必需品 “牙刷测试”。文章认为，AI 应该融入现有智能手机，而不是取代它们，并强调 OpenAI 斥资 65 亿美元投资 Jony Ive 团队，以探索新的 AI 设备概念。

best_quote_zh: AI硬件必须“整合”而不是“取代”智能手机。

title: The universal chess language of the "Informant"
summary_en: The article discusses the universal chess language created by the "Chess Informant," a system of signs and symbols that allows chess annotations to be understood worldwide. It highlights how these signs, including punctuation and specific chess symbols, clarify the meaning of moves and positions. The creator of the "Informant" has gifted the world with the beautiful language used worldwide.
summary_zh: 本文探讨了“Chess Informant”创造的通用国际象棋语言，这是一种符号系统，使得国际象棋注释可以在全球范围内被理解。文章强调了这些符号，包括标点符号和特定的国际象棋符号，如何阐明了棋步和位置的含义。“Informant”的创造者为世界奉献了一种被广泛使用的优美语言。
best_quote_en: "Chess is a scientific game and its literature ought to be placed on the basis of the strictest truthfulness, which is the foundation of all scientific research."
best_quote_zh: “国际象棋是一门科学的游戏，它的文献应该建立在最严格的真实性的基础上，这是所有科学研究的基础。”

title: Mapping Starlink's global IP transit providers
summary_en: This article maps Starlink's global IP transit providers by analyzing GeoIP data and BGP announcements. It identifies upstream providers for various locations globally, such as Arelion/Telia Carrier (AS1299) serving numerous cities and TELXIUS Cable (AS12956) covering locations across the Americas and Europe. The methodology involves correlating GeoIP data with BGP routing table information to determine transit providers.
summary_zh: 本文通过分析GeoIP数据和BGP公告，绘制了Starlink的全球IP传输供应商分布图。确定了各个地区的上游供应商，例如Arelion/Telia Carrier (AS1299) 为众多城市提供服务，TELXIUS Cable (AS12956) 覆盖美洲和欧洲的多个地点。该方法涉及将GeoIP数据与BGP路由表信息相关联，以确定传输供应商。
best_quote_en: To find out, I have to establish a relation between their GeoIP data and their BGP announcements globally.
best_quote_zh: 为了找出答案，我必须在全球范围内建立他们的GeoIP数据和BGP公告之间的关系。

title: Australia to sign UN 'surveillance treaty' in Vietnam – iTnews
summary_en: Australia is set to sign a UN treaty in Vietnam aimed at combating cybercrime through cooperation and information sharing. However, the treaty, proposed by Russia, faces criticism from tech companies and human rights organizations who fear it may undermine privacy and security, leading to a broad UN surveillance. Concerns include cross-border data sharing and vague definitions of cybercrime.
summary_zh: 澳大利亚即将在越南签署一项联合国条约，旨在通过合作和信息共享打击网络犯罪。然而，该条约由俄罗斯提议，面临着科技公司和人权组织的批评，他们担心这可能会损害隐私和安全，导致广泛的联合国监视。担忧包括跨境数据共享和网络犯罪的模糊定义。
best_quote_en: "a broad UN surveillance treaty that would undermine both privacy and security in the digital environment."
best_quote_zh: “一项范围广泛的联合国监视条约，将破坏数字环境中的隐私和安全。”

title: Was Apple Founder Steve Jobs Right about Market Research?
summary_en: This article examines Steve Jobs's stance on market research, highlighting his skepticism towards traditional methods. Jobs famously stated that Apple didn't conduct market research, believing that customers often don't know what they want until they see it. The article suggests that while Jobs's approach worked for Apple, it may not be suitable for all organizations.
summary_zh: 本文探讨了史蒂夫·乔布斯对市场调研的看法，强调了他对传统方法持怀疑态度。乔布斯曾明确表示，苹果不做市场调研，因为他认为顾客往往在看到产品之前不知道自己想要什么。文章指出，虽然乔布斯的方法对苹果有效，但可能不适合所有组织。
best_quote_en: It's really hard to design products by focus groups. A lot of times, people don't know what they want until you show it to them.
best_quote_zh: 通过焦点小组来设计产品非常困难。很多时候，人们在看到产品之前不知道自己想要什么。

title: Show HN: MicroDiagram Prototype

Deployed as Cloudflare container with single request taking approx. 0.8ms time.

Note: because it's using naive load balancing there might be some jank as containers wake up.

No data gathering whatsoever outside of requests and also some debug output from parser.

title: The Anti-Tail of 3I/Atlas Turned to a Tail
summary_en: Observations of interstellar object 3I/ATLAS show a transition from an anti-tail to a tail as it approaches the Sun. This is attributed to changes in the sublimation rate of ice fragments, driven by solar radiation. The object's mass loss is a tiny fraction of its total mass, and future observations will help determine if it's a natural comet or something more exotic.
summary_zh: 对星际天体3I/ATLAS的观测显示，随着它接近太阳，其反尾转变为尾。这归因于太阳辐射驱动下冰碎片升华率的变化。该天体的质量损失仅占其总质量的一小部分，未来的观测将有助于确定它是一个天然彗星还是更奇特的东西。
best_quote_en: Needless to say, we cannot infer the true nature of 3I/ATLAS from the skin layer that it shed so far.
best_quote_zh: 毋庸置疑，我们无法从 3I/ATLAS 迄今为止脱落的表层来推断它的真正性质。

title: Over 700M events/second: How we make sense of too much data
summary_en: Cloudflare ingests up to 706M events/second, a 100x growth since 2018. To manage this data volume, they use techniques like downsampling to retain valuable information even when data must be dropped. This involves controlled data loss to maintain a blurry but useful view, ensuring continuous data flow and improving analytics accuracy by adaptive sampling.
summary_zh: Cloudflare的数据管道每秒接收高达7.06亿个事件，自2018年以来增长了100倍。为了管理如此庞大的数据量，他们采用了诸如下采样等技术，即使在必须丢弃数据时也能保留有价值的信息。这涉及到受控的数据丢失，以保持模糊但有用的视图，确保连续的数据流，并通过自适应采样提高分析的准确性。
best_quote_en: Dropping data to retain information
best_quote_zh: 丢弃数据以保留信息

title: Kide – Fast and Lightweight Kubernetes IDE
summary_en: OpenObserve Kide is a lightweight and fast Kubernetes IDE. It can be installed on macOS, Linux, and Windows. Development requires Node.js and Rust. The project uses Vue 3, Tailwind CSS, and Tauri for a native desktop app with hot module replacement and fast performance.
summary_zh: OpenObserve Kide是一个轻量且快速的Kubernetes IDE。它可以安装在macOS、Linux和Windows上。开发需要Node.js和Rust。该项目使用Vue 3、Tailwind CSS和Tauri，构建具有热模块替换和快速性能的原生桌面应用程序。
best_quote_en: OpenObserve Kide is a lightweight and fast Kubernetes IDE.
best_quote_zh: OpenObserve Kide是一个轻量且快速的Kubernetes IDE。

title: Tech on the Toilet: Driving Software Excellence, One Bathroom Break at a Time
summary_en: Tech on the Toilet (TotT) is a weekly one-page publication at Google, delivering software development best practices in bathroom stalls. It started as Testing on the Toilet to promote software testing culture and evolved to cover broader topics. TotT empowers Google employees to learn and drives positive change, influencing internal tool adoption and inspiring similar publications.
summary_zh: Tech on the Toilet (TotT) 是谷歌每周发布的一页出版物，在卫生间提供软件开发最佳实践。它最初是 Testing on the Toilet，旨在推广软件测试文化，后来发展到涵盖更广泛的主题。TotT 帮助谷歌员工学习，推动积极变革，影响内部工具采用，并启发了类似的出版物。
best_quote_en: After all, where better to ponder the mysteries of the code than in a place of quiet contemplation?
best_quote_zh: 毕竟，有什么地方比在安静沉思的地方更能思考代码的奥秘呢？

title: Microsoft Releases AI Call Center Stack with Voice, SMS, and Memory
summary_en: Microsoft releases an AI call center stack with voice, SMS, and memory, leveraging Azure and OpenAI GPT. It features enhanced communication, advanced intelligence with GPT-4.1, customization options, and cloud-native deployment for scalability and cost optimization. A French demo showcases its capabilities including call handling, data storage, and automated tasks.
summary_zh: 微软发布了具有语音、短信和记忆功能的AI呼叫中心堆栈，利用Azure和OpenAI GPT。它具有增强的通信功能、使用GPT-4.1的先进智能、定制选项以及云原生部署，从而实现可扩展性和成本优化。一个法语演示展示了其功能，包括呼叫处理、数据存储和自动化任务。
best_quote_en: Historical conversations and past interactions can also be used to fine-tune the LLM, improving accuracy and personalization over time.
best_quote_zh: 历史对话和过去的互动也可以用来微调LLM，随着时间的推移提高准确性和个性化。

title: Fire Temple of Yazd
summary_en: The Fire Temple of Yazd, also known as Yazd Atash Behram, is a Zoroastrian fire temple in Yazd, Iran, enshrining the Atash Behram, dated to 470 AD. It is one of the nine Atash Behrams and the only one in Iran, where Zoroastrians have practiced their religion since 400 BC. The temple's construction dates to 1934, with funds from Parsi Zoroastrians of India, and houses a sacred fire that has been burning for over 1500 years.
summary_zh: 亚兹德火庙，又称亚兹德阿塔什·贝赫拉姆，是伊朗亚兹德的一座琐罗亚斯德教火庙，供奉着公元470年的阿塔什·贝赫拉姆。它是九座阿塔什·贝赫拉姆之一，也是伊朗境内唯一的一座，自公元前400年以来，琐罗亚斯德教徒一直在那里进行宗教活动。 该庙建于1934年，资金来自印度帕西琐罗亚斯德教徒，庙内有一处已燃烧超过1500年的圣火。
best_quote_en: This sacred fire (also known as Behram Fire) is the longest burning flame in Iran. It was kindled more than 1,500 years ago, it is still burning and it has never died down.
best_quote_zh: 这圣火（也称为贝赫拉姆之火）是伊朗燃烧时间最长的火焰。它于1500多年前点燃，至今仍在燃烧，而且从未熄灭。

To me this seems so much more efficient than the endless swiping and pointless texting.

title: EU Cloud Sovereignty Framework
summary_en: The EU's Cloud Sovereignty Framework assesses cloud services against uniform criteria to reduce dependence on non-European providers. It defines metrics for cloud sovereignty, using the SEAL system to rank providers based on compliance with EU standards. The framework considers strategic, legal, operational, and technological dimensions, impacting the European cloud market and requiring additional documentation from providers.
summary_zh: 欧盟云主权框架根据统一标准评估云服务，以减少对非欧洲供应商的依赖。它定义了云主权的衡量标准，使用SEAL系统根据欧盟标准的合规性对供应商进行排名。该框架考虑战略、法律、运营和技术维度，影响欧洲云市场，并要求供应商提供更多文档。
best_quote_en: The new Cloud Sovereignty Framework is intended to help EU institutions and agencies select cloud services based on uniform sovereignty criteria.
best_quote_zh: 新的云主权框架旨在帮助欧盟机构和机构根据统一的主权标准选择云服务。

title: Why Foundation Models in Pathology Are Failing
summary_en: This paper examines why foundation models (FMs) are failing in pathology despite their success in other domains. It identifies seven causes, including biological complexity, ineffective self-supervision, and insufficient data, arguing that current pathology FMs are misaligned with tissue morphology and require a fundamental rethinking.
summary_zh: 本文探讨了基础模型(FMs)在病理学中失败的原因，尽管它们在其他领域取得了成功。文章指出了七个原因，包括生物复杂性、无效的自监督和数据不足，认为当前病理学FMs与组织形态学不一致，需要从根本上重新思考。
best_quote_en: These findings suggest that current pathology foundation models remain conceptually misaligned with the nature of tissue morphology and call for a fundamental rethinking of the paradigm itself.
best_quote_zh: 这些发现表明，当前病理学的基础模型在概念上仍然与组织形态的本质不一致，需要从根本上重新思考这一范式本身。

title: We used to sleep in two segments and how modern shift changed sense of time
summary_en: The article discusses how segmented sleep, or sleeping in two shifts, was common throughout history before artificial light and the Industrial Revolution shifted us to continuous sleep. This change has affected our perception of time, and brief awakenings are normal. Understanding this, along with calm acceptance of wakefulness, can improve sleep quality.
summary_zh: 文章探讨了分段睡眠（即分两段睡眠）在人造光和工业革命之前很常见的现象。这种转变影响了我们对时间的感知，短暂的觉醒是正常的。理解这一点，以及平静地接受清醒状态，可以提高睡眠质量。
best_quote_en: The brain’s sense of duration is elastic: anxiety, boredom, or low light tend to make time stretch, while engagement and calm can compress it.
best_quote_zh: 大脑对持续时间的感知是可变的：焦虑、无聊或弱光往往会拉长时间，而投入和冷静可以压缩时间。

title: The Principles of Diffusion Models (over 400 pages)
summary_en: This monograph introduces the principles of diffusion models, detailing how they transform data into noise and back. It explores variational, score-based, and flow-based perspectives, unified by a time-dependent velocity field. Topics include controllable generation, efficient solvers, and flow-map models, requiring basic deep-learning knowledge.
summary_zh: 本专著介绍了扩散模型的原理，详细说明了它们如何将数据转换为噪声并再转换回来。它探讨了变分、基于分数和基于流的视角，这些视角由一个随时间变化的速度场统一起来。主题包括可控生成、高效求解器和流图模型，需要基本的深度学习知识。
best_quote_en: Diffusion modeling starts by defining a forward process that gradually corrupts data into noise, linking the data distribution to a simple prior through a continuum of intermediate distributions.
best_quote_zh: 扩散建模首先定义一个前向过程，该过程逐渐将数据破坏为噪声，通过连续的中间分布将数据分布连接到一个简单的先验。

title: AOL Desktop Beta Page
summary_en: AOL Desktop is back in beta with an all-new version. Users are invited to test the software and provide feedback. Recent updates include fixes for spam, mail lists, address book errors, and crashes. AOL also offers help resources and other services.
summary_zh: AOL Desktop以全新的Beta版本回归。邀请用户测试该软件并提供反馈。最近的更新包括修复垃圾邮件、邮件列表、地址簿错误和崩溃等问题。AOL还提供帮助资源和其他服务。
best_quote_en: AOL's premier all-in-one software is back in beta with an ALL NEW version and we want your help to test it.
best_quote_zh: AOL首屈一指的多合一软件以全新的测试版回归，我们需要您的帮助来进行测试。

title: Jupiter's Impact on the Habitable Zone
summary_en: The article discusses Jupiter's role in shaping the protoplanetary disk and its impact on the formation of planetesimals. It explores how Jupiter's gravitational effects created dense bands of planetesimals and influenced the isotopic variation among meteorites, ultimately affecting the formation of terrestrial planets.
summary_zh: 本文探讨了木星在塑造原行星盘中的作用及其对星子形成的影响。 文章探讨了木星的引力效应如何形成密集的星子带，并影响陨石之间的同位素变化，最终影响类地行星的形成。
best_quote_en: "Chondrites are like time capsules from the dawn of the solar system. They have fallen to Earth over billions of years, where scientists collect and study them to unlock clues about our cosmic origins.
best_quote_zh: “球粒陨石就像太阳系诞生之初的时间胶囊。 它们在数十亿年的时间里落到地球上，科学家们收集并研究它们，以解开我们宇宙起源的线索。

title: IBM Cloud is experiencing a quantum computer outage
summary_en: IBM's quantum computer, ibm_aachen, experienced an outage within the Qiskit Runtime service. IBM is working to restore it. Quantum computers are finicky and prone to errors due to factors like temperature changes causing quantum decoherence. Unlike classical computers, a simple restart might not fix the issue.
summary_zh: IBM的量子计算机ibm_aachen在Qiskit Runtime服务中出现故障。IBM正在努力恢复。量子计算机非常不稳定，容易出错，例如温度变化会导致量子退相干。与传统计算机不同，简单的重启可能无法解决问题。
best_quote_en: We’re guessing that turning it off and on again won’t help given qubits can be on and off at the same time
best_quote_zh: 我们猜测，考虑到量子比特可以同时处于开启和关闭状态，重启可能也无济于事。

title: Ask HN: Are employee stock programs in startups inherently unfair?
summary_en: Philz Coffee, once a promising startup, was sold for $145 million, but employees with stock options received nothing due to venture capital's liquidation preferences. The company's decline was accelerated by the pandemic, leading to a down round of funding and ultimately a sale where preferred shareholders were prioritized over common stockholders.
summary_zh: Philz Coffee曾是一家很有前途的初创公司，最终以1.45亿美元的价格出售，但由于风险投资的清算优先权，拥有股票期权的员工一无所获。疫情加速了公司的衰落，导致融资估值下降，最终在出售时优先股股东的利益高于普通股股东。
best_quote_en: Unless the existing investors (preferred shareholders) collectively agree to make a different distribution. That’s very rare.
best_quote_zh: 除非现有投资者（优先股股东）一致同意进行不同的分配方案，但这非常罕见。

title: I've built a wireframe library using Shadcn/UI custom registry feature
summary_en: Wireframe-UI offers wireframe components for direct integration into apps, bypassing Figma. Users can quickly build mockups in their IDE. It can be installed via Shadcn/UI's custom registry feature. The documentation is available on the Wireframe-UI website and licensed under the MIT license.
summary_zh: Wireframe-UI 提供了线框组件，可以直接集成到应用程序中，无需使用 Figma。用户可以在 IDE 中快速构建模型。它可以通过 Shadcn/UI 的自定义注册表功能进行安装。文档可在 Wireframe-UI 网站上找到，并根据 MIT 许可证获得许可。

title: The Secret World of Russia's Cold War Mapmakers (2015)
summary_en: During the Cold War, the Soviet military secretly mapped the entire world with incredible detail. These maps contained information not found on domestic maps, such as road widths and bridge load capacities. After the Soviet Union's collapse, these maps were sold and acquired by governments, libraries, and researchers. John Davies, a retired software developer, has dedicated years to studying these maps, revealing their comprehensive nature.
summary_zh: 冷战期间，苏联军方秘密绘制了全世界的详细地图。这些地图包含国内地图上找不到的信息，例如道路宽度和桥梁承重能力。苏联解体后，这些地图被出售，并被政府、图书馆和研究人员获得。退休软件开发人员John Davies花费数年时间研究这些地图，揭示了它们的全面性。
best_quote_en: Rather, they were a framework for organizing much of what the Soviets knew about the world, almost like a mashup of Google Maps and Wikipedia, built from paper.
best_quote_zh: 不如说，它们是组织苏联人所了解的世界的框架，几乎就像是纸上版的谷歌地图和维基百科的混合体。

title: Universe Is Not a Computer Simulation
summary_en: A team of physicists has mathematically proven that the universe cannot be a computer simulation. Their research shows that reality requires "non-algorithmic understanding," which is beyond computation. This understanding precedes space, time, and even quantum gravity, making a complete and consistent description of reality impossible through computation alone. Thus, the universe cannot be a simulation.
summary_zh: 一个物理学家团队通过数学方法证明了宇宙不可能是计算机模拟。他们的研究表明，现实需要“非算法理解”，这超出了计算能力。这种理解先于空间，时间，甚至量子引力，使得仅通过计算无法对现实进行完整和一致的描述。因此，宇宙不可能是模拟的。
best_quote_en: Any simulation is inherently algorithmic — it must follow programmed rules. But since the fundamental level of reality is based on non-algorithmic understanding, the Universe cannot be, and could never be, a simulation.
best_quote_zh: 任何模拟本质上都是算法式的 —— 它必须遵循预先设定的规则。但由于现实的根本层面是基于非算法理解的，宇宙不可能是，也永远不可能是模拟的。

title: AI blew open software security, now OpenAI wants to fix it with agent Aardvark
summary_en: OpenAI is privately testing Aardvark, an AI agent based on GPT-5, to discover and fix software vulnerabilities. Aardvark scans code repositories, prioritizes bugs, and proposes fixes, using LLM-powered reasoning rather than traditional methods. It has shown effectiveness in internal and external codebases, flagging vulnerabilities and contributing to defensive posture.
summary_zh: OpenAI正在私下测试基于GPT-5的AI代理Aardvark，以发现和修复软件漏洞。Aardvark扫描代码仓库，按严重程度排列错误优先级，并提出修复建议，使用LLM驱动的推理而非传统方法。它已在内部和外部代码库中显示出有效性，标记漏洞并为防御态势做出贡献。
best_quote_en: "Aardvark represents a breakthrough in AI and security research: an autonomous agent that can help developers and security teams discover and fix security vulnerabilities at scale."
best_quote_zh: “Aardvark代表了人工智能和安全研究的一项突破：一种自主代理，可以帮助开发人员和安全团队大规模地发现和修复安全漏洞。”

title: Hard Rust requirements from May onward for all Debian ports
summary_en: Julian Andres Klode plans to introduce hard Rust dependencies into APT by May 2026, including the compiler, standard library, and Sequoia ecosystem. This aims to improve memory safety and unit testing for parsing .deb, .ar, .tar, and HTTP signatures. Ports lacking a Rust toolchain should implement it within 6 months or be discontinued.
summary_zh: Julian Andres Klode计划在2026年5月前在APT中引入强制的Rust依赖，包括Rust编译器、标准库和Sequoia生态系统。目的是提高解析.deb、.ar、.tar和HTTP签名的内存安全性和单元测试。缺乏Rust工具链的移植版本应在6个月内实现，否则将被停止。
best_quote_en: It's important for the project as whole to be able to move forward and rely on modern tools and technologies and not be held back by trying to shoehorn modern software on retro computing devices.
best_quote_zh: 对于整个项目来说，重要的是能够向前发展并依赖现代工具和技术，而不是因试图将现代软件硬塞到复古计算设备上而受到阻碍。

title: Webb-Site Shutdown

The database covers various topics, including HK-listed companies, financial data, regulatory information, and more. The entire database is available for download.
