best_quote_en: Scientia potentia est
best_quote_zh: 知识就是力量

title: Color Comparison Between E Ink's Spectra 6 and ChLCD
summary_en: This article compares E Ink's Spectra 6 and ChLCD color e-paper technologies. Spectra 6 uses four ink particles (red, blue, yellow, white) to create six colors, while ChLCD uses three layers of RGB liquid crystals to reproduce over 16 million colors. ChLCD offers a wider color gamut, finer detail, and faster refresh rates, making it suitable for outdoor applications due to its wider operating temperature range. Spectra 6 excels in yellow saturation, but ChLCD provides more accurate color representation overall.
summary_zh: 本文比较了E Ink的Spectra 6和 ChLCD 彩色电子纸技术。Spectra 6使用四种墨水粒子（红、蓝、黄、白）产生六种颜色，而ChLCD使用三层RGB液晶来重现超过1600万种颜色。ChLCD提供更广的色域、更精细的细节和更快的刷新率，由于其更宽的工作温度范围，更适合户外应用。Spectra 6在黄色饱和度方面表现出色，但ChLCD总体上提供了更准确的色彩表现。
best_quote_en: ChLCD can perfectly reproduce more than 16 million colors, creating a rich color image comparable to LCD.
best_quote_zh: ChLCD可以完美地再现超过1600万种颜色，创造出可与LCD相媲美的丰富彩色图像。

title: Show HN: CLI for writing SYLT synced lyrics to MP3 files
desc:
I was setting up Navidrome on my home lab and discovered its web interface supports synchronized lyrics, but only in a SYLT format which I never heard of. I wanted to display lyrics for my early song demos, so I tried a few existing tools that claimed to write SYLT lyrics. None of them worked.

Turns out SYLT is just a specific ID3 tag type, so I needed to write proper ID3v2 tags. I found the excellent https://github.com/n10v/id3v2 library and built go-sylt on top of it to solve this specific problem. The tool reads from common formats (LRC, SRT, VTT) to make it easy to add synced lyrics.

One limitation: go-sylt only supports ID3v2.3 and ID3v2.4. If you have older ID3 versions, you'll need to convert them first (I use Kid3 for this).

I only discovered this pretty obscure format existed through Navidrome. But if anyone else has run into this issue, I hope this helps. Happy to answer questions!

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=45788551

Points: 1

# Comments: 0
summary_en: GO SYLT is a CLI tool that writes synchronized lyrics to MP3 files in SYLT format, supporting LRC, SRT, and VTT inputs. It creates new files with a "- sylt" suffix. Contributions are welcome, and the project uses Go 1.21 or above. It supports ID3v2.3 and ID3v2.4 tags.
summary_zh: GO SYLT 是一个命令行工具，可以将同步歌词以 SYLT 格式写入 MP3 文件，支持 LRC、SRT 和 VTT 输入。它会创建带有 "- sylt" 后缀的新文件。欢迎贡献，项目使用 Go 1.21 或更高版本，并且支持 ID3v2.3 和 ID3v2.4 标签。
best_quote_en: A pretty convenient CLI tool that reads and writes synced lyrics to MP3 files in SYLT (SYnchronized Lyrics/Text) format.
best_quote_zh: 一个非常方便的命令行工具，可以读取并将同步歌词以 SYLT (同步歌词/文本) 格式写入 MP3 文件。

title: The new hot job in AI: forward-deployed engineers
summary_en: The article discusses the emerging role of 'forward-deployed engineers' in AI. It promotes various subscription options for accessing Financial Times content, including digital and print formats, highlighting features like global news, expert opinions, and premium newsletters.
summary_zh: 文章讨论了人工智能领域新兴的“前沿部署工程师”角色。 它推广了订阅金融时报内容的各种选择，包括数字和印刷版本，突出了全球新闻、专家意见和高级通讯等功能。
best_quote_en: Complete digital access to quality FT journalism on any device.
best_quote_zh: 在任何设备上完全访问高质量的金融时报新闻。

title: VisualDiffer Released Open Source
summary_en: VisualDiffer is a macOS application for visually comparing folders and files, highlighting differences. It helps developers and designers manage versions by identifying changes, filtering files, and synchronizing content. Key features include side-by-side comparison, file-level diff view, powerful filters, drag & drop support, export/automation via CLI, and a fast comparison engine. It's open-source under GPL3 License.
summary_zh: VisualDiffer 是一款 macOS 应用程序，用于可视化比较文件夹和文件，突出显示差异。 它通过识别更改、过滤文件和同步内容，帮助开发人员和设计人员管理版本。关键特性包括并排比较、文件级差异视图、强大的过滤器、拖放支持、通过 CLI 进行导出/自动化以及快速比较引擎。它是根据 GPL3 许可的开源软件。
best_quote_en: VisualDiffer was inspired by the need for a fast, reliable, and elegant folder comparison tool for macOS.
best_quote_zh: VisualDiffer 的灵感来自于对 macOS 上一款快速、可靠且优雅的文件夹比较工具的需求。

title: How long until solid decentralized alternative to Instagram?
desc:
I feel like the world very much needs a decentralized, censorship-free alternative to Instagram. I know about Pixelfed, but it doesn't seem to have gained much traction. Bluesky-based Flashes still doesn't have an Android version. Any thoughts on main blockers and near-to-medium future developments on this matter?

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=45796787

Points: 1

# Comments: 0
summary_en: The author is seeking information on the progress of decentralized, censorship-free alternatives to Instagram. Mentions Pixelfed and Bluesky-based Flashes, noting their limited traction and lack of Android version respectively. Inquires about blockers and future developments.
summary_zh: 作者正在寻找关于去中心化、无审查的Instagram替代品的进展信息。提到了Pixelfed和基于Bluesky的Flashes，指出它们分别缺乏吸引力和Android版本。询问了主要障碍和未来的发展。
best_quote_en: I feel like the world very much needs a decentralized, censorship-free alternative to Instagram.
best_quote_zh: 我觉得世界非常需要一个去中心化、无审查的Instagram替代品。

title: Orcas Repeatedly Attack Young Great White Sharks, Drone Footage Reveals
summary_en: Orcas have been observed repeatedly attacking young great white sharks in a shark nursery, using a technique of flipping them onto their backs to induce paralysis. The orcas primarily target the sharks' livers, rich in nutrients. This behavior may be linked to climate change, pushing shark nurseries into orca hunting grounds, potentially disrupting the ecosystem.
summary_zh: 观察到虎鲸在鲨鱼繁殖区反复攻击幼年大白鲨，采用将其翻转至背部以诱导麻痹的技术。虎鲸主要以富含营养的鲨鱼肝脏为目标。 这种行为可能与气候变化有关，气候变化将幼鲨繁殖区推入虎鲸的狩猎区，可能会破坏生态系统。
best_quote_en: "This behavior is a testament to orcas’ advanced intelligence, strategic thinking, and sophisticated social learning, as the hunting techniques are passed down through generations within their pods."
best_quote_zh: “这种行为证明了逆戟鲸的高度智慧、战略思维和复杂的社会学习能力，因为狩猎技巧在其种群中代代相传。”

title: Show HN: Chess but you make your own starting position
summary_en: Chess39 is a chess variant where players create their own starting position within their half of the board using 39 points worth of pieces. It offers advanced and classic modes, online and offline play, and various time controls. The game emphasizes strategic flexibility and custom setups.
summary_zh: Chess39 是一种国际象棋变体，玩家可以在棋盘的一半区域内，使用总价值 39 点的棋子创建自己的起始位置。它提供高级和经典模式、在线和离线游戏以及各种时间控制。该游戏强调战略灵活性和自定义设置。
best_quote_en: Chess39 is chess where you create your own starting position on your half of the board (4 rows). After setup, normal chess rules apply.
best_quote_zh: Chess39 是一种国际象棋，你可以在棋盘的一半（4 行）上创建自己的起始位置。 设置完成后，适用正常的国际象棋规则。

title: The 1B Token Challenge: Finding the Perfect Pre-Training Mix
summary_en: The article explores efficient pre-training datasets for language models. It finds that a static mix of 50% finePDFs, 30% DCLM-baseline, and 20% FineWeb-Edu outperforms complex curriculum strategies, balancing quality and diversity. The study emphasizes the validation-generalization tradeoff and identifies the optimal recipe for 1B token datasets, enabling GPT-2-70M training with 1/10th of the data.
summary_zh: 本文探讨了用于语言模型的高效预训练数据集。研究发现，50% finePDFs、30% DCLM-baseline 和 20% FineWeb-Edu 的静态混合优于复杂的课程策略，从而平衡了质量和多样性。该研究强调了验证-泛化之间的权衡，并确定了 10 亿 token 数据集的最佳配方，能够以 1/10 的数据训练 GPT-2-70M。
best_quote_en: You can't have both <10 validation PPL AND <500 FineWiki PPL. The sweet spot is accepting 20-30 validation PPL to achieve 300-400 FineWiki PPL.
best_quote_zh: 你不能同时拥有小于10的验证困惑度和小于500的FineWiki困惑度。最佳点是接受20-30的验证困惑度来实现300-400的FineWiki困惑度。

title: Spy gondolas on WWI German zeppelins
summary_en: The provided text appears to be an error message from X Corp (formerly Twitter) indicating that JavaScript is disabled or that privacy extensions are causing issues with the website. It suggests enabling JavaScript or disabling privacy extensions to resolve the problem.
summary_zh: 提供的文本似乎是来自X公司（前身为Twitter）的错误消息，表明JavaScript已禁用或隐私扩展程序导致网站出现问题。 它建议启用JavaScript或禁用隐私扩展程序以解决此问题。
best_quote_en: Something went wrong, but don’t fret — let’s give it another shot.
best_quote_zh: 出了点问题，但别担心——让我们再试一次。

title: Antarctic glacier saw the fastest retreat in history; trouble for sea levels
summary_en: A new study reveals that the Hektoria Glacier in Antarctica shrank by nearly 50% in two months, the fastest retreat ever recorded. This rapid retreat, influenced by climate change and the loss of sea ice, allowed ocean water to reach the glacier. Scientists worry that larger glaciers could undergo similar rapid disintegration, leading to potentially catastrophic sea level rise.
summary_zh: 一项新研究表明，南极洲的赫克托里亚冰川在短短两个月内缩小了近50%，是有记录以来最快的退却速度。 这种由气候变化和海冰损失引起的快速退却，使海水得以到达冰川。 科学家们担心更大的冰川可能会经历类似的快速解体，从而导致潜在的灾难性海平面上升。
best_quote_en: "This is astonishing; the rate of retreat is just crazy."
best_quote_zh: “这太令人震惊了； 这种退却的速度太疯狂了。”

title: Ultra-HD televisions not noticeably better for typical viewer, scientists say
summary_en: Research from the University of Cambridge and Meta suggests that for average-sized living rooms, 4K or 8K screens offer no noticeable benefit over similarly sized 2K screens. The study found that the human eye can resolve more detail than commonly thought, but upgrading to a higher resolution may not always result in a sharper image for typical viewers.
summary_zh: 剑桥大学和Meta的研究表明，对于普通大小的客厅，4K或8K屏幕与同等大小的2K屏幕相比，没有明显的优势。研究发现，人眼可以分辨出比通常认为的更多的细节，但升级到更高的分辨率并不总是能为普通观众带来更清晰的图像。
best_quote_en: "At a certain viewing distance, it doesn’t matter how many pixels you add. It’s just, I suppose, wasteful because your eye can’t really detect it."
best_quote_zh: “在一定的观看距离上，增加多少像素都没有关系。我想，这只是浪费，因为你的眼睛根本无法察觉到。”

title: Ask HN: How to detect Google Play review completion via API?
desc:
Hi all,

We’ve hit a limitation with the Google Play Developer API during automation and wondered if anyone has found a workaround.

Short background: Using the Google Play Developer API, we can upload artifacts and move releases between tracks (internal/alpha/beta/production). However, once a release is submitted for review, there’s no API to read the review status (e.g., “in review,” “approved,” “rejected”), and you cannot remotely trigger the final publish after review completes.

Reference issue: https://issuetracker.google.com/issues/179708468

This is blocking our end-to-end automation: we can push builds and submit for review, but we can’t reliably detect when review finishes or automatically finalize the rollout.

Questions for the community:

Has anyone found a direct API (official or undocumented) that provides review status?

Any reliable workarounds? (examples: polling track/release timestamps, scraping Play Console UI, email/webhook notifications, or manual gates)

If you had to design a robust release pipeline around this limitation, what approach did you take?

Thanks — any pointers, scripts, or experiences would be hugely helpful!

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=45808419

Points: 1

# Comments: 0
summary_en: The author is seeking solutions for detecting Google Play review completion via API. The Google Play Developer API lacks an endpoint to read the review status of submitted releases or trigger the final publish after review. The author asks the community for direct APIs, reliable workarounds, or approaches to design a robust release pipeline around this limitation.
summary_zh: 作者正在寻求通过API检测Google Play审核完成状态的解决方案。Google Play开发者API缺少读取已提交版本的审核状态或在审核完成后触发最终发布的端点。作者向社区寻求直接API、可靠的变通方法或围绕此限制设计稳健发布管道的方法。
best_quote_en: This is blocking our end-to-end automation: we can push builds and submit for review, but we can’t reliably detect when review finishes or automatically finalize the rollout.
best_quote_zh: 这阻碍了我们的端到端自动化：我们可以推送构建并提交审核，但我们无法可靠地检测到审核何时完成或自动完成发布。

title: Sprout by Edera: UEFI Bootloader in Rust
summary_en: Sprout is a programmable UEFI bootloader written in Rust, designed for x86_64 and ARM64 EFI systems. It aims to be flexible, secure, and modern, using a machine-readable configuration for boot information. Sprout supports features like loadable drivers, BLS, chainload, and Secure Boot, and is intended for use in development and production environments.
summary_zh: Sprout 是一个用 Rust 编写的可编程 UEFI 引导加载程序，专为 x86_64 和 ARM64 EFI 系统设计。它的目标是灵活、安全和现代，使用机器可读的配置来实现引导信息。Sprout 支持可加载驱动程序、BLS、链式加载和安全启动等功能，旨在用于开发和生产环境。
best_quote_en: Sprout was designed to take in a machine-readable, writable, and modifiable configuration that treats boot information like data plus configuration, and can be chained from both UEFI firmware and GRUB alike.
best_quote_zh: Sprout 的设计旨在采用机器可读、可写和可修改的配置，将引导信息视为数据加配置，并且可以从 UEFI 固件和 GRUB 进行链式加载。

title: Unofficial Microsoft Teams Client for Linux
summary_en: This is an unofficial Microsoft Teams client for Linux, a native desktop app wrapping the Teams web version. It offers system notifications, tray integration, custom themes, screen sharing, and multiple account support. Installation is available via package repositories or manual download. It's not affiliated with Microsoft and some features are limited.
summary_zh: 这是一个非官方的 Linux 版 Microsoft Teams 客户端，一个封装了 Teams 网页版的原生桌面应用。它提供系统通知、托盘集成、自定义主题、屏幕共享和多账户支持。可以通过包存储库或手动下载进行安装。它不隶属于微软，某些功能受到限制。
best_quote_en: System-level sandboxing provides better isolation than Electron's built-in features while preserving full functionality.
best_quote_zh: 系统级沙箱比Electron的内置功能提供更好的隔离，同时保留完整的功能。

title: 2025 Component Abuse Challenge: A Transistor as a Voltage Reference
summary_en: Ken Yap's component abuse challenge entry uses a transistor's base-emitter junction as a voltage reference in reverse biased breakdown mode. This damages the transistor's function. The voltage observed is consistent within the same transistor type, around 9.5V for NPN and 6.5V for PNP devices.
summary_zh: Ken Yap的组件滥用挑战赛作品将晶体管的基极-发射极结用作反向偏置击穿模式下的电压参考。这会损坏晶体管的功能。在同一类型的晶体管中，观察到的电压是一致的，NPN器件约为9.5V，PNP器件约为6.5V。
best_quote_en: Using one of those cheap grab bags of transistor seconds, he finds that devices of the same type maintain the same voltage.
best_quote_zh: 他发现，使用那些廉价的晶体管次品，同类型的器件保持相同的电压。

title: Awk Technical Notes (2023)
summary_en: This article discusses interesting technical aspects of AWK, including its lack of garbage collection (GC), the implications of using local variables for resource management, autovivification, the unary operator '$', function calling conventions (especially differences between user-defined and built-in functions), and how built-in functions are parsed as part of the language's grammar for flexibility and terseness.
summary_zh: 本文讨论了AWK的一些有趣的技术方面，包括它缺乏垃圾回收（GC），使用局部变量进行资源管理的影响，自动激活，一元运算符'$'，函数调用约定（特别是用户定义函数和内置函数之间的差异），以及内置函数如何被解析为语言语法的一部分，以实现灵活性和简洁性。
best_quote_en: The absense of GC allows to keep the language implementation very simple, thus fast and portable.
best_quote_zh: 没有GC使得语言实现非常简单，因此快速且可移植。

title: China offers tech giants cheap power to boost domestic AI chips
summary_en: China is offering tech giants cheap power to support the development of domestic AI chips. The article promotes subscriptions to the Financial Times, outlining different access levels and benefits.
summary_zh: 中国通过向科技巨头提供廉价电力，以支持国产AI芯片的开发。文章主要推广了金融时报的订阅服务，并详细介绍了不同的订阅级别及其权益。
best_quote_en: Access to eight surprising articles a day, hand-picked by FT editors.
best_quote_zh: 每天可以访问由英国《金融时报》编辑精选的八篇令人惊喜的文章。

title: You are going to get priced out of the best AI coding tools
summary_en: The author argues that the best AI coding tools will become significantly more expensive due to increased demand for more powerful and faster inference. He points to the rising costs of AI coding subscriptions and the potential for even higher prices for top-tier research agents. While competition and hardware improvements might mitigate costs, the author believes the trend towards pricier AI tools is likely to continue.
summary_zh: 作者认为，由于对更强大和更快速推理的需求增加，最佳AI编程工具将变得更加昂贵。他指出AI编程订阅费用不断上涨，以及顶级研究代理可能出现更高的价格。虽然竞争和硬件改进可能会降低成本，但作者认为AI工具价格上涨的趋势可能会持续下去。
best_quote_en: when they can, they do it much cheaper than people!
best_quote_zh: 当它们能做到时，它们就比人类做得便宜得多！

title: New repository engagements page on trendshift.io
summary_en: The author launched a new "Repository Engagements" page on trendshift.io to address the challenges of finding interesting and new open-source projects on GitHub Trending. The page tracks monthly repository activity, allowing users to filter repositories based on creation date and view activity charts to assess popularity and maintenance. Future features include repository grouping/bookmarking, comprehensive search with custom filters, and repository comparison.
summary_zh: 作者在 trendshift.io 上推出了新的“Repository Engagements”页面，旨在解决在 GitHub Trending 上查找有趣和新的开源项目的挑战。该页面跟踪每月存储库活动，允许用户根据创建日期过滤存储库，并查看活动图表以评估受欢迎程度和维护状态。未来的功能包括存储库分组/书签、具有自定义过滤器的全面搜索以及存储库比较。
best_quote_en: Trendshift.io now continuously pulls data from GitHub and stores the monthly activity of tracked repositories.
best_quote_zh: Trendshift.io 现在持续从 GitHub 提取数据，并存储跟踪存储库的每月活动。

title: A Noob's Guide to Kubernetes Monitoring: SigNoz vs. Datadog vs. Grafana
summary_en: This article compares SigNoz, DataDog, and Grafana Cloud for Kubernetes monitoring from a beginner's perspective. It focuses on the ease of setup, initial experience, and usefulness for a simple autoscaling grocery list application. SigNoz is highlighted for its ease of use, DataDog for its comprehensive features, and Grafana for its flexibility.
summary_zh: 本文从初学者的角度比较了SigNoz、DataDog和Grafana Cloud这三个Kubernetes监控平台。重点关注了它们的设置简易程度、初始体验以及对于一个简单的自动缩放购物清单应用程序的实用性。SigNoz因其易用性而受到突出评价，DataDog因其全面的功能而备受赞誉，Grafana则因其灵活性而引人注目。
best_quote_en: You need monitoring. So you start googling.
best_quote_zh: 你需要监控。所以你开始在谷歌上搜索。

title: Actor Programming Language
summary_en: Actor is an object-oriented programming language and environment for Windows, similar to Smalltalk. Developed by The Whitewater Group and later Genesis Development Systems, Actor was among the early Windows applications. Versions like Actor 2 ran under Windows 2, and Actor Professional was available for Windows 3.0 and 3.1.
summary_zh: Actor是一种面向对象的编程语言和Windows环境，类似于Smalltalk。由The Whitewater Group和后来的Genesis Development Systems开发，Actor是最早的Windows应用程序之一。Actor 2等版本在Windows 2下运行，Actor Professional适用于Windows 3.0和3.1。
best_quote_en: Actor, released by The Whitewater Group, Inc. and later Genesis Development Systems, is an object oriented programming language and environment similar to Smalltalk.
best_quote_zh: Actor由The Whitewater Group, Inc.发布，后来由Genesis Development Systems发布，是一种类似于Smalltalk的面向对象的编程语言和环境。

title: How to benchmark performance difference between Windows 11 Home and LTSC
desc:
- I want to test if Windows 11 LTSC operates "smoother" than vanilla Windows 11 Home or Windows 11 Pro as it seems to lack almost all the bloatware applications that come bundled with Windows these days

- How do I measure or benchmark a performance difference between these OSes if it exists

- If this was an HTTP request for example, I could use something like Apache Bench that sends millions of requests and gives me an average number of requests handled per second

- What is the equivalent tool for benchmarking operating systems performance?

- To clarify I am trying to run 2000-2010s games on them as my end goal

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=45844393

Points: 1

# Comments: 0
summary_en: The user wants to benchmark the performance difference between Windows 11 Home/Pro and LTSC, focusing on smoothness and lack of bloatware. They aim to find a tool equivalent to Apache Bench for OS performance, specifically for running older games (2000-2010s).
summary_zh: 用户想要测试 Windows 11 家庭版/专业版与 LTSC 版本之间的性能差异，重点关注流畅度和预装软件的减少。他们希望找到类似于 Apache Bench 的工具来衡量操作系统性能，特别是针对运行较旧的游戏（2000-2010年代）。
best_quote_en: I want to test if Windows 11 LTSC operates "smoother" than vanilla Windows 11 Home or Windows 11 Pro as it seems to lack almost all the bloatware applications that come bundled with Windows these days
best_quote_zh: 我想测试 Windows 11 LTSC 是否比原版 Windows 11 家庭版/专业版运行得“更流畅”，因为它似乎缺少现在 Windows 捆绑的所有预装软件应用程序。

title: Cisco Event Response: Continued Attacks Against Cisco Firewalls
summary_en: Cisco identified ongoing attacks targeting Cisco ASA devices, exploiting vulnerabilities like CVE-2025-20333 and CVE-2025-20362 to implant malware and exfiltrate data. Attackers used zero-day vulnerabilities and advanced evasion techniques. Cisco recommends upgrading to fixed software releases to remediate affected devices and migrating end-of-life devices.
summary_zh: 思科发现持续攻击事件，目标是Cisco ASA设备，利用 CVE-2025-20333 和 CVE-2025-20362等漏洞植入恶意软件和窃取数据。攻击者使用了零日漏洞和高级规避技术。思科建议升级到已修复的软件版本以修复受影响的设备，并迁移已停止服务的设备。
best_quote_en: The complexity and sophistication of this incident required an extensive, multi-disciplinary response across Ciscos engineering and security teams.
best_quote_zh: 此次事件的复杂性和精密度需要思科工程和安全团队进行广泛的、跨学科的响应。

title: Tool to help researchers submit an application in accordance with Art. 40 DSA
summary_en: A web tool has been developed to assist researchers in submitting applications under Art. 40(4) DSA. It guides users through a form, generating necessary declarations and attachments, including risk assessments and technical/organizational measures (TOM) documents. This aims to ease compliance with data security, confidentiality, and personal data protection requirements.
summary_zh: 开发了一个网络工具，以协助研究人员根据Art. 40(4) DSA提交申请。该工具通过表单指导用户，生成必要的声明和附件，包括风险评估和技术/组织措施 (TOM) 文件。旨在简化数据安全、保密和个人数据保护要求的合规性。
best_quote_en: Researchers must demonstrate that they comply with the requirements for data security, confidentiality, and the protection of personal data, and must describe appropriate technical and organizational measures.
best_quote_zh: 研究人员必须证明他们符合数据安全、保密和个人数据保护的要求，并且必须描述适当的技术和组织措施。

title: Solar-powered backpack is helping California's homeless live better
summary_en: The HomeMore Project's Makeshift Traveler is a solar-powered backpack designed to help California's homeless. It provides connectivity, shelter, resources, and assistance. The backpack includes a solar panel, power bank, tent, sleeping bag, FM radio, flashlight, hygiene kit, and informational brochure, offering essential services and support to vulnerable individuals. The latest edition aims to deliver 2,000 units across 25 cities.
summary_zh: HomeMore Project的Makeshift Traveler是一款太阳能背包，旨在帮助加州地区的无家可归者。它提供连接、住所、资源和援助。这款背包包括太阳能板、充电宝、帐篷、睡袋、FM收音机、手电筒、卫生包和信息手册，为弱势群体提供基本服务和支持。最新版本计划在加州25个城市交付2000个。
best_quote_en: It’s a self-sustaining unit that is designed to provide connectivity, shelter, resources, and assistance to the homeless.
best_quote_zh: 这是一个自给自足的单元，旨在为无家可归者提供连接、住所、资源和援助。

title: Google Threat Intel Group AI Threat Tracker:Advances in Threat Actor AI Tool Use
summary_en: Google Threat Intelligence Group (GTIG) reports that threat actors are now deploying AI-enabled malware in operations, dynamically altering behavior. Malware families like PROMPTFLUX and PROMPTSTEAL use LLMs during execution. Actors are also using social engineering to bypass AI safeguards and the cybercrime marketplace for AI tooling is maturing. State-sponsored actors continue to misuse AI to enhance their operations.
summary_zh: 谷歌威胁情报组 (GTIG) 报告称，威胁行为者目前正在部署支持人工智能的恶意软件，且行为具有动态变化。PROMPTFLUX 和 PROMPTSTEAL 等恶意软件家族在执行过程中使用大型语言模型。行为者还利用社会工程来绕过人工智能安全措施，并且人工智能工具的网络犯罪市场正在成熟。国家支持的行为者继续滥用人工智能来加强其行动。
best_quote_en: For the first time, GTIG has identified malware families, such as PROMPTFLUX and PROMPTSTEAL, that use Large Language Models (LLMs) during execution.
best_quote_zh: GTIG 首次发现了在执行过程中使用大型语言模型 (LLM) 的恶意软件家族，例如 PROMPTFLUX 和 PROMPTSTEAL。

title: Web browser add-on that prevents YouTube's automatic translations
summary_en: YouTube No Translation is a browser extension that prevents automatic translations on YouTube, keeping video titles, audio tracks, descriptions, and subtitles in their original language. Users can also use YouTube Data API. It supports Firefox, Chromium, and Safari, and offers a build-it-yourself option from source. Contributions are welcome.
summary_zh: YouTube No Translation是一个浏览器扩展，可以阻止YouTube上的自动翻译，保持视频标题、音轨、描述和字幕使用原始语言。用户还可以使用YouTube Data API。它支持Firefox、Chromium和Safari，并提供从源代码构建的选项，欢迎贡献。
best_quote_en: A web browser extension that keeps your YouTube experience authentic by preventing automatic translations.
best_quote_zh: 一个通过阻止自动翻译来保持您 YouTube 体验原汁原味的网页浏览器扩展。

title: U.S. Export Promotion Executive Order "AI Stack"
summary_en: The executive order aims to promote the export of the American AI technology stack by facilitating the construction of AI-focused data centers in other countries. It addresses concerns about sovereign AI and geopolitical considerations, while also ensuring U.S. dominance in AI services and semiconductor production. The author emphasizes the importance of not overthinking 'the stack'.
summary_zh: 该行政命令旨在通过促进在其他国家建设以人工智能为中心的数据中心，来推广美国人工智能技术栈的出口。它解决对主权人工智能和地缘政治的担忧，同时也确保美国在人工智能服务和半导体生产领域的主导地位。作者强调不要过度解读“技术栈”。
best_quote_en: My key message, however, is simple: do not overthink “the stack.”
best_quote_zh: 然而，我的核心信息很简单：不要过度解读“技术栈”。

title: Congressional Budget Office hacked, China suspected in breach
summary_en: The Congressional Budget Office (CBO) has been hacked, potentially exposing communications with lawmakers. Chinese state-backed hackers are suspected. The CBO provides cost estimates and analysis of legislation. This breach is one of several linked to China that targetted non-public information about US policies amid US-China trade tensions. CBO has taken immediate action.
summary_zh: 美国国会预算办公室（CBO）遭到黑客攻击，可能泄露与立法者的通信。怀疑是中国官方支持的黑客所为。CBO提供立法成本估算和分析。此次泄露是近期与中国有关的多次黑客攻击之一，目标是在中美贸易紧张局势中，美国政策的非公开信息。CBO已立即采取行动。
best_quote_en: Like other government agencies and private sector entities, CBO occasionally faces threats to its network and continually monitors to address those threats.
best_quote_zh: 像其他政府机构和私营部门实体一样，CBO偶尔会面临对其网络的威胁，并持续监控以应对这些威胁。

title: How many options fit into a boolean?
summary_en: The author discusses contributing a one-page article to 'Paged Out!' technical magazine about Rust trivia. The author also shares personal updates, including a move from Central Europe to Seattle to work on AI. They mention various interests and half-finished drafts, emphasizing the importance of not stressing over blogging and allowing ideas to develop naturally.
summary_zh: 作者讨论了为技术杂志'Paged Out!'撰写一篇关于Rust琐事的文章。作者还分享了个人近况，包括从欧洲中部搬到西雅图从事人工智能工作。作者提到了各种兴趣爱好和未完成的草稿，并强调了不要过分强调博客的重要性，让想法自然发展。
best_quote_en: A blog is something you do for yourself, stressing out too much over it is a bad idea.
best_quote_zh: 写博客是你为自己做的事情，为此感到压力太大不是一个好主意。

title: Most DevSecOps Advice Is Useless Without Context–Here's What Works
summary_en: Generic DevSecOps advice often fails due to ignoring context. Prioritize risks, use opinionated defaults, and tailor policies for the environment. Contextual security reduces noise and increases adoption, allowing developers to focus on building, operations to move quickly, and security to trust the baselines. Prioritization and incremental adoption are also vital.
summary_zh: 通用的DevSecOps建议常因忽略上下文而失败。应优先考虑风险，使用预设配置，并定制适合环境的策略。情境化的安全降低干扰并提高采纳率，使开发人员能够专注于构建，运维能够快速行动，安全人员能够信任基线。优先级划分和逐步采纳也至关重要。
best_quote_en: When security measures don’t align with workflow, they turn into obstacles instead of safeguards.
best_quote_zh: 当安全措施与工作流程不一致时，它们就会变成障碍，而不是保障。

title: ADK architecture: When to use sub-agents versus agents as tools
summary_en: The article discusses the architectural decision between using sub-agents and agents as tools in multi-agent AI systems built with the Agent Development Kit (ADK). It explains the key differences in control and context handling, outlining the characteristics and use cases for each. Agents as tools are best for independent, reusable tasks with isolated context, while sub-agents excel in complex, multi-step processes that require shared context and state management.
summary_zh: 本文讨论了在使用 Agent Development Kit (ADK) 构建多智能体人工智能系统时，如何选择子智能体（sub-agent）和将智能体作为工具（agent as tool）的架构决策。文章解释了控制和上下文处理方面的关键差异，概述了每种方法的特征和用例。将智能体作为工具最适合具有隔离上下文的独立、可重用任务，而子智能体则擅长需要共享上下文和状态管理的复杂多步骤流程。
best_quote_en: Choosing the wrong pattern can lead to massive overhead — either by constantly passing full conversational history to a simple function or by under-utilizing the context-sharing capabilities of a more complex system.
best_quote_zh: 选择错误的模式可能会导致巨大的开销——要么不断地将完整的对话历史传递给一个简单的函数，要么未能充分利用更复杂系统的上下文共享能力。

title: What's new in Easel (Nov 2025)
summary_en: Easel introduces multiple cameras for enhanced visual effects like minimaps and split-screen displays. Edition 15 brings breaking changes to support this, allowing multiple cameras via the Camera function. Network optimization eliminates inactive players for improved multiplayer responsiveness. Additional features include camera boundary settings, vignette layering, and more.
summary_zh: Easel引入了多摄像头功能，增强了视觉效果，如迷你地图和分屏显示。第15版带来了一些重大更改以支持此功能，允许通过Camera函数创建多个摄像头。网络优化消除了不活跃玩家，从而提高了多人游戏的响应速度。其他功能包括摄像头边界设置、vignette图层等。
best_quote_en: Easel optimizes this even further by moving the virtual server to the midpoint between only the active players.
best_quote_zh: Easel 通过将虚拟服务器移动到仅活跃玩家的中间点来进一步优化这一点。

title: An open, storage-agnostic, sync engine development kit
summary_en: Synclets is an open-source project aiming to simplify data synchronization in modern app development, especially for rich client and local-first applications. It supports various storage solutions (like PGlite, SQLite) and transport layers (WebSockets) without vendor lock-in. The project is currently in pre-alpha, with ongoing development focusing on expanding connectors, transports, and examples.
summary_zh: Synclets是一个开源项目，旨在简化现代应用程序开发中的数据同步，特别是对于富客户端和本地优先的应用程序。 它支持各种存储解决方案（如PGlite，SQLite）和传输层（WebSockets），而没有供应商锁定。 该项目目前处于pre-alpha阶段，正在进行的开发重点是扩展连接器、传输和示例。
best_quote_en: We believe synchronization is a fundamental part of modern app development, especially in the context of rich client and local-first apps.
best_quote_zh: 我们认为同步是现代应用程序开发的一个基本组成部分，尤其是在富客户端和本地优先应用程序的背景下。

title: IncusOS: Immutable OS solely designed around safely and reliably running Incus
summary_en: IncusOS is an immutable OS designed for safely and reliably running Incus. It features UEFI Secure Boot, full disk encryption, and atomic A/B updates. The system is locked down with API-only management. Ideal for building infrastructure on Incus, it ensures consistent software across servers, simplifying scaling and deployment. It offers advanced storage, network, and management features based on Debian 13.
summary_zh: IncusOS 是一个为安全可靠地运行 Incus 而设计的不可变操作系统。它具有 UEFI 安全启动、全盘加密和原子 A/B 更新等特性。系统被锁定，仅通过 API 进行管理。它非常适合在 Incus 上构建基础设施，并确保所有服务器上的软件一致，从而简化了扩展和部署。它提供了基于 Debian 13 的高级存储、网络和管理功能。
best_quote_en: All IncusOS servers are guaranteed to be running bit for bit the same software, eliminating any deployment variance and making it trivial to scale or re-deploy even large number of servers.
best_quote_zh: 所有 IncusOS 服务器都保证运行完全相同的软件，从而消除了任何部署差异，并使扩展或重新部署大量服务器变得非常简单。

title: Python dependencies states managed via uv(illustrated)
summary_en: The article discusses managing Python dependencies using uv, highlighting different dependency management file types like requirements.txt, uv.lock, and pyproject.toml. It illustrates how uv can handle these files and shows a transition graph for moving between dependency states using uv commands, emphasizing the management of libraries within a virtual environment created by uv venv.
summary_zh: 本文讨论了使用uv管理Python依赖关系，强调了不同的依赖管理文件类型，如requirements.txt、uv.lock和pyproject.toml。它说明了uv如何处理这些文件，并展示了一个转换图，用于使用uv命令在依赖状态之间移动，强调了由uv venv创建的虚拟环境中库的管理。
best_quote_en: With uv, we can handle most of them.
best_quote_zh: 使用uv，我们可以处理它们中的大多数。

title: Hackers, Wizards, and Scientists
summary_en: Moxie Marlinspike compares the real world to the Harry Potter universe, highlighting that in reality, achieving significant results requires more than just knowledge and tools. It involves collaboration, resources, and fitting into a larger system, unlike the individualistic magic in fantasy. While coding once offered a similar 'hacker' freedom, scaling projects now demands coordination, potentially impacting creativity. Finding a balance between individual curiosity and large-scale coordination is essential.
summary_zh: Moxie Marlinspike将现实世界与哈利·波特的世界进行比较，强调在现实中，取得重大成果需要的不仅仅是知识和工具，还需要协作、资源以及融入更大的系统，这与幻想作品中个人主义的魔法不同。虽然编程曾经提供过类似的“黑客”自由，但扩展项目现在需要协调，这可能会影响创造力。在个人好奇心和大规模协调之间找到平衡至关重要。
best_quote_en: In our world if we try to cast a spell we're going to need more than a wand and that is what makes us Muggles
best_quote_zh: 在我们的世界里，如果我们试图施魔法，我们需要的比魔杖更多，这就是我们成为麻瓜的原因。

title: GPG and Me (2015)
summary_en: The author reflects on their changing feelings about GPG encryption. Initially optimistic about its potential for widespread adoption, they now view it as a technology and philosophical dead end. GPG, designed for power and flexibility, has a complex interface and outdated cryptography. Despite its use by journalists and activists, it faces structural problems and isn't the path to ubiquitous end-to-end encryption. The author now hopes to move beyond GPG.
summary_zh: 作者反思了自己对 GPG 加密技术的感受变化。最初对它的广泛应用前景感到乐观，现在认为它在技术和哲学上都走入了死胡同。GPG 的设计追求强大和灵活，但界面复杂且密码学技术过时。尽管记者和活动家在使用它，但它面临着结构性问题，并不是实现普及端到端加密的途径。作者现在希望超越 GPG。
best_quote_en: Increasingly, it’s a club that I don’t want to belong to anymore.
best_quote_zh: 越来越多地，这是一个我已经不想再加入的俱乐部。

title: Leymosun: High-Entropy Statistical Research Toolkit
summary_en: The provided content indicates an issue with JavaScript being disabled in the user's browser, preventing a part of the site from loading. It suggests troubleshooting steps such as checking the connection, disabling ad blockers, or using a different browser.
summary_zh: 提供的内容表明用户的浏览器中禁用了 JavaScript，阻止了网站的一部分加载。 它建议进行故障排除，例如检查连接，禁用广告拦截器或使用其他浏览器。
best_quote_en: A required part of this site couldn’t load. This may be due to a browser extension, network issues, or browser settings.
best_quote_zh: 网站的必需部分无法加载。 这可能是由于浏览器扩展程序，网络问题或浏览器设置所致。

title: Trip November 2025 ISO C++ standards meeting (Kona, USA)
summary_en: The ISO C++ committee made progress on C++26 at its meeting in Kona, focusing on bug fixes and increasing consensus. No new features were added, and trivial relocatability was removed. Contracts were retained with bug fixes. The committee is on track to finalize C++26 at the next meeting in March 2026.
summary_zh: ISO C++ 委员会在美国科纳的会议上在 C++26 的制定上取得了进展，主要集中在修复错误和增加共识。没有添加新功能，并移除了简单重定位。 Contracts 功能被保留，并进行了错误修复。委员会计划在 2026 年 3 月的下次会议上最终确定 C++26。
best_quote_en: Recall: EB is a new C++26 concept that means “well-defined to be Just Wrong”… any code whose behavior is changed from undefined behavior (UB) to EB can no longer result in time travel optimizations or security vulnerabilities.
best_quote_zh: 回顾：EB 是 C++26 中的一个新概念，意思是“明确定义为错误”……任何其行为从未定义行为 (UB) 更改为 EB 的代码将不再导致时间旅行优化或安全漏洞。

title: Show HN: PhantomCollect – Open-Source Web Data Collection Framework in Python
summary_en: PhantomCollect is an open-source Python framework for stealth web data collection. It features precise GPS location tracking, device fingerprinting, and network information gathering. It supports multiple storage backends and real-time terminal display. Intended for educational and security testing, it emphasizes responsible and ethical use.
summary_zh: PhantomCollect是一个开源的Python框架，用于隐秘的网络数据收集。它具有精确的GPS位置跟踪、设备指纹识别和网络信息收集等功能。支持多种存储后端和实时终端显示。专为教育和安全测试而设计，强调负责任和合乎道德的使用。
best_quote_en: Use Responsibly. Secure Ethically.
best_quote_zh: 负责任地使用，合乎道德地保护。

title: Copilot modes you probably didn't know exist
summary_en: This article introduces 'Awesome GitHub Copilot,' a community-driven collection of resources for customizing GitHub Copilot. It offers custom agents, prompts, instructions, and chat modes to enhance Copilot's capabilities across domains. The project includes a MCP server for easy installation and emphasizes productivity, best practices, specialized assistance, and continuous learning. Contributions are welcome.
summary_zh: 本文介绍了“Awesome GitHub Copilot”，一个社区驱动的资源集合，用于自定义 GitHub Copilot。它提供了自定义代理、提示、指令和聊天模式，以增强 Copilot 在各个领域的能力。该项目包括一个 MCP 服务器，便于安装，并强调生产力、最佳实践、专业协助和持续学习。欢迎贡献。
best_quote_en: Pre-built agents, prompts and instructions save time and provide consistent results.
best_quote_zh: 预构建的代理、提示和指令可以节省时间并提供一致的结果。

title: HAProxy Unified Gateway (Beta)
summary_en: HAProxy Unified Gateway (beta) is a free, open-source product for Kubernetes-native application routing, supporting both Gateway API and Ingress. It offers flexible protocol support, role-based access control, and a low-risk migration path from Ingress to Gateway API. Built on HAProxy's open-source innovation, it provides a dependable and scalable solution for cloud-native application delivery.
summary_zh: HAProxy Unified Gateway (beta) 是一款免费的开源产品，专为 Kubernetes 原生应用程序路由而设计，同时支持 Gateway API 和 Ingress。它提供灵活的协议支持、基于角色的访问控制以及从 Ingress 到 Gateway API 的低风险迁移路径。基于 HAProxy 的开源创新，它为 Kubernetes 社区中的云原生应用程序交付提供可靠且可扩展的解决方案。
best_quote_en: HAProxy Unified Gateway is engineered to leverage the modern Gateway API standard immediately, and relieve pressure on organizations with substantial Ingress deployments by providing unified support for both Ingress and Gateway API.
best_quote_zh: HAProxy Unified Gateway 旨在立即利用现代 Gateway API 标准，并通过为 Ingress 和 Gateway API 提供统一支持来减轻拥有大量 Ingress 部署的组织的压力。

title: AI is taking our jobs, and now fine lines too
summary_en: AI is accelerating anti-aging research and beauty tech. Yuva Biosciences' MitoGPT™ discovered Y100™, which speeds up mitochondrial function restoration and improves skin/hair health. Humanoid LABs develops a smart cosmetic system using AR/VR to experiment with looks and apply makeup in both digital and real worlds.
summary_zh: 人工智能正在加速抗衰老研究和美容科技的发展。Yuva Biosciences的MitoGPT™发现了Y100™，它可以加速线粒体功能恢复，并改善皮肤和头发健康。Humanoid LABs开发了一款智能化妆系统，使用AR/VR来试验妆容，并在数字和现实世界中应用化妆。
best_quote_en: AI-driven speed – Y100™ was identified in 4–5 years with MitoGPT™, whereas traditional drug discovery takes 5–10 years from target identification to commercialization.
best_quote_zh: 人工智能驱动的速度——Y100™通过MitoGPT™在4-5年内被发现，而传统的药物发现从目标识别到商业化需要5-10年。

title: Vibe Hacking a Padding Oracle
summary_en: This post analyzes a "Padding Oracle" vulnerability in a web application, specifically the "Encrypted Pastebin" exercise on Hacker101. It discusses how exploiting error messages and stack traces can reveal information about the encryption process and lead to plaintext recovery through repeated probes.
summary_zh: 本文分析了一个Web应用中的"Padding Oracle"漏洞，特别是Hacker101上的"Encrypted Pastebin"练习。它讨论了如何利用错误消息和堆栈跟踪来揭示关于加密过程的信息，并通过重复探测来恢复明文。
best_quote_en: Distinct exception messages + ability to control input bytes (IV/ciphertext) = oracle. Classic CBC padding oracle attacks exploit exactly this: they send modified ciphertexts and observe whether padding was valid. With repeated probes an attacker can recover plaintext.
best_quote_zh: 不同的异常消息 + 控制输入字节的能力(IV/密文) = oracle。 经典的CBC填充 oracle 攻击正是利用了这一点：他们发送修改后的密文，并观察填充是否有效。 通过重复探测，攻击者可以恢复明文。

title: NaNoWriMo and the creative power of looming fear
summary_en: NaNoWriMo, despite its official end, remains an inspiring concept where writers aim to complete a 50,000-word novel in November. The core idea is to embrace quantity over quality, pushing writers beyond their comfort zone to achieve a challenging writing goal, fostering creativity through commitment and public accountability, even if it means facing the 'looming fear of personal humiliation'.
summary_zh: NaNoWriMo （国家小说写作月）的核心在于鼓励写作者在十一月完成50,000字的小说。 即使官方已经停止，其理念仍然具有启发意义：强调数量而非质量，推动写作者突破舒适区，通过承诺和公开责任实现具有挑战性的写作目标，即使这意味着要面对“个人羞辱的隐约恐惧”。
best_quote_en: “It’s really useful to have that sort of looming fear of personal humiliation,” said Baty about the effect of NaNoWriMo on his writing.
best_quote_zh: Baty在谈到NaNoWriMo对他的写作的影响时说：“拥有那种个人羞辱的隐约恐惧真的很有用。”

title: Veggie Burger Nation
summary_en: McDonald's introduced the McVeggie burger in Canada, a vegetable-forward patty unlike faux-meat burgers. It gained popularity, especially among the South Asian diaspora who found it a nostalgic taste of home. This reflects a shift towards vegetarian options, driven by a growing Indian population and a demand for vegetable-forward burgers over meat replicas. A&W also experienced success with their Masala Veggie Burger, catering to customers seeking authentic flavors.
summary_zh: 麦当劳在加拿大推出了 McVeggie 汉堡，这是一种以蔬菜为主的馅饼，不同于人造肉汉堡。它很受欢迎，尤其是在南亚侨民中，他们发现这是一种怀旧的家乡味道。这反映了向素食选择的转变，这主要是由于印度人口的增长以及对以蔬菜为主的汉堡而非肉类复制品的需求。 A&W 的 Masala Veggie 汉堡也取得了成功，迎合了寻求正宗风味的顾客。
best_quote_en: Customers were really more excited about a veggie-forward burger than a meat replica.
best_quote_zh: 顾客们对以蔬菜为主的汉堡比对肉类复制品更感兴趣。

title: Tony Hoare and Negative Space
summary_en: The article discusses "Negative-Space Programming," using assertions to constrain program possibilities. It connects this idea to Tony Hoare's work on logic in programming and Hoare Triples. The author emphasizes designing programs by contract, establishing preconditions and postconditions, and avoiding arbitrary jumps in code to maintain logical integrity.
summary_zh: 文章探讨了“负空间编程”，即使用断言来约束程序的可能性。它将这个想法与 Tony Hoare 在编程逻辑和 Hoare Triples 上的工作联系起来。作者强调通过契约设计程序，建立前提条件和后置条件，并避免代码中的任意跳转，以保持逻辑完整性。
best_quote_en: If the caller of f() makes sure that the precondition for calling the function is true before making the call, then f() guarantees that the postcondition is true after the call returns.
best_quote_zh: 如果 f() 的调用者确保在调用之前满足调用函数的前提条件，那么 f() 保证在调用返回后后置条件为真。

title: Parsing Integers in C
summary_en: The article discusses the drawbacks of using standard C library functions like atoi, atol, and strtol for parsing integers due to their lenient nature and potential for errors. It highlights how the curl project replaced these functions with a custom function, curlx_str_number(), which offers stricter parsing, overflow detection, and better security. All calls to weak functions have been removed from the curl source code as of November 12, 2025.
summary_zh: 本文讨论了使用标准C库函数atoi、atol和strtol解析整数的缺点，因为它们过于宽松且容易出错。文章重点介绍了curl项目如何用自定义函数curlx_str_number()替换了这些函数，该函数提供更严格的解析、溢出检测和更好的安全性。截止到2025年11月12日，所有对弱函数的调用都已从curl源代码中移除。
best_quote_en: I think we in the curl project as well as more or less the entire world has learned through the years that it is usually better to be strict when parsing protocols and data, rather than be lenient and try to accept many things and guess what it otherwise maybe meant.
best_quote_zh: 我认为我们curl项目以及或多或少整个世界多年来已经了解到，在解析协议和数据时，严格总是比宽松更好，而不是试图接受很多东西并猜测它原本可能意味着什么。

title: Fei-Fei Li's Marble: 3D world model for spatially consistent virtual environment
summary_en: Marble AI by Marble World Labs transforms single images into explorable 3D environments. It uses spatial intelligence to create immersive and persistent 3D worlds. Users can upload images, configure environments, generate 3D worlds instantly, and share them. It empowers designers, developers, and architects to visualize spaces and build immersive experiences without 3D modeling expertise.
summary_zh: Marble World Labs 的 Marble AI 可将单张图像转换为可探索的 3D 环境。它使用空间智能来创建沉浸式和持久的 3D 世界。用户可以上传图像、配置环境、立即生成 3D 世界并进行共享。它使设计师、开发人员和建筑师能够可视化空间并构建沉浸式体验，而无需 3D 建模专业知识。
best_quote_en: Marble AI gives creators instant access to spatial world generation powered by Marble World Labs.
best_quote_zh: Marble AI 使创作者能够即时访问由 Marble World Labs 提供支持的空间世界生成功能。

title: Why Are Seattle Drivers Paying More for Gas?
summary_en: The provided text is a compilation of oil price data, energy news headlines, and market updates. It includes information on crude oil prices, gasoline prices, natural gas, and various global blends. The headlines cover a range of topics, including geopolitical events, company news, renewable energy, and sanctions.
summary_zh: 该文本汇编了石油价格数据、能源新闻标题和市场更新。它包含了原油价格、汽油价格、天然气和各种全球混合油的信息。标题涵盖了一系列主题，包括地缘政治事件、公司新闻、可再生能源和制裁。
best_quote_en: N/A
best_quote_zh: N/A

title: Sam Altman and husband fund startup to edit babies' genes
summary_en: Sam Altman and his husband are funding Preventive, a startup aiming to genetically engineer babies to eliminate hereditary diseases. This controversial practice raises ethical concerns and is illegal in many countries. Preventive seeks a location where embryo editing is legal for testing and has raised $30 million. The goal is to correct devastating genetic conditions, potentially marking a significant health breakthrough, but ethical debates persist.
summary_zh: Sam Altman和他的丈夫正在资助一家名为Preventive的初创公司，该公司旨在通过基因工程改造婴儿来消除遗传疾病。这种有争议的做法引起了伦理担忧，并在许多国家/地区都是非法的。Preventive正在寻找胚胎编辑合法的地点进行测试，并已筹集了3000万美元。其目标是纠正破坏性的遗传疾病，可能标志着一项重大的健康突破，但伦理辩论依然存在。
best_quote_en: More than 300 million people globally live with genetic disease. Foundational research should be done to determine if safe and effective therapies can be developed to cure these diseases at birth.
best_quote_zh: 全球有超过3亿人患有遗传疾病。应该进行基础研究，以确定是否可以开发出安全有效的疗法，在出生时治愈这些疾病。

title: Peekpoke: Tiny retro fantasy console with two commands peek and poke
summary_en: PEEKPOKE is a tiny retro fantasy console with only two commands: peek and poke. Games can be written in simple JavaScript and run in the browser. It allows drawing pixels or text by writing to memory addresses and getting key input status by reading from addresses. Sample code snippets are provided for drawing, setting colors, and checking keystrokes.
summary_zh: PEEKPOKE是一个微型的复古幻想控制台，只有两个命令：peek和poke。 游戏可以用简单的JavaScript编写并在浏览器中运行。 它允许通过写入内存地址来绘制像素或文本，并通过从地址读取来获取按键输入状态。 提供了用于绘图、设置颜色和检查按键操作的示例代码片段。
best_quote_en: You can draw pixels or text by writing a number to a specific address in memory (poke), or get the input status of a key by reading a number from the address (peek).
best_quote_zh: 你可以通过向内存中的特定地址写入数字（poke）来绘制像素或文本，或者通过从地址读取数字来获取按键的输入状态（peek）。

title: Caitriona Jennings smashes 100-mile world record
summary_en: Caitriona Jennings broke the world record in the 100-mile distance at the Tunnel Hill 100 Mile in Illinois, with a time of 12:37:04. This surpasses the previous record set by Camille Herron in 2017. Jennings has an accomplished history in ultra-distance events and is also the Irish record holder in 50k and 100k.
summary_zh: Caitriona Jennings在伊利诺伊州的Tunnel Hill 100英里比赛中打破了100英里距离的世界纪录，成绩为12:37:04，超过了Camille Herron在2017年创下的纪录。 Jennings在超长距离赛事中有着辉煌的成绩，同时也是爱尔兰50公里和100公里纪录的保持者。
best_quote_en: Impressively, she paced herself perfectly for most of the 100-mile race, ticking off each mile in seven minutes and 26 seconds.
best_quote_zh: 令人印象深刻的是，她在100英里的比赛中大部分时间都完美地控制了自己的节奏，每英里用时7分26秒。

title: Spec-Driven Development: The Waterfall Strikes Back
summary_en: Spec-Driven Development (SDD) aims to structure AI-driven programming with heavy documentation. It echoes the Waterfall model, but its excessive Markdown files and potential bureaucratic overhead may hinder agility. While SDD can help agents stay on task, it risks increasing development costs due to context blindness, systematic bureaucracy and double code review.
summary_zh: 规范驱动开发（SDD）旨在通过大量的文档来构建AI驱动的编程。它呼应了瀑布模型，但其过多的Markdown文件和潜在的官僚开销可能会阻碍敏捷性。虽然SDD可以帮助代理保持任务状态，但由于环境盲点，系统官僚主义和双重代码审查，它可能会增加开发成本。
best_quote_en: Software development is fundamentally a non-deterministic process, so planning doesn’t eliminate uncertainty.
best_quote_zh: 软件开发从根本上说是一个非确定性的过程，因此计划并不能消除不确定性。

title: Messing with Scraper Bots
summary_en: The author describes methods to combat malicious web scrapers by feeding them generated junk data, initially using a Markov chain to create fake PHP files. Facing performance issues with dynamic generation, they switched to serving static content, like paragraphs from Frankenstein. This approach is more efficient and aims to waste the bots' resources and time.
summary_zh: 作者描述了通过向恶意网络爬虫提供生成的垃圾数据来对抗它们的方法，最初使用马尔可夫链创建虚假的 PHP 文件。由于动态生成带来的性能问题，作者转而提供静态内容，例如《弗兰肯斯坦》中的段落。这种方法更有效，旨在浪费爬虫的资源和时间。
best_quote_en: Garbage for the garbage
best_quote_zh: 给垃圾以垃圾

title: RDP Port 3389: The Backbone of Remote Desktop Connections
desc:
RDP Port 3389 is the default port behind Microsoft’s Remote Desktop Protocol, allowing users to access and control Windows systems from anywhere. This guide explains how Port 3389 works, why it’s essential for remote access, and the steps you can take to secure it against common threats like brute-force attacks. It also covers configuration, best practices, troubleshooting tips, and safe ways to manage RDP in 2025.

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=45935724

Points: 1

# Comments: 0
summary_en: RDP Port 3389 is the default port for Microsoft's Remote Desktop Protocol, enabling remote access and control of Windows systems. The text explains its function, importance for remote access, and security measures against threats like brute-force attacks. It also covers configuration, best practices, troubleshooting, and safe management of RDP in 2025.
summary_zh: RDP端口3389是微软远程桌面协议的默认端口，允许远程访问和控制Windows系统。文章解释了它的功能、远程访问的重要性，以及防范暴力破解等威胁的安全措施。还涵盖了配置、最佳实践、故障排除以及2025年RDP的安全管理。
best_quote_en: RDP Port 3389 is the default port behind Microsoft’s Remote Desktop Protocol, allowing users to access and control Windows systems from anywhere.
best_quote_zh: RDP端口3389是微软远程桌面协议的默认端口，允许用户从任何地方访问和控制Windows系统。

title: Oh Yeah? Forecasting Follies Around the 1929 Crash (1931/2018)
summary_en: This article discusses the overconfidence and flawed predictions made by financial experts, business leaders, and politicians leading up to the 1929 stock market crash.  They believed a new economic era had arrived, dismissing market cycles and anticipating continued prosperity, ultimately failing to foresee the impending crisis.
summary_zh: 本文讨论了1929年股市崩盘前，金融专家、商业领袖和政治家们表现出的过度自信和错误预测。他们认为一个新的经济时代已经到来，忽视了市场周期，并预期持续繁荣，最终未能预见到即将到来的危机。
best_quote_en: Stock prices have reached what looks like a permanently high plateau.
best_quote_zh: 股价已经达到了看起来像是永久性高位的水平。

title: $1900 Bug Bounty to Fix the Lenovo Legion Pro 7 16IAX10H's Speakers on Linux
summary_en: A bug bounty of $1900 is offered to fix the Lenovo Legion Pro 7 16IAX10H's internal speaker issue on Linux. The laptop's Realtek ALC3306 codec is incorrectly detected, leading to low volume and muffled sound. The solution involves a custom SOF topology file and a DMI/ACPI quirk to properly configure the audio pipeline with I2C smart amplifiers.
summary_zh: 为修复联想拯救者Pro 7 16IAX10H在Linux上的扬声器问题，悬赏1900美元。该笔记本电脑的Realtek ALC3306编解码器被错误检测，导致音量低和声音沉闷。解决方案包括自定义SOF拓扑文件和DMI/ACPI quirk，以正确配置包含I2C智能放大器的音频管道。
best_quote_en: If you help us make sure that Linux has support for audio on our laptops, we will send you a lot of money.
best_quote_zh: 如果你能帮助我们在Linux上为我们的笔记本电脑提供音频支持，我们将给你很多钱。

title: I know you don't want them to want AI, but
summary_en: The article discusses the complex feelings surrounding AI, particularly within the Mozilla community and beyond. While many express concerns about Big AI's harms, millions of people are actively using AI tools. The author draws a parallel to the early browser wars, suggesting Firefox could improve AI user safety, even for those who dislike AI.
summary_zh: 文章讨论了围绕人工智能的复杂情感，尤其是在Mozilla社区内外。虽然许多人对大型人工智能的危害表示担忧，但数百万人正在积极使用人工智能工具。作者将此与早期浏览器之战进行了比较，建议Firefox可以提高人工智能用户的安全性，即使对于那些不喜欢人工智能的人。
best_quote_en: Regular, non-expert internet users find it interesting, or even amusing, to generate images or videos using AI and to send that media to their friends.
best_quote_zh: 普通的、非专业的互联网用户发现，使用人工智能生成图像或视频，并将这些媒体发送给他们的朋友，是一件有趣甚至令人愉快的事情。

title: Ask HN: A frictionless security engine for all platforms?
summary_en: The post is a question on Hacker News asking about a frictionless security engine for all platforms. It was posted by gokulnair2001. The post contains links to guidelines, FAQ, lists, API, security, legal, applying to YC, contact, and search.
summary_zh: 这篇文章是在Hacker News上提出的一个问题，询问是否有适用于所有平台的无摩擦安全引擎。由gokulnair2001发布。帖子包含指向指南，常见问题解答，列表，API，安全性，法律，申请YC，联系方式和搜索的链接。
best_quote_en: Ask HN: A frictionless security engine for all platforms?
best_quote_zh: 询问HN: 一个适用于所有平台的无摩擦安全引擎？

desc:
Untuk reschedule,Anda dapat menghubungi layanan pelanggan Agoda telepon atau WhatsApp di (0811-506-050).

best_quote_en: Untuk reschedule,Anda dapat menghubungi layanan pelanggan Agoda telepon atau WhatsApp di (0811-506-050).
best_quote_zh: 要改期，您可以拨打Agoda客服电话或WhatsApp：(0811-506-050) 联系。

summary_zh: 本文提到了Agoda的24小时客户服务，特别强调了他们的呼叫中心号码(0811-506-050)，用于退款和重新安排。文章也展示了Hacker News网站的布局。

best_quote_zh: 24小时客户支持服务，用于退款和重新安排。

title: Show HN: WyseOS – An AgentOS for Web Automation
desc:
Hi everyone, we're building WyseOS — an AgentOS designed for autonomous web automation. This article provides a deeper look at how it works, why we built it, and what's next.

We’d love feedback from the community. The beta is now live: if you’re interested in trying it, DM us on X at @WyseOS_com.

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=45951624

Points: 1

# Comments: 0
summary_en: WyseOS is an AgentOS designed for web automation with a multi-agent orchestration framework. It features intelligent task decomposition, high-performance action model, and continuous learning. It supports various scenarios like analysis, marketing, and process assistance, accessible through web, plugin, and API. The platform provides user and session management, agent framework, and integrates LLMs and external APIs.
summary_zh: WyseOS是一个为Web自动化设计的AgentOS，具有多智能体编排框架。它具有智能任务分解、高性能动作模型和持续学习的特点。它支持分析、营销和流程辅助等多种场景，可通过Web、插件和API访问。该平台提供用户和会话管理、代理框架，并集成了LLM和外部API。
best_quote_en: The core advantage of WyseOS lies in its advanced multi-agent orchestration framework.
best_quote_zh: WyseOS 的核心优势在于其先进的多智能体编排框架。

title: Background job manager for AI Coding Agents
summary_en: Gob is a lightweight CLI tool designed for managing background processes, especially useful for AI coding agents. It allows users to start commands as detached processes, monitor their status and output, and simplifies the management of long-running tasks like servers. It supports Linux and macOS.
summary_zh: Gob是一个轻量级的命令行工具，用于管理后台进程，特别适用于AI编码代理。它允许用户启动作为分离进程的命令，监视它们的状态和输出，并简化对服务器等长时间运行任务的管理。它支持Linux和macOS。
best_quote_en: Run commands that persist independently of the CLI.
best_quote_zh: 运行独立于CLI持续存在的命令。

title: Authors dumped from New Zealand's top book prize after AI used in cover designs
summary_en: Two New Zealand authors, Stephanie Johnson and Elizabeth Smither, were disqualified from the 2026 Ockham Book Awards because AI was used in their book cover designs. The publisher and authors expressed disappointment, emphasizing the minimal role authors have in cover design and the focus on the book's content. The awards trust defends its stance, citing a need to protect creative and copyright interests.
summary_zh: 新西兰作家斯蒂芬妮·约翰逊和伊丽莎白·史密瑟因其书籍封面设计使用了人工智能而被取消了2026年奥克姆图书奖的资格。出版商和作者对这一决定表示失望，强调作者在封面设计中的作用很小，重点应放在书籍的内容上。奖项信托会为自己的立场辩护，认为有必要保护创意和版权利益。
best_quote_en: “Instead of talking about my book … and what the inspiration was, we are talking about bloody AI, which I hate.”
best_quote_zh: “我们现在没有在讨论我的书和创作灵感，却在讨论我讨厌的人工智能。”

title: How to disable Cloudflare proxying when you can't access the dashboard
summary_en: The article describes how to disable Cloudflare proxying when the dashboard is inaccessible during an outage. It guides users to obtain an API token in advance, list zone IDs and DNS records using the API, and then patch the relevant record to disable or re-enable proxying. It emphasizes the importance of having an API key and understanding the caveats of disabling Cloudflare's protection.
summary_zh: 本文介绍了在Cloudflare面板不可用时，如何禁用Cloudflare代理。文章指导用户提前获取API令牌，使用API列出区域ID和DNS记录，然后修改相关记录以禁用或重新启用代理。文章强调了拥有API密钥的重要性，并说明了禁用Cloudflare保护的注意事项。
best_quote_en: The most frustrating thing about this situation was that in theory all I had to do was change one flag in my DNS settings—the flag that told CloudFlare to proxy my domain—and everything would work perfectly!
best_quote_zh: 最令人沮丧的是，理论上我所要做的就是在我的DNS设置中更改一个标志，即告诉CloudFlare代理我的域名的标志，一切都会完美运行！

title: A free AI tool to generate custom reviews (any tone/length) in seconds
summary_en: This AI tool generates custom reviews in various tones and lengths instantly. Users input a topic, select a tone (e.g., professional, casual), and choose a length (100-500 words). The AI then creates a natural, detailed review that can be copied and edited. Basic use is free and doesn't require sign-up.
summary_zh: 这款AI工具可以立即生成各种语气和长度的自定义评论。用户输入主题，选择语气（例如，专业、随意），并选择长度（100-500字）。然后，AI会创建自然且详细的评论，可以复制和编辑。基本使用是免费的，无需注册。
best_quote_en: Advanced AI technology creates natural, engaging reviews in seconds.
best_quote_zh: 先进的AI技术可以在几秒钟内创建自然且引人入胜的评论。

title: Pipedream to Be Acquired by Workday
summary_en: Pipedream has entered into a definitive agreement to be acquired by Workday. This acquisition aims to accelerate Pipedream's mission of enabling customers to build powerful and connected AI agents by combining their AI agent-building products and connectors with Workday's enterprise customer base. The Pipedream team will join Workday after the acquisition, continuing to operate independently until the closing.
summary_zh: Pipedream已达成最终协议，将被Workday收购。此次收购旨在通过结合Pipedream的AI Agent构建产品和连接器与Workday的企业客户群，加速Pipedream实现其帮助客户构建强大且互联的AI Agent的使命。收购完成后，Pipedream团队将加入Workday，在完成收购前将继续独立运营。
best_quote_en: Our mission to enable customers to build powerful and connected AI agents will accelerate as we bring together our AI agent-building products and 3,000+ connectors with Workday’s leading enterprise customer base and 75+ million end users under contract.
best_quote_zh: 通过将我们的AI Agent构建产品和3000多个连接器与Workday领先的企业客户群以及合同下的7500多万终端用户结合起来，我们将加速我们帮助客户构建强大且互联的AI Agent的使命。

title: How Uber is reducing manual logins by 4M per year
summary_en: Uber implemented the Restore Credentials API, reducing manual logins by 4 million annually. This API streamlines account transfers between devices by silently moving a unique token during the standard onboarding process, leveraging Android's native backup and restore mechanism. Users experience a seamless transition, especially beneficial for infrequent Uber app users.
summary_zh: Uber实施了 Restore Credentials API，每年减少400万次手动登录。该API通过在标准引导过程中静默移动唯一令牌，简化了设备之间的帐户转移，利用了Android的原生备份和恢复机制。用户可以体验到无缝过渡，对于不经常使用Uber应用程序的用户尤其有益。
best_quote_en: Some users don’t use the Uber app on a daily basis, but they expect it will just work when they need it.
best_quote_zh: 有些用户并不每天都使用Uber应用程序，但他们希望在需要时它能正常工作。

title: Nano Prompt UI – Local-Only Gemini Nano Side Panel for Chrome
summary_en: Nano Prompt UI is a Chrome extension that uses Gemini Nano to provide on-device AI assistance in a side panel. It offers features like summarizing articles, persistent sessions, and multimodal support while ensuring privacy. Users can customize the AI's persona and fine-tune its creativity.
summary_zh: Nano Prompt UI是一款Chrome扩展，它使用Gemini Nano在侧边栏中提供设备上的AI助手。它提供文章总结、持久会话和多模态支持等功能，同时确保隐私。用户可以自定义AI的角色并微调其创造力。
best_quote_en: Runs on the window.ai (Prompt API) built into Chrome. No data leaves your device.
best_quote_zh: 运行在Chrome内置的window.ai (Prompt API)上。没有数据离开您的设备。

title: Show HN: Build A2A Compatible AI Agents with Rust
summary_en: Radkit is a Rust SDK designed for building reliable AI agent systems with A2A protocol support. It prioritizes developer control over agent behavior, execution flow, and context management, offering a unified LLM interface and features like automatic tool calling, structured outputs, and type safety.
summary_zh: Radkit 是一个 Rust SDK，旨在构建具有 A2A 协议支持的可靠 AI 代理系统。它优先考虑开发者对代理行为、执行流程和上下文管理的控制，提供统一的 LLM 接口，并具有自动工具调用、结构化输出和类型安全等功能。
best_quote_en: Radkit prioritizes developer experience and control above all else.
best_quote_zh: Radkit 将开发者体验和控制置于首位。

title: Gemini 3 is almost as good as Google says it is
summary_en: Gemini 3 shows promise with its upgraded features like code generation and interactive visualizations. However, its output quality and detail sometimes fall short of Google's demos. Features like the visual layout for travel planning and Gemini Agent for task automation are promising, but the AI model delivers reasonably well with caveats.
summary_zh: Gemini 3 在代码生成和交互式可视化等升级功能方面表现出前景。但是，其输出质量和细节有时不如谷歌的演示。诸如旅游计划的可视化布局和用于任务自动化的 Gemini Agent 等功能很有前景，但该 AI 模型在某种程度上能良好地满足需求。
best_quote_en: Gemini 3 delivers reasonably well — with caveats.
best_quote_zh: Gemini 3 在某种程度上能良好地满足需求。

title: Solving Fizz Buzz with Cosines
summary_en: This article explores solving the Fizz Buzz problem using trigonometric functions, specifically cosines. It defines symbol functions and indicator functions to create a closed-form expression for the Fizz Buzz sequence. The article demonstrates how to represent the Fizz Buzz logic with a finite Fourier series and simplifies the code using mathematical concepts.
summary_zh: 本文探讨了使用三角函数，特别是余弦函数来解决 Fizz Buzz 问题。它定义了符号函数和指示函数，为Fizz Buzz序列创建了一个闭式表达式。文章展示了如何用有限傅里叶级数来表示Fizz Buzz逻辑，并使用数学概念简化了代码。
best_quote_en: Can we make the program more complicated? Perhaps we can use trigonometric functions to encode all four cases in a single closed-form expression.
best_quote_zh: 我们能否让程序更复杂？或许我们可以使用三角函数将所有四种情况编码到一个闭式表达式中。

title: Enshittification of Arduino Begins? Qualcomm Starts Clamping Down
summary_en: Qualcomm's acquisition of Arduino raises concerns as new Terms of Service and Privacy Policy introduce sweeping user-license provisions, broaden data collection (particularly around AI usage), and embed long-term account data retention, integrating user information into Qualcomm’s broader data ecosystem. Adafruit and the community are scrutinizing these changes, fearing a departure from Arduino's founding principles of openness.
summary_zh: 高通收购Arduino引发担忧，新的服务条款和隐私政策引入了广泛的用户许可条款，扩大了数据收集（特别是关于AI使用），并嵌入了长期账户数据保留，将用户信息整合到高通更广泛的数据生态系统中。Adafruit和社区正在密切关注这些变化，担心这会背离Arduino最初的开放性原则。
best_quote_en: The terms further state that users are not allowed to reverse engineer or attempt to understand how the platform works unless Arduino gives permission.
best_quote_zh: 条款进一步规定，除非Arduino给予许可，否则用户不得对平台进行逆向工程或试图理解其工作原理。

title: Cara berbicara dengan AirAsia Indonesia
desc:
Anda bisa berbicara dengan AirAsia melalui WhatsApp di nomor +62 855 9091 116 atau menghubungi layanan obrolan virtual (AskBo) melalui situs web resmi atau aplikasi AirAsia MOVE.

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46012982

Points: 1

# Comments: 4
summary_en: This article explains how to contact AirAsia Indonesia. You can reach them via WhatsApp at +62 855 9091 116 or through the virtual chat service (AskBo) on their official website or AirAsia MOVE app.
summary_zh: 本文介绍了如何联系印尼亚洲航空（AirAsia Indonesia）。您可以通过WhatsApp（+62 855 9091 116）或通过官方网站或AirAsia MOVE应用程序上的虚拟聊天服务（AskBo）与他们联系。
best_quote_en: Anda bisa berbicara dengan AirAsia melalui WhatsApp di nomor +62 855 9091 116 atau menghubungi layanan obrolan virtual (AskBo) melalui situs web resmi atau aplikasi AirAsia MOVE.
best_quote_zh: 您可以通过WhatsApp（+62 855 9091 116）与印尼亚洲航空联系或者通过官方网站或AirAsia MOVE应用程序上的虚拟聊天服务（AskBo）与他们联系。

title: Can you take an ox to Oxford?
summary_en: This article humorously explores whether an ox-drawn cart is subject to Oxford's congestion charge. By examining UK legislation, the author concludes that because an ox is not a "motor vehicle" as it is not mechanically propelled, it is exempt from the charge. The piece also touches on the accessibility of UK legislation and its importance for transparency.
summary_zh: 本文以幽默的方式探讨了牛车是否需要缴纳牛津的拥堵费。通过研究英国的法律，作者得出结论，由于牛不是“机动车辆”，因为它不是机械驱动的，因此可以免除此费用。文章还提到了英国法律的可访问性及其对透明度的重要性。
best_quote_en: Being able to check the law directly, even for extremely silly questions, helps keep the whole system honest.
best_quote_zh: 即使是对于极其愚蠢的问题，能够直接查阅法律，也有助于保持整个系统的公正。

title: Surprisingly, Emacs on Android is pretty good
summary_en: This article discusses using Emacs on Android, highlighting the surprisingly positive experience. It covers installation options, including using Termux for access to CLI tools. The author emphasizes configuring Emacs for Android, referencing the Emacs manual's Android section and recommending specific configurations for touchscreens and virtual keyboards. Despite some limitations, Emacs on Android offers a viable mobile editing solution.
summary_zh: 本文探讨了在安卓系统上使用Emacs的体验，强调了出人意料的积极性。文章涵盖了安装选项，包括使用Termux来访问CLI工具。作者强调了为安卓配置Emacs，参考了Emacs手册中的安卓部分，并推荐了针对触摸屏和虚拟键盘的特定配置。尽管存在一些限制，Emacs在安卓上提供了一个可行的移动编辑解决方案。
best_quote_en: Moments like these are truly a testament to Emacs' dedication to an accessible editor.
best_quote_zh: 这样的时刻真正证明了Emacs致力于成为一个易于访问的编辑器。

title: Data breach in Iberia: 77GB of internal documents end up on the dark web
summary_en: Iberia suffered a data breach with 77GB of internal documents leaked on the dark web. While customer data isn't confirmed compromised, operational and strategic information exposure can lead to sophisticated attacks and reputational damage. Experts recommend continuous dark web monitoring, network segmentation, security audits, employee training, and incident response plans to mitigate such risks.
summary_zh: 伊比利亚航空遭遇数据泄露，77GB内部文件在暗网泄露。虽然客户数据未确认泄露，但运营和战略信息的暴露可能导致复杂的攻击和声誉损害。专家建议持续监控暗网、进行网络分段、安全审计、员工培训和制定事件响应计划，以减轻此类风险。
best_quote_en: Prevention and early visibility are essential to prevent an internal leak from becoming a bigger problem.
best_quote_zh: 预防和早期发现对于防止内部泄露演变成更大的问题至关重要。

title: Cloudflare: Piracy Liability Ruling Has Global Implications; Publishers Disagree
summary_en: A Tokyo court ruled Cloudflare liable for manga piracy, a decision Cloudflare says has global implications. The lawsuit, filed by manga publishers, claims Cloudflare enabled piracy by providing services to pirate sites. Cloudflare argues the ruling undermines fairness, while publishers disagree, stating it aligns with Cloudflare's anti-piracy pledge. Cloudflare plans to appeal, warning of the ruling's impact on the global internet and tech innovation in Japan.
summary_zh: 东京一家法院裁定Cloudflare对漫画盗版负有责任，Cloudflare表示该判决具有全球影响。漫画出版商提起的诉讼称，Cloudflare通过向盗版网站提供服务从而助长了盗版行为。Cloudflare认为该判决损害了公平性，而出版商则表示反对，认为这符合Cloudflare打击盗版的承诺。Cloudflare计划上诉，并警告该裁决将对全球互联网和日本的科技创新产生影响。
best_quote_en: Holding CDNs like Cloudflare legally liable for content they do not host removes the limitations on liability that have underpinned the growth of the global internet.
best_quote_zh: 像Cloudflare这样的CDN对其未托管的内容承担法律责任，这将消除支撑全球互联网增长的责任限制。

title: Solar Superstorm Gannon crushed Earth's plasmasphere to a record low
summary_en: A solar superstorm compressed Earth's plasmasphere to a record low, revealing its collapse and slow recovery mechanisms. The Arase satellite captured this rare event, showing the plasmasphere shrinking to one-fifth of its size and taking over four days to rebuild. A 'negative storm' in the ionosphere further slowed recovery, impacting GPS and satellite operations.
summary_zh: 一次太阳超级风暴将地球的等离子体层压缩至历史最低水平，揭示了其崩溃和缓慢恢复的机制。 Arase卫星捕捉到了这一罕见事件，显示等离子体层缩小到其五分之一，并花费了超过四天的时间重建。 离子层中的“负风暴”进一步减缓了恢复，影响了GPS和卫星运行。
best_quote_en: "We found that the storm first caused intense heating near the poles, but later this led to a big drop in charged particles across the ionosphere, which slowed recovery.
best_quote_zh: “我们发现，最初风暴在两极附近引起强烈的加热，但后来这导致整个电离层带电粒子的急剧下降，从而减缓了恢复。

title: A tiny fantasy console inspired by early 90s handheld consoles
summary_en: BEEP-8 is a virtual retro game console designed for developing C/C++ applications, emulating an ARM v4 CPU. It supports multiple platforms, including web browsers, Windows, macOS, and Linux. Developers can access hardware directly or use a PICO-8-like library. Games can be shared instantly via the official portal without App Store review. The SDK is free and provides a retro gaming experience with modern touch interaction.
summary_zh: BEEP-8是一个虚拟复古游戏机，设计用于开发C/C++应用程序，模拟ARM v4 CPU。它支持多种平台，包括网页浏览器、Windows、macOS和Linux。 开发者可以直接访问硬件，或者使用类似PICO-8的库。 游戏可以通过官方网站即时分享，无需经过App Store审核。SDK免费，提供具有现代触摸交互的复古游戏体验。
best_quote_en: Even on iPhones, you can freely upload and share your self-made BEEP-8 apps with users around the world without going through Apple’s App Store review process, since the platform is entirely web-based.
best_quote_zh: 即使在iPhone上，您也可以自由地上传和分享您自己制作的BEEP-8应用程序，而无需经过Apple的App Store审核，因为该平台完全基于Web。

title: What is the most cramped memory card you own?
summary_en: The Small Capacity Memory Card Championship (Japan) saw a 0.5MB SmartMedia card win. Entries like the 1.44MB Flash FDD and 2KB Casio RAM card didn't qualify. The competition highlighted various tiny storage formats, with some disqualified for not being general-purpose flash memory cards. A 2KB Casio Pokecon RAM card and a pre-standard 1MB PCMCIA card were notable rejects.
summary_zh: 日本举办的小容量存储卡锦标赛中，一张0.5MB的SmartMedia卡获胜。1.44MB的Flash FDD和2KB的Casio RAM卡等参赛作品未入选。比赛展示了各种微型存储格式，其中一些因不是通用闪存卡而被取消资格。2KB的Casio Pokecon RAM卡和pre-standard 1MB的PCMCIA卡是值得注意的未入选案例。
best_quote_en: Probably the most remarkable small-capacity entry that didn’t make it was the Casio 2KB battery-backed RAM card.
best_quote_zh: 可能最引人注目的未入选的小容量参赛作品是Casio 2KB电池供电的RAM卡。

title: Perplexity Comet UXSS
summary_en: Hacktron researchers discovered a UXSS vulnerability in Perplexity Comet by exploiting a wildcard in the `externally_connectable` field of the Chrome extension's manifest. This allowed them to inject JavaScript on a subdomain and then use `chrome.runtime.sendMessage` to access sensitive APIs, ultimately gaining access to the full DOM tree via `DOMSnapshot.captureSnapshot`. They then used Hacktron AI to automate finding the vulnerability.
summary_zh: Hacktron的研究人员通过利用Perplexity Comet Chrome扩展manifest文件中`externally_connectable`字段的通配符，发现了一个UXSS漏洞。这使他们能够在子域名上注入JavaScript，然后使用`chrome.runtime.sendMessage`访问敏感API，最终通过`DOMSnapshot.captureSnapshot`获取完整的DOM树。他们还使用Hacktron AI自动查找漏洞。
best_quote_en: The beauty of composability is that it lets you build complex systems with speed and agility, but that same composability spawns weird state machines, aka “vulnerabilities”, that slip past developers’ cognitive load and only show up when an attacker deliberately assembles them.
best_quote_zh: 可组合性的优点在于它可以让你快速而敏捷地构建复杂的系统，但同样的组合性也会产生奇怪的状态机，也就是“漏洞”，这些漏洞会从开发人员的认知负荷中溜走，只有当攻击者故意将它们组合起来时才会显现。

title: Show HN: Scrape Baidu
summary_en: This is a cost-effective Baidu search scraper built for developers who need reliability. It features intelligent pagination, device targeting, localization, and time filtering and offers per-page billing without monthly rentals. It extracts structured data like organic results, answer boxes, related videos, and more.
summary_zh: 这是一个高性价比的百度搜索爬虫，专为需要可靠性的开发者设计。它具有智能分页、设备定位、本地化和时间过滤功能，并提供按页计费，没有月租。 它可以提取结构化数据，如自然搜索结果、答案框、相关视频等。
best_quote_en: Built for developers who demand reliability without hidden fees.
best_quote_zh: 专为需要可靠性且没有隐藏费用的开发者而构建。

title: A Memo from the Future
summary_en: The text envisions a future in 2069 where AI is integrated into daily life, enhancing human capabilities and transforming industries. Technologies such as neural laces, smart clothing, self-driving vehicles, and advanced healthcare solutions are commonplace, creating a world where everything is interconnected and intelligent. This future is characterized by increased efficiency, automation, and a deeper fusion of technology and humanity.
summary_zh: 文章设想了2069年的未来，人工智能融入日常生活，增强人类能力并改变各行各业。神经蕾丝、智能服装、自动驾驶车辆和先进的医疗保健解决方案等技术十分普及，创造了一个万物互联、智能化的世界。这个未来的特点是效率提高、自动化程度提高，以及技术与人类更深层次的融合。
best_quote_en: Intelligence infuses everything, and once-dumb objects have woken up.
best_quote_zh: 智能融入万物，曾经愚笨的物体都已觉醒。

title: Why AI Safety Won't Make America Lose the Race with China
summary_en: The US currently leads in AI compute and model development. China aims to dominate AI applications by leveraging its strengths in manufacturing and infrastructure. US AI safety regulations focus on transparency, safety policies, and evaluating potential risks. These regulations are unlikely to significantly hinder US progress in the AI race against China, as they involve relatively low costs and focus on essential safety measures.
summary_zh: 美国目前在AI计算和模型开发方面领先。中国计划通过利用其在制造和基础设施方面的优势来主导AI应用。美国的AI安全法规侧重于透明度、安全政策和评估潜在风险。这些法规不太可能显著阻碍美国在与中国的AI竞赛中的进展，因为它们涉及相对较低的成本并侧重于必要的安全措施。
best_quote_en: If our smarter AI is still just sitting in a data center answering user queries - and their dumber AI is already integrated with tens of thousands of humanoid robots, automated drones, missile targeting systems, etc - then they still win.
best_quote_zh: 如果我们更智能的AI仍然只是坐在数据中心，回复用户查询，而他们较笨的AI已经与成千上万的人形机器人、自动化无人机、导弹瞄准系统等集成在一起，那么他们仍然会赢。

title: Image Diffusion Models Exhibit Emergent Temporal Propagation in Videos
summary_en: This paper explores emergent temporal propagation in image diffusion models for video object tracking. It shows self-attention maps can be reinterpreted as semantic label propagation kernels. The paper introduces DRIFT, a framework leveraging a pretrained image diffusion model with SAM-guided mask refinement, achieving state-of-the-art zero-shot performance on benchmarks.
summary_zh: 本文探讨了图像扩散模型中出现的用于视频对象跟踪的时间传播现象。研究表明，自注意力图可以被重新解释为语义标签传播核。论文介绍了一个名为DRIFT的框架，该框架利用预训练的图像扩散模型和SAM引导的掩码细化，在基准测试中实现了最先进的零样本性能。
best_quote_en: Image diffusion models, though originally developed for image generation, implicitly capture rich semantic structures that enable various recognition and localization tasks beyond synthesis.
best_quote_zh: 图像扩散模型虽然最初是为图像生成而开发的，但它隐含地捕获了丰富的语义结构，从而能够实现超越合成的各种识别和定位任务。

title: How to Run Profitable Pricing Experiments?
summary_en: Pricing experiments differ significantly from standard A/B testing, focusing on value perception and unit economics rather than friction reduction. Successful experiments require a shift from conversion rate optimization to revenue optimization, considering price elasticity and substitutability. The article outlines strategic frameworks for pricing experiments, including when to test higher or lower prices based on product niche and economic models.
summary_zh: 定价实验与标准的A/B测试有很大不同，它侧重于价值感知和单位经济效益，而不是减少摩擦。成功的实验需要从转化率优化转变为收入优化，并考虑价格弹性和可替代性。文章概述了定价实验的战略框架，包括何时基于产品定位和经济模型来测试更高的或更低的价格。
best_quote_en: Running pricing experiments is fundamentally different from standard A/B testing.
best_quote_zh: 运行定价实验从根本上不同于标准的A/B测试。

title: URL in C Puzzle
summary_en: A C puzzle shows that a URL can appear in C code without causing errors. This is because 'https:' is interpreted as a label, and '//' initiates a comment, valid since C99. The comment extends to the end of the line, effectively ignoring the rest of the URL.
summary_zh: 一个C语言谜题展示了URL可以在C代码中出现且不报错。这是因为'https:'被解释为一个标签，而'//'开始一个注释，这在C99标准中是有效的。注释会延续到行尾，从而忽略URL的剩余部分。
best_quote_en: Except within a character constant, a string literal, or a comment, the characters // introduce a comment that includes all multibyte characters up to, but not including, the next new-line character.
best_quote_zh: 除非在字符常量、字符串文字或注释中，否则字符//引入一个注释，该注释包含所有多字节字符，直到但不包括下一个换行符。

title: Finding the grain of sand in a heap of Salt
summary_en: The article discusses how Cloudflare uses Salt for configuration management and addresses challenges in identifying the root cause of Salt failures. It explains Salt's architecture, failure modes, and the solutions implemented to reduce release delays by correlating failures with various triggers. The improvements led to a reduction in software release delays and less manual troubleshooting by SRE.
summary_zh: 本文讨论了Cloudflare如何使用Salt进行配置管理，并解决了识别Salt故障根本原因的挑战。文章介绍了Salt的架构、故障模式，以及通过将故障与各种触发因素相关联来减少发布延迟的解决方案。这些改进减少了软件发布延迟，并减少了SRE的手动故障排除工作。
best_quote_en: This release design was intentional â we decided to âfail safeâ instead of failing hard.
best_quote_zh: 这种发布设计是故意的——我们决定“安全失败”而不是“硬失败”。

title: Is psql's scripting language Turing complete? Or: Fibonacci in psql
summary_en: The article explores the Turing completeness of psql's scripting language by implementing a Fibonacci sequence calculator. It demonstrates the use of variables, conditional execution, loops, and recursion in psql. The author shows how to write a recursive Fibonacci calculator in psql, overcoming integer overflow issues with BIGINT.
summary_zh: 本文通过实现斐波那契数列计算器，探讨了psql脚本语言的图灵完备性。文章演示了psql中变量、条件执行、循环和递归的使用。作者展示了如何在psql中编写递归斐波那契计算器，并通过BIGINT解决了整数溢出问题。
best_quote_en: This post is for fun. Don't do this. But it happens to also be a nice introduction to some intermediate usage of psql itself.
best_quote_zh: 这篇文章只是为了好玩。不要真的这么做。但它也恰好很好地介绍了psql的一些中级用法。

title: Artificial Intelligence: A Modern Approach
summary_en: This is the table of contents for "Artificial Intelligence: A Modern Approach", a widely adopted AI textbook. It covers a broad range of AI topics, including problem-solving, knowledge representation, uncertain knowledge and reasoning, machine learning, and applications in natural language processing, computer vision, and robotics. It also discusses the ethics and future of AI.
summary_zh: 这是《人工智能：一种现代方法》的目录，这是一本被广泛采用的人工智能教科书。它涵盖了广泛的人工智能主题，包括问题解决、知识表示、不确定知识和推理、机器学习以及在自然语言处理、计算机视觉和机器人技术中的应用。它还讨论了人工智能的伦理和未来。
best_quote_en: The authoritative, most-used AI textbook, adopted by over 1500 schools.
best_quote_zh: 权威且使用最广泛的人工智能教科书，已被超过1500所学校采用。

title: Show HN: Turn your site into a demo video with one URL
desc:
Tired of recording the same product demo 10 times and still not being happy with it?

That’s basically why I built AutoAds (autoads.pro).

The idea: you paste your site’s URL, and an AI pipeline does all the annoying stuff for you, fully automatic.

What it does

- You paste the URL of your site (SaaS, e-commerce, portfolio) - An AI pipeline visits the site and analyzes the content (sections, copy, visuals, CTAs, etc.) - It generates a screen-recording-style video of your site: - scrolling and navigating - focusing on the key sections - It then does an automatic edit: - short cuts - "promo-style" pacing - wraps everything inside a Mac mockup so it looks like a product video - In parallel, the AI generates: - a voiceover that explains your product - subtitles synced with the voice

End result: you get a ready-to-use promo video (MP4) without opening Loom, without a mic, without a camera.

What it works for today

- SaaS products - E-commerce sites - Portfolios / personal sites

There’s a free plan so you can try it with your own site (no credit card).

Feedback I’m looking for

- Would you actually use this instead of recording a manual demo? - What would you want more control over: script, voice tone, mockup style, video length? - What’s missing for you to feel confident using it on your landing page or in paid ads?

Link: autoads.pro

If you try it and get a cool (or terrible) video, I’d love to see it and hear what feels off or missing.

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46076481

Points: 2

# Comments: 0
summary_en: Autoads generates professional demo videos from a website URL using AI. It offers tailored templates for various industries like SaaS, eCommerce, and portfolios, aiming to provide fast, simple, and effective video creation for automating ads and showcasing products.
summary_zh: Autoads使用AI，通过网站URL生成专业的演示视频。 它为SaaS、电子商务和作品集等各种行业提供量身定制的模板，旨在提供快速、简单、有效的视频创建方式，以实现广告自动化和产品展示。
best_quote_en: Paste your Website link and our AI generates a professional video. Fast, simple and effective.
best_quote_zh: 粘贴您的网站链接，我们的AI将生成专业的视频。 快速、简单、有效。

title: A foundation for building tools on the AT Protocol using Unison
summary_en: This article discusses building tools on the AT Protocol using the Unison programming language. It highlights the use of Unison's cloud libraries like Volturno and Arcella for handling data streams and append-only data structures. The author demonstrates this by creating a tool that synchronizes Bluesky replies to Leaflet documents as comments, using Volturno pipelines and the ATProto ability for API calls.
summary_zh: 本文讨论了如何使用Unison编程语言在AT协议上构建工具。重点介绍了Unison的云库（如Volturno和Arcella）在处理数据流和仅追加数据结构方面的应用。作者通过创建一个将Bluesky回复同步到Leaflet文档作为评论的工具来演示这一点，该工具使用Volturno管道和ATProto能力进行API调用。
best_quote_en: The nice thing about AT Protocol is that even though the development libraries and framework ecosystem is clustered mostly around TypeScript or Rust, I don't have to.
best_quote_zh: AT协议的优点在于，即使开发库和框架生态系统主要集中在TypeScript或Rust周围，我也不必如此。
