title: With Love to KDE: Take a Moment
summary_en: The author expresses concern over KDE's potential acceptance of LLM contributions, suggesting an "AI" policy similar to Servo's. They argue that LLMs lack provenance, lower code quality, exploit maintainers, and contribute to environmental issues and fascist ideologies. The author urges KDE to consider the negative impacts of LLMs and learn from other projects' policies.
summary_zh: 作者表达了对KDE可能接受LLM贡献的担忧，建议采用类似于Servo的“AI”政策。他们认为LLM缺乏溯源性，会降低代码质量，剥削维护者，并加剧环境问题和助长法西斯主义。作者敦促KDE考虑LLM的负面影响，并借鉴其他项目的政策。
best_quote_en: LLMs bring downward pressure on code quality, lost productivity, and maintainer abuse.
best_quote_zh: LLM会对代码质量造成下行压力，降低生产力，并导致维护者被滥用。

title: Ballerina.io
summary_en: Ballerina.io is a cloud-native programming language designed for integration. It covers a wide range of topics including basic syntax like variables, types, operators, and control flow. It also details advanced concepts like concurrency, network interaction, error handling, and testing, providing a comprehensive overview of the Ballerina ecosystem.
summary_zh: Ballerina.io 是一种为集成设计的云原生编程语言。它涵盖了广泛的主题，包括变量、类型、运算符和控制流等基本语法。它还详细介绍了并发、网络交互、错误处理和测试等高级概念，全面概述了 Ballerina 生态系统。
best_quote_en: Ballerina.io is a cloud-native programming language designed for integration.
best_quote_zh: Ballerina.io 是一种为集成设计的云原生编程语言。

title: Bank Street Writer on the Apple II
summary_en: Bank Street Writer, a word processor developed for kids in the early days of classroom computers, emerged from a collaboration between Bank Street College, consultants, and software developers. Published by Scholastic and later Broderbund, it topped home software sales. Its user-friendly interface, featuring contextual prompts, contrasts with modern software. The article explores its historical context and lasting impact.
summary_zh: Bank Street Writer是一款早期为课堂电脑开发的儿童文字处理软件，它是由Bank Street学院、顾问和软件开发人员合作开发的。由Scholastic公司发行，后来Broderbund公司也参与发行，并成为家庭软件销售的佼佼者。其用户友好的界面，具有上下文提示功能，与现代软件形成对比。文章探讨了它的历史背景和持久影响。
best_quote_en: When in doubt, look for instructions in the prompt area.
best_quote_zh: 如有疑问，请查看提示区域中的说明。

title: GWR train fitted with F1 tech for two-month superfast WiFi trial
summary_en: A two-month trial on a GWR train uses F1 technology to provide superfast WiFi by switching between 5G and satellite signals. Speeds reached 120+ Mbps, exceeding many home connections. The trial aims to assess wider implementation across the rail network, potentially enhancing productivity and passenger experience. The UK-made tech is also being rolled out in Germany and the US.
summary_zh: 英国GWR列车进行为期两个月的试验，利用F1技术通过在5G和卫星信号之间切换来提供超高速WiFi。下载速度达到每秒120兆以上，超过许多家庭连接。该试验旨在评估在铁路网络上的更广泛应用，从而潜在地提高生产力和乘客体验。这项英国技术也将在德国和美国推广。
best_quote_en: Passenger experience is top of our agenda – and 21st-century experience ought to be seamless fast wifi … which will make the time spent travelling by train even more valuable.
best_quote_zh: 乘客体验是我们的首要议程——21世纪的体验应该是无缝的快速无线网络……这将使乘坐火车的时间更有价值。

title: Reddit Migrates Comment Back End from Python to Go Microservice to Halve Latency
summary_en: The article discusses the 30th anniversary of MySQL, highlighting its origins, adoption during the dotcom boom, and its continued relevance. It features insights from industry experts like Sam Lambert (PlanetScale) and Peter Zaitsev (Percona) on MySQL's early focus on simplicity, usability and replication, and its impact on web development.
summary_zh: 文章讨论了MySQL诞生30周年，强调了它的起源、在互联网泡沫时期的普及以及持续的相关性。文章还包含了来自行业专家（如PlanetScale的Sam Lambert和Percona的Peter Zaitsev）的见解，他们指出了MySQL早期对简单性、可用性和复制的关注，以及它对Web开发的影响。
best_quote_en: "Probably around 2004, I started playing with MySQL because it just became the default for when you're getting a website to do anything online: you're going to use MySQL, and the LAMP stack was just this kind of in-the-box, incredible tooling."
best_quote_zh: “可能在2004年左右，我开始使用MySQL，因为它已经成为你在线建立网站时的默认选择：你将使用MySQL，LAMP堆栈就像是一个开箱即用的、令人难以置信的工具。”

title: MasonEffect update (1.0.30): faster particle morphing and improved stability
desc:
I’ve shipped a small performance update to MasonEffect, my lightweight particle-morphing text engine. The focus was reducing Canvas readback overhead and improving frame stability across devices. Internal loop cleanup and better caching helped make morphing animations more consistent, especially at higher particle counts.

A simple performance log option is also available for anyone who wants to validate frame timing or inspect update costs.

Demo: https://masoneffect.com

npm: https://www.npmjs.com/package/masoneffect

GitHub: https://github.com/fe-hyunsu/masoneffect (a would be greatly appreciated!)

Happy to hear feedback or further optimization ideas.

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46094724

Points: 1

# Comments: 0
summary_en: MasonEffect 1.0.30 released with performance improvements for particle morphing. Focus on reducing Canvas readback overhead and improving frame stability, especially at higher particle counts. Includes performance log option for validation; feedback and optimization ideas are welcome.
summary_zh: MasonEffect 1.0.30版本发布，提升了粒子变形的性能。重点是降低Canvas读取开销，并提高帧稳定性，尤其是在较高粒子数量的情况下。包含用于验证的性能日志选项；欢迎反馈和优化建议。
best_quote_en: Internal loop cleanup and better caching helped make morphing animations more consistent, especially at higher particle counts.
best_quote_zh: 内部循环清理和更好的缓存有助于使变形动画更加一致，尤其是在较高的粒子数量下。

title: Perplexity Comet vs Google Chrome – Should You Switch to an AI Browser?
summary_en: The article discusses the security vulnerabilities of AI browsers, comparing Perplexity Comet to Google Chrome. Security firms have identified potential attacks, including OAuth exploits and malware distribution. While AI browsers offer productivity benefits, users should be aware of the security risks. The article argues that it's not *if* we switch to AI browsers, but *when*, highlighting the need for stronger security measures.
summary_zh: 本文讨论了人工智能浏览器的安全漏洞，并将Perplexity Comet与谷歌Chrome进行了比较。安全公司已经发现潜在的攻击，包括OAuth漏洞利用和恶意软件分发。虽然人工智能浏览器提供了生产力优势，但用户应注意安全风险。文章认为，我们转型到人工智能浏览器不是“是否”的问题，而是“何时”的问题，并强调需要更强大的安全措施。
best_quote_en: "Despite claims of being more secure, autonomous agents with full user privileges can now operate without human oversight, lacking the security awareness and common sense of even a minimally trained user."
best_quote_zh: “尽管声称更加安全，但具有完整用户权限的自主代理现在可以在没有人工监督的情况下运行，缺乏即使是经过最少培训的用户的安全意识和常识。”

title: The Case for AI Transpilation
summary_en: The author proposes an intermediate representation for AI workflows, where a high-performing LLM generates instructions for cheaper, specialized models. This allows for model swapping, accessing previous outputs, control flow, and code execution. Persisting these workflows enables collaboration, reuse, and version control. Explicit control over the process can lead to optimized outcomes, and control flow/code execution enhance context engineering. This calls for a new standard workflow syntax and language server.
summary_zh: 作者提出了AI工作流的中间表示，即高性能LLM生成指令，供更便宜、专业的模型执行。这样可以进行模型交换、访问先前输出、控制流程和代码执行。持久化这些工作流可以实现协作、重用和版本控制。对过程的显式控制可以带来优化的结果，并且控制流程/代码执行可以增强上下文工程。这需要一种新的标准工作流语法和语言服务器。
best_quote_en: It's possible that LLM providers are already outsourcing parts of their workflows to specialized models, but having explicit control over this process can lead to more predictable and optimized outcomes.
best_quote_zh: LLM提供商可能已经在将工作流的部分外包给专业模型，但对该过程的显式控制可以带来更可预测和优化的结果。

title: Virtual Brendans
summary_en: The author discusses the emergence of AI agents and "Virtual Brendans" trained on his work for performance engineering tasks. He distinguishes between AI agents that assist with tasks like flame graph interpretation and virtual Brendans that aim to replicate his expertise. He expresses concerns about pricing models, potential for over-promising, and the importance of AI in improving performance engineering, especially with the increasing complexity and cost of AI datacenters.
summary_zh: 作者讨论了AI助手和基于他的工作训练的“虚拟Brendan”的出现，这些工具用于性能工程任务。他区分了辅助火焰图分析等任务的AI助手，和旨在复制他的专业知识的虚拟Brendan。他表达了对定价模型、过度承诺的可能性的担忧，以及AI在提高性能工程水平方面的重要性，尤其是在AI数据中心日益复杂和成本不断上升的情况下。
best_quote_en: Are people allowed to sell you, virtually? And am I the first individual engineer to be AI'd?
best_quote_zh: 人们可以虚拟地出售你吗？我是第一个被AI化的个人工程师吗？

title: Panomicron Holmium – 6x7 Rangefinder
summary_en: The author planned and built a 6x7 rangefinder camera, aiming for a mechanical Mamiya 7 alternative. Challenges included designing an accurate rangefinder, integrated viewfinder, and film advance mechanism. Issues arose with the 3D-printed helicoid, top plate interference, and film spool handling. The author successfully adapted a 50mm f/2.8 Bronica lens, achieving impressive results despite some softness and character.
summary_zh: 作者计划并制作了一台6x7旁轴相机，目标是成为机械版玛米亚7的替代品。挑战包括设计精确的测距仪、集成取景器和胶片推进装置。3D打印的螺旋齿轮、顶板干涉和胶片轴处理都出现了问题。作者成功地改装了一个50mm f/2.8 Bronica镜头，尽管有一些柔和和特性，但仍取得了令人印象深刻的效果。
best_quote_en: Even if the rangefinder would technically be accurate enough for a 80mm lens, I decided to start with something that would give me some more leeway.
best_quote_zh: 即使测距仪在技术上对于80mm镜头来说已经足够精确，我还是决定从一些能给我更多灵活性的东西开始。

title: Now streaming: Collabora's XDC 2025 presentations
summary_en: Collabora actively participated in XDC 2025, delivering talks, workshops, and contributing to the open graphics stack. Presentations covered topics like resource mapping, Rust GPU drivers, YUV formats in Mesa, PanVK advancements, Nouveau/NVK updates, and Mesa CI improvements. The event fostered community connections and collaboration within the freedesktop community.
summary_zh: Collabora积极参与了XDC 2025，发表了演讲，组织了研讨会，并为开放图形堆栈做出了贡献。演讲内容涵盖了资源映射、Rust GPU驱动程序、Mesa中的YUV格式、PanVK的改进、Nouveau/NVK的更新以及Mesa CI的改进。此次活动促进了freedesktop社区内的社区联系与合作。
best_quote_en: "One of the chief challenges in modern graphics drivers is accessing resources that live outside the shader."
best_quote_zh: “现代图形驱动程序面临的主要挑战之一是访问驻留在着色器之外的资源。”

title: Samsung reveals its tri-fold phone – and its desktop mode
summary_en: Samsung has unveiled its first tri-fold phone, the Galaxy Z TriFold, which features a 6.5-inch cover screen and a 10.0-inch main screen. It runs Samsung's DeX desktop environment, allowing users to access multiple workspaces and apps simultaneously. It will be first available in South Korea for around $2400, with plans for expansion to other markets.
summary_zh: 三星发布了其首款三折叠手机 Galaxy Z TriFold，配备 6.5 英寸外屏和 10.0 英寸主屏幕。它运行三星的 DeX 桌面环境，允许用户同时访问多个工作区和应用程序。该手机将首先在韩国上市，售价约为 2400 美元，并计划扩展到其他市场。
best_quote_en: Buyers get a one-time discount on screen repairs, which hardly screams ‘we nailed this three-screen thing’
best_quote_zh: 购买者获得一次性屏幕维修折扣，这很难让人相信 '我们已经搞定了这个三屏设备'。

title: Command Line Programs for the Blind
summary_en: The article discusses the challenges faced by blind users when interacting with standard computer interfaces and proposes text-based command line programs as a more accessible alternative. It highlights the efficiency of visual interfaces for sighted users but emphasizes the difficulties blind users experience due to the serial nature of screen readers.  The author advocates for separating data semantics from representation to allow personalized interfaces.
summary_zh: 本文讨论了盲人用户在使用标准计算机界面时面临的挑战，并提出了基于文本的命令行程序作为更易访问的替代方案。文章强调了视觉界面对于视力正常用户的效率，但强调了盲人用户由于屏幕阅读器的串行特性而遇到的困难。作者提倡将数据语义与表示分离，以实现个性化界面。
best_quote_en: Edbrowse gives the blind user exactly what he asks for, and nothing more.
best_quote_zh: Edbrowse 只给盲人用户他们所要求的，仅此而已。

title: Show HN: Dataframe-Expectations – Validation for Pandas and PySpark DataFrames
desc:
I built dataframe-expectations to solve a problem I kept running into: how to validate pandas and PySpark DataFrames without rewriting validation logic every time or wrestling with complex setup.

Key features: - Single API that works for both pandas and PySpark DataFrames - Minimal dependencies (won't bloat Docker images or slow builds) - Decorator-based validation for automatic function output checks - Tag-based filtering to run specific validations by environment or priority or any other criteria - Reusable expectation definitions across your codebase

The library is lightweight and integrates easily into existing CI/CD pipelines, helping you catch data quality issues before production.

Links: • PyPI: https://pypi.org/project/dataframe-expectations/

• GitHub: https://github.com/getyourguide/dataframe-expectations

• Docs: https://code.getyourguide.com/dataframe-expectations/

The project is still in its early stages and I'd love to hear your feedback and answer any questions!

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46118729

Points: 1

# Comments: 0
summary_en: DataFrameExpectations is a Python library for validating Pandas and PySpark DataFrames. It offers a standardized framework with reusable expectations for simplifying testing in data pipelines. It supports manual and decorator-based validation and provides detailed output reports, making it easier to identify and address data quality issues.
summary_zh: DataFrameExpectations是一个用于验证Pandas和PySpark DataFrames的Python库。它提供了一个标准化的框架，具有可重用的期望，从而简化了数据管道中的测试。它支持手动和基于装饰器的验证，并提供详细的输出报告，从而更容易识别和解决数据质量问题。
best_quote_en: Instead of using different validation approaches for DataFrames, this library provides a standardized solution for this use case.
best_quote_zh: 该库没有采用不同的DataFrame验证方法，而是为此用例提供了一个标准化的解决方案。

title: Why Conventional Price Theory Fails
summary_en: Conventional price theory fails because prices signal liquidity-to-capacity ratio, capacity allocation, and structural intermediation, not just quality or scarcity. Interest rates reflect capacity to support debt, asset prices reveal monetized capacity, and wages show capacity certification. This framework explains why policies like Japan's zero rates failed and US rate hikes worked.
summary_zh: 传统价格理论失效，因为价格反映的是流动性与产能之比、产能配置和结构性中介，而不仅仅是质量或稀缺性。利率反映了支持债务的产能，资产价格揭示了货币化的产能，工资显示了产能认证。这个框架解释了日本的零利率政策失败和美国加息政策成功的原因。
best_quote_en: Prices also reflect allocation choices at two levels: productive capacity allocation (how workers, companies, and infrastructure get deployed, representing supply decisions) and liquidity allocation (how debt-backed purchasing power gets directed, representing demand decisions).
best_quote_zh: 价格也反映了两个层面的配置选择：生产能力配置（工人、公司和基础设施如何部署，代表供应决策）和流动性配置（债务支持的购买力如何导向，代表需求决策）。

title: Zig quits GitHub, says Microsoft's AI obsession has ruined the service
summary_en: The Zig programming language project is moving to Codeberg due to concerns about GitHub's focus on AI and neglect of engineering excellence. Issues include unresolved bugs, inefficient CI systems, and a perceived decline in service quality. Other projects like Dillo browser are also leaving GitHub amid similar concerns.
summary_zh: Zig编程语言项目因担忧 GitHub 过度关注 AI 并忽视工程质量而迁移至 Codeberg。问题包括未解决的 bug、低效的 CI 系统以及服务质量下降。Dillo 浏览器等其他项目也因类似担忧离开 GitHub。
best_quote_en: "Whilst one could say that this is just one isolated incident, I can't see how such an extraordinary collection of outright face-palming events could be made in any reasonably functioning organization,"
best_quote_zh: “虽然有人会说这只是一个孤立事件，但我无法想象在一个运作合理的组织中，怎么会出现如此一系列令人瞠目结舌的事件。”

title: Indian government reveals GPS spoofing at eight major airports
summary_en: The Indian government has reported GPS spoofing and jamming incidents at eight major airports since 2023, including Delhi. These attacks can disrupt satellite navigation, forcing pilots to use alternative methods. The Airports Authority of India is investigating the source and implementing cybersecurity measures to address these aviation sector threats.
summary_zh: 印度政府报告称，自2023年以来，包括德里在内的八个主要机场发生了GPS欺骗和干扰事件。这些攻击会扰乱卫星导航，迫使飞行员使用其他方法。印度机场管理局正在调查来源，并实施网络安全措施以应对航空领域的这些威胁。
best_quote_en: Cyber security is ensured by continuous upgradation. As the nature and type of the threat changes, new protective measures are being taken.
best_quote_zh: 网络安全通过持续升级来保证。随着威胁的性质和类型发生变化，新的保护措施正在被采取。

title: San Francisco sues food giants over ultra-processed products
summary_en: San Francisco is suing food giants over ultra-processed foods (UPFs), arguing that these companies profit while communities bear the costs of treating diseases linked to UPFs. The lawsuit targets companies producing popular foods and drinks, accusing them of deceptive marketing practices and knowingly selling unhealthy products. UPFs are linked to various health issues, and the city seeks damages for the healthcare costs incurred by residents harmed by these foods.

title: General Parser Combinators in Racket (2012)
summary_en: This article explains how to implement a general parser combinator framework in Racket that handles left-recursive and ambiguous grammars. It introduces techniques like continuation-passing style, memoization, and trampolines to optimize parser performance. The code is freely available on GitHub, and the article aims to be an accessible introduction to the ideas in the mentioned papers.
summary_zh: 本文介绍了如何在Racket中实现通用的Parser Combinator框架，该框架可以处理左递归和有歧义的文法。文章引入了如Continuation-Passing Style、备忘录和Trampoline等技术来优化解析器的性能。代码在GitHub上免费提供，本文旨在对相关论文中的思想进行易于理解的介绍。
best_quote_en: Traditional top-down parsers cannot handle all recursive grammars, even if recursion may be the most natural way to express the language.
best_quote_zh: 传统的自顶向下解析器无法处理所有的递归文法，即使递归可能是表达语言最自然的方式。

Amazon's Prime cancellation process exemplifies this shift, with UX teams actively working against users' interests.

title: StillMe – an open-source "transparent RAG" framework
desc:
I'm building *StillMe*, an open-source "transparent RAG" framework that tries very hard to not pretend it knows everything.

Instead of just prompting an LLM and hoping for the best, StillMe:

- Runs all answers through a *multi-layer validator chain* (6 core validators + conditional validators, up to 13 total depending on context) - Auto-fixes missing citations and hallucinated "experience" - Logs *system-level steps* (RAG retrieval, validators, timing breakdown) - Treats "I don't know" as a first-class, honest state with explicit epistemic tracking

---

## What StillMe actually does

For each user query, StillMe:

1. Detects intent (philosophical vs. technical vs. factual) 2. Routes and filters RAG context accordingly 3. Builds a safe prompt (token-aware, language-aware) 4. Calls the underlying LLM (local or cloud) 5. Runs a *ValidatorChain*: - `CitationRequired` → adds `[foundational knowledge]` or real web/RAG citations - `EvidenceOverlap` → checks answer vs. retrieved context (only when context available) - `Ego-Neutrality` → removes anthropomorphic language ("I feel", "my experience", etc.) - `SourceConsensus` → detects contradictions between multiple sources (only when 2+ sources available) - `EthicsAdapter` → avoids unsafe suggestions while staying honest 6. Logs structured timing: - RAG retrieval latency - LLM inference latency - Validation & post-processing

---

## A real log excerpt (single philosophical question)

```log StillMe philosophical query trace (real backend log excerpt)

[INFO] Philosophical question detected — filtering out technical RAG docs [INFO] Retrieved 3 foundational knowledge documents (RAG cache HIT) [WARNING] Estimated tokens exceed safe limit — switching to minimal philosophical prompt [WARNING] Missing citation detected — auto-patched with [foundational knowledge] [WARNING] Ego-Neutrality Validator removed anthropomorphic term: ['trải nghiệm'] --- LATENCY --- RAG: 3.30s | LLM: 5.41s | Total: 12.04s ```

---

## Why I'm building this

Most LLM systems today:

- Hide their reasoning - Hand-wave citations - Overstate confidence - Treat "I don't know" as a failure

StillMe goes the other way:

- *Transparency-first*: every major decision is logged - *Epistemic honesty*: it's allowed (and encouraged) to say "I don't know" - *Model-agnostic*: works with local and cloud LLMs (DeepSeek, OpenAI, Ollama) - *No fine-tuning required*: all behavior is enforced at the framework layer

---

## Looking for feedback & contributors

I'm a solo builder from Vietnam. StillMe is already:

- Running as a backend + dashboard - Integrated with a real learning pipeline (RSS, arXiv, Wikipedia - updates every 4 hours) - Using a live RAG system with foundational docs

Repo: https://github.com/anhmtk/StillMe-Learning-AI-System-RAG-Foundation

I would love feedback on:

- The validator architecture - Better ways to structure logs & observability - Making the project more contributor-friendly - Any ideas to stress-test the "honesty / transparency" claims

Thanks for reading — happy to answer questions and share more logs, diagrams, or internals if anyone's curious.

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46215213

Points: 1

# Comments: 0
summary_en: StillMe is an open-source 'transparent RAG' framework emphasizing transparency and epistemic honesty. It uses a multi-layer validator chain to ensure answer quality, auto-fixes citations, logs system-level steps, and treats 'I don't know' as a valid response. The framework is model-agnostic and doesn't require fine-tuning, aiming to provide a more honest and transparent LLM experience.
summary_zh: StillMe是一个开源的“透明RAG”框架，强调透明度和认知诚实。 它使用多层验证器链来确保答案质量，自动修复引文，记录系统级步骤，并将“我不知道”视为有效响应。 该框架与模型无关，不需要进行微调，旨在提供更诚实和透明的LLM体验。

title: Taming the CI Monster: How I Slashed Our Monorepo Build Times by over 66%
summary_en: The author reduced CI pipeline execution time by over 66% by optimizing job granularity, implementing strategic caching, build parallelization, and smart dependency management. Key strategies included consolidating dependent tasks, splitting independent tasks for parallelization, and selective execution based on code changes. The author also highlights the importance of balancing job granularity to avoid excessive overhead.
summary_zh: 作者通过优化任务粒度、实施策略性缓存、构建并行化和智能依赖管理，将CI流水线的执行时间缩短了66%以上。关键策略包括合并依赖任务、拆分独立任务以实现并行化，以及基于代码更改的选择性执行。作者还强调了平衡任务粒度以避免过度开销的重要性。
best_quote_en: That’s like spending an hour preheating the oven to cook a 5-minute microwave dinner.
best_quote_zh: 这就好比花一个小时预热烤箱，只为了做一份5分钟的微波炉晚餐。

So I built ogBlocks — an Animated UI Library for React with ready-made, premium components like navbars, modals, text animations, carousels, and more.

I hope you'll like it

title: How do salespeople use AI?
summary_en: The provided content appears to be an error message from X Corp (formerly Twitter) indicating that JavaScript is disabled in the browser. It suggests enabling JavaScript or switching to a supported browser. It also mentions potential issues with privacy extensions.
summary_zh: 提供的内容似乎是来自 X Corp (前身为 Twitter) 的错误消息，表明浏览器中禁用了 JavaScript。 它建议启用 JavaScript 或切换到受支持的浏览器。 它还提到了隐私扩展程序可能导致的问题。
best_quote_en: Something went wrong, but don’t fret — let’s give it another shot.

title: German government US authorities have access to EU cloud data (heise.de)
summary_en: A legal opinion commissioned by the German government reveals that US authorities have extensive access to data stored in European data centers due to laws like the Stored Communications Act (SCA) and FISA. This jurisdiction extends even to European companies with US business connections, raising concerns about digital sovereignty and the need for European alternatives.
summary_zh: 德国政府委托的法律意见书显示，由于《存储通信法》(SCA)和《外国情报监视法》(FISA)等法律，美国当局可以广泛访问存储在欧洲数据中心的数据。 这种管辖权甚至延伸到与美国有业务联系的欧洲公司，从而引发了对数字主权的担忧以及对欧洲替代方案的需求。
best_quote_en: Decisive is not the physical storage location of the information, but the control over it by the affected company.
best_quote_zh: 决定性的不是信息的物理存储位置，而是受影响公司对其的控制。

title: Guarding My Git Forge Against AI Scrapers
summary_en: This article discusses the problem of AI scrapers targeting Git forges and the measures taken to protect against them. The author details the costs associated with scraping, including electricity consumption and server resource usage. They implemented reverse-proxy caching, rate-limiting, and bot classification to mitigate the impact of scrapers.
summary_zh: 本文讨论了AI爬虫针对Git代码仓库的问题，以及为防止它们而采取的措施。作者详细介绍了与爬取相关的成本，包括电力消耗和服务器资源使用情况。他们实施了反向代理缓存、速率限制和机器人分类，以减轻爬虫的影响。
best_quote_en: In the year 2025, on the web, everything is worth being scraped. Everything that came out of the mind of a human is susceptible to be snatched under the vastest labor theft scheme in the history of mankind.
best_quote_zh: 在2025年，在网络上，一切都值得被抓取。任何出自人类思想的东西都容易在人类历史上规模最大的劳动盗窃计划中被攫取。

title: Let's Embed a Go Program into the Linux Kernel
summary_en: This article explores embedding a Go program directly into the Linux kernel image, bypassing the need for a file system. It discusses scenarios where this is useful, such as when the root file system is unavailable or when you want to run secure programs. The article also presents methods for embedding and executing the program using the User Mode Driver API.
summary_zh: 本文探讨了将Go程序直接嵌入到Linux内核镜像中的方法，从而避免了对文件系统的依赖。文章讨论了这种方法的使用场景，例如当根文件系统不可用或想要运行安全程序时。文章还介绍了使用用户模式驱动程序 API 嵌入和执行程序的方法。
best_quote_en: Instead of launching a program from a file system, regardless of whether it’s virtual or not, it is also possible to embed a user-space program directly into the kernel image itself and start it from there.
best_quote_zh: 除了从文件系统启动程序（无论是虚拟的还是真实的）之外，还可以将用户空间程序直接嵌入到内核镜像中，并从那里启动它。

title: People power: How LLMs invert tech diffusion
summary_en: LLMs have surprisingly benefited individuals more than corporations or governments, reversing the typical tech diffusion pattern. The low barrier to entry and broad applicability empower individuals significantly. However, corporations face complexities like integrating with legacy systems and regulatory compliance, limiting the impact of LLMs. This unique situation may shift as superior LLMs become accessible only through significant investment.
summary_zh: 大型语言模型（LLM）出乎意料地使个人受益超过企业或政府，颠覆了典型的技术扩散模式。低门槛和广泛适用性极大地增强了个人的能力。然而，公司面临着诸如与遗留系统集成和法规遵从性等复杂性，限制了LLM的影响。随着只有通过大量投资才能获得卓越的LLM，这种独特的局面可能会发生改变。
best_quote_en: Surprise - the future is already here, and it is shockingly distributed.
best_quote_zh: 惊喜——未来已经到来，而且令人震惊地分散。

title: System76 Launches Pop _OS 24.04 LTS with Cosmic Desktop
summary_en: System76 has released Pop!_OS 24.04 LTS with the COSMIC desktop, based on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. It features a Rust-based COSMIC desktop environment, Linux Kernel 6.17.9, Mesa 25.1 graphics drivers, and NVIDIA 580 driver option. This enthusiast-oriented Linux distribution is available for download. The COSMIC desktop environment is now in good shape for end-users.
summary_zh: System76发布了基于Ubuntu 24.04 LTS的Pop!_OS 24.04 LTS，并搭载了COSMIC桌面环境。它具有基于Rust的COSMIC桌面环境、Linux Kernel 6.17.9、Mesa 25.1图形驱动程序和NVIDIA 580驱动程序选项。这个面向爱好者的Linux发行版可供下载。COSMIC桌面环境现在对最终用户来说状况良好。

best_quote_zh: 尽管花费的时间比预期的要长得多，而且距离Ubuntu 26.04 LTS的发布不到半年，但今天System76发布了稳定的Pop!_OS 24.04以及他们的COSMIC桌面环境，该环境现在对从Linux游戏玩家到爱好者的最终用户来说都处于良好状态。

title: Show HN: Toqen – privacy-first authentication flow with QR and TOTP
desc:
I have been working on a lightweight authentication flow designed for SaaS apps, courses, and small platforms that do not want to deal with complex identity systems or collect personal data.

Toqen provides QR-based login, temporary access passes, and TOTP verification without storing user information. The goal is to create a simple, privacy-first alternative to email login and passwords.

It uses Cloudflare Turnstile for anti-bot protection and runs on an edge-first stack. I would appreciate feedback from the community on the architecture, security considerations, and potential pitfalls.

Demo: https://www.toqen.app/demo

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46241816

It eliminates the need for accounts, passwords, and stored data, providing a secure and user-controlled access solution. Integration is quick, delivering a verified userId to the backend. It emphasizes user privacy, modern encryption, and edge technology for fast and reliable authentication.
summary_zh: Toqen 提供了一种以隐私为先的、无密码认证流程，该流程使用二维码和 TOTP。 它无需帐户、密码和存储数据，从而提供安全且用户可控的访问解决方案。集成速度很快，可向后端提供经过验证的用户 ID。它强调用户隐私、现代加密技术和边缘技术，以实现快速可靠的身份验证。

title: Agentic AI in Retail: How Autonomous Shopping Is Redefining the Customer Journey
summary_en: Agentic AI is reshaping retail, impacting advertising, personalization, and fulfillment. Three types of AI agents are emerging: third-party, on-site retailer, and off-site retailer agents. title: From Hand-Signed Forms to LLM's: The Evolution of Order Submission
summary_en: This article discusses the evolution of order submission in trading, from hand-signed forms to the emergence of prompt trading powered by large language models (LLMs). LLMs can understand abstract instructions and automate order generation. Experts predict that LLMs will handle over 50% of retail trading orders by 2030 due to decreasing LLM inference costs and increasing viability of prompt trading platforms.
summary_zh: 本文讨论了交易中订单提交的演变，从手写签名表格到由大型语言模型（LLM）驱动的提示交易的出现。LLM 可以理解抽象指令并自动生成订单。专家预测，由于 LLM 推理成本的降低和提示交易平台可行性的提高，到 2030 年 LLM 将处理超过 50% 的零售交易订单。

best_quote_zh: LLM辅助的订单提交可以被认为是手动订单提交的超集。

title: Redk: Redis Re-Implemented with SQL
summary_en: Redka reimplements Redis with SQL, offering Redis API compatibility, ACID transactions, and SQL views. It supports SQLite or PostgreSQL as a backend and can run in-process or as a standalone server. Use cases include embedded cache for Go apps, lightweight testing environments, and Postgres-first data structures. It is functionally ready for version 1.0.
summary_zh: Redka使用SQL重新实现了Redis的核心部分，提供Redis API兼容性、ACID事务和SQL视图。它支持SQLite或PostgreSQL作为后端，并且可以进程内运行或作为独立服务器运行。用例包括Go应用程序的嵌入式缓存、轻量级测试环境和Postgres优先的数据结构。Redka的功能已准备好用于1.0版本。
best_quote_en: It's such an amazing idea to go beyond the get-set paradigm and provide a convenient API for more complex data structures.
best_quote_zh: 超越简单的get-set模式，为更复杂的数据结构提供便捷的API，这是一个非常棒的想法。

title: Show HN: I scraped Zed's docs into a single PDF so I could read them on my iPad
summary_en: This Python script downloads the entire Zed editor documentation and merges it into a single PDF file with a working table of contents. It features downloading documentation pages as individual PDFs, merging them into a single PDF, preserving document structure, and custom CSS styling. Requirements include Python 3.10+ and uv or pip.
summary_zh: 这个Python脚本下载整个Zed编辑器的文档，并将其合并为一个包含工作目录的PDF文件。其特性包括将文档页面下载为单独的PDF，将它们合并为一个PDF，保持文档结构，以及自定义CSS样式。要求包括Python 3.10+ 和 uv 或 pip。
best_quote_en: Merges them into a single PDF file with clickable bookmarks.
best_quote_zh: 将它们合并为一个带有可点击书签的PDF文件。

title: Compiler Engineering in Practice
summary_en: This article introduces compiler engineering, defining a compiler as a translator between languages. It emphasizes the importance of reliability to avoid miscompiles, which can have severe consequences like data loss and security vulnerabilities. The article also touches upon the complexity of compilers.
summary_zh: 本文介绍了编译器工程，将编译器定义为语言之间的翻译器。它强调了可靠性的重要性，以避免可能导致严重后果（如数据丢失和安全漏洞）的错误编译。文章还谈到了编译器的复杂性。
best_quote_en: A miscompile is a fundamental failure of the compiler’s contract with its user.
best_quote_zh: 误编译是编译器与其用户之间合约的根本性失败。

title: Journaling and Prompting
desc:
I used Notion for several years for journaling, but I found the cognitive cost of switching into its DSL wasn’t worth it for me. Notion is built on blocks, things like databases built on top. Even when I exported my notes to Markdown, it still reflected Notion’s internal data structure instead of giving me something clean and portable.

For example, the inline database ends up as a table with href links to other parts of the document - nice, but not very useful when I want plain text I can actually work with.

Meanwhile, I have been doing a lot of prompting, and Markdown makes more sense for my workflow. It is not a journaling tool but it is simple and widely supported - GitHub, VSCode, etc and it eliminated a lot of the context switching that came with using dedicated note-taking apps.

What I would miss probably is the inline database, and other rich content which I have learned to stop using. But, I have optimized my journalling workflows to a lot of my prompting techniques. I use regular tables and split documents more deliberately. I reference them across journals when needed, kind of like having dedicated prompts for each part of a workflow.

I use the a lot of the prompting techniques in journalling as well - instead of creating inline database, I use the regular tables (more flattened and un-linked), and started splitting documents more, and referencing them in my journals.

I also sometimes put YAML frontmatter at the top for metadata and descriptions. That way, if I ever want to run an LLM over my journals - for summarizing the year or building a semantic search - I am already set up. (Might even turn that into a feature for https://gpt.qalam.dev)

I have realised the tool must matter less than how I structure my thoughts.

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46261443

Points: 1

# Comments: 0
summary_en: The author transitioned from Notion to Markdown for journaling due to Notion's complex DSL and data structure. Markdown is simpler, portable, and better integrates with prompting workflows and tools like GitHub and VSCode. The author opts for regular tables instead of inline databases and uses YAML frontmatter for future LLM integration, realizing that thought structure matters more than the tool itself.
summary_zh: 作者放弃了使用Notion进行日记，转而使用Markdown，因为Notion的DSL和数据结构过于复杂。Markdown更简单，更易于移植，并且更好地与提示工作流程和GitHub、VSCode等工具集成。作者选择使用常规表格而不是嵌入式数据库，并使用YAML frontmatter以便将来与LLM集成，意识到思想结构比工具本身更重要。
best_quote_en: I have realised the tool must matter less than how I structure my thoughts.
best_quote_zh: 我已经意识到工具的重要性不如我组织思想的方式。

title: Intel, AMD Accused of Allowing Chips in Russian Missiles
summary_en: Intel, AMD, and Texas Instruments are facing lawsuits for allegedly allowing their microchips to end up in Russian missiles used in Ukraine. The lawsuits claim the companies showed "willful ignorance" as third parties resold restricted chips to Russia, violating US sanctions.
summary_zh: 英特尔、AMD和德州仪器因涉嫌允许其微芯片最终出现在乌克兰战争中使用的俄罗斯导弹中而面临诉讼。诉讼声称，这些公司对第三方将受限芯片转售给俄罗斯表现出“故意无视”，从而违反了美国制裁。
best_quote_en: Those companies – along with a company owned by Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway Inc. – demonstrated “willful ignorance” as third parties resold restricted chips to Russia to power drones and missiles in violation of US sanctions.
best_quote_zh: 这些公司——以及沃伦·巴菲特的伯克希尔·哈撒韦公司拥有的一家公司——表现出“故意无视”，因为第三方将受限制的芯片转售给俄罗斯，为无人机和导弹提供动力，违反了美国制裁。

title: AI and Gnome Shell Extensions
summary_en: The author discusses the growth of the GNOME Shell extension community and the increasing use of AI in extension development. While AI can be helpful, some developers are using it to generate code without understanding it, leading to unnecessary code and bad practices. A new rule is being added to the EGO review guidelines to reject packages with AI-generated unnecessary code. AI can used for learning and fixing issues, not for generating entire extensions.
summary_zh: 作者讨论了GNOME Shell扩展社区的增长以及AI在扩展开发中日益增长的使用。虽然AI有所帮助，但一些开发人员在不理解代码的情况下使用它来生成代码，导致不必要的代码和不良实践。EGO审核指南中将添加一项新规则，以拒绝包含AI生成的，不必要的代码的软件包。AI可用于学习和修复问题，而不能用于生成整个扩展。
best_quote_en: AI is a fantastic tool for learning and helping find and fix issues. Use it for that, not for generating the entire extension.
best_quote_zh: 人工智能是学习、帮助查找和修复问题的绝佳工具。用它来做这些，而不是用来生成整个扩展。

title: Understanding Mathematics Through Lean
summary_en: The author discusses understanding mathematics through Lean, a theorem prover. Lean treats logical statements as types, allowing proofs to be verified by computers. The author argues that learning Lean led to a deeper understanding of mathematical proofs by focusing on building types that correspond to true propositions, ensuring correctness.
summary_zh: 作者讨论了通过Lean（一个定理证明器）来理解数学。Lean将逻辑语句视为类型，从而允许计算机验证证明。作者认为，学习Lean通过专注于构建与真命题相对应的类型，确保了正确性，从而对数学证明有了更深入的理解。
best_quote_en: If the first turning point of my mathematical education was to become fluent in proofs, the second one was actually understanding them through Lean.
best_quote_zh: 如果说我数学教育的第一个转折点是能够流利地进行证明，那么第二个转折点实际上是通过Lean来理解它们。

title: AudioMuse-AI: Local Sonic Analysis for Auto-Playlists on Jellyfin and Navidrome
summary_en: AudioMuse-AI is an open-source, Dockerized application that generates automatic playlists for self-hosted music libraries. It uses sonic analysis on audio files to curate playlists based on mood, tempo, and similarity, integrating with Jellyfin, Navidrome, and other music servers. It features clustering, instant playlists, a music map, and more innovative ways to explore music.
summary_zh: AudioMuse-AI是一个开源的、Docker化的应用程序，为自托管音乐库生成自动播放列表。它使用声音分析来生成基于情绪、节奏和相似性的播放列表，并与Jellyfin、Navidrome等音乐服务器集成。它具有聚类、即时播放列表、音乐地图等创新功能，用于探索音乐。
best_quote_en: AudioMuse-AI lets you explore your music library in innovative ways, just start with an initial analysis, and you’ll unlock features like...
best_quote_zh: AudioMuse-AI让你以创新的方式探索你的音乐库，只需从初始分析开始，你就能解锁诸如…之类的功能

title: Possible platform/arch names in Deno.build and node:process
summary_en: This article explores the possible values for platform and architecture names in Deno's `Deno.build` and `node:process`, focusing on Deno's Node.js API polyfills. It details how `Deno.build.os`, `Deno.build.arch`, `Deno.build.target`, `process.platform`, `process.arch`, and `os.machine()` are defined and used within Deno's runtime environment. The target string comes from SnapshotOptions.
summary_zh: 本文探讨了Deno的`Deno.build`和`node:process`中平台和架构名称的可能值，重点关注Deno的Node.js API polyfills。它详细介绍了`Deno.build.os`、`Deno.build.arch`、`Deno.build.target`、`process.platform`、`process.arch`和`os.machine()`如何在Deno的运行时环境中定义和使用。目标字符串来自SnapshotOptions。
best_quote_en: These are the possible values for Deno's Node.js node: polyfills, not for Node.js' own implementation.
best_quote_zh: 这些是Deno的Node.js node: polyfills的可能值，而不是Node.js本身的实现。

title: Trump files $5B defamation lawsuit against BBC over Panorama speech edit
summary_en: Donald Trump has filed a $5 billion defamation lawsuit against the BBC over an edit of his 6 January 2021 speech in a Panorama documentary. He accuses the BBC of defamation and violating trade practices. The BBC apologized but rejected compensation demands. The lawsuit claims the edit intentionally and maliciously doctored his speech. The BBC argues there was no malice and Trump was not harmed. The suit also suggests Florida residents may have accessed the program via VPNs.
summary_zh: 唐纳德·特朗普就BBC的一部纪录片中对其2021年1月6日演讲的剪辑提起了一项50亿美元的诽谤诉讼。他指控BBC诽谤并违反贸易惯例。BBC已道歉但拒绝赔偿要求。诉讼声称该剪辑故意恶意篡改了他的演讲。BBC辩称不存在恶意且特朗普未受损害。诉讼还暗示佛罗里达州居民可能通过VPN访问了该节目。
best_quote_en: "They cheated. They changed the words coming out of my mouth."
best_quote_zh: “他们作弊了。他们改变了我口中说出的话。”

title: New Jolla phone and Sailfish 5 offer a break from iOS-Android monotony
summary_en: The new Jolla phone and Sailfish OS 5 offer an alternative to the iOS-Android duopoly. The phone features a user-replaceable battery, privacy switch, and specs crowdsourced. Sailfish OS, with roots in Nokia's Maemo, provides a break from mainstream mobile OS design, emphasizing privacy and open-source principles.
summary_zh: 新款Jolla手机和Sailfish OS 5提供了iOS-Android双寡头垄断之外的选择。该手机具有用户可更换电池、隐私开关，以及通过众包确定的规格。Sailfish OS起源于诺基亚的Maemo，打破了主流移动操作系统的设计，强调隐私和开源原则。
best_quote_en: Sailfish is distinct from any other mobile OS today.
best_quote_zh: Sailfish与当今任何其他移动操作系统都截然不同。

title: Banana Prompts – Share and Discover AI Image Prompts
summary_en: Banana Prompts is a community-driven platform for AI image generation. Users can browse, share, and discover creative prompts. It offers a curated library of tested and refined prompts, allowing users to learn techniques and contribute their own creations. The platform is free to browse and share prompts.
summary_zh: Banana Prompts 是一个社区驱动的人工智能图像生成平台。用户可以浏览、分享和发现创意提示。它提供了一个经过测试和改进的提示库，允许用户学习技术并贡献自己的作品。该平台可以免费浏览和分享提示。
best_quote_en: Each banana prompt is tested and refined for best results.
best_quote_zh: 每个 Banana Prompts 都经过测试和改进，以获得最佳效果。

title: Git Branching Explained
summary_en: This article explains Git branching concepts, including base branches (long-lived branches like 'main'), topic branches (short-lived branches for features or bug fixes), and parent branches (the origin of a branch). Using branches allows developers to work on new features or fix bugs without disrupting the main codebase. It is essential for team collaboration and maintain a clean project history.
summary_zh: 本文解释了Git分支的概念，包括基础分支（如'main'的长期分支）、主题分支（用于特性或bug修复的短期分支）和父分支（分支的起源）。 使用分支允许开发人员在不中断主代码库的情况下处理新特性或修复bug。 这对于团队协作和维护清晰的项目历史至关重要。
best_quote_en: Within Git's powerful arsenal, branches are its absolute superpower. They let you, and your team, work on new ideas, fix bugs, and experiment without causing chaos in your main codebase.
best_quote_zh: 在Git强大的武器库中，分支是其绝对的超能力。 它们让您和您的团队可以处理新的想法、修复bug和进行实验，而不会在您的主代码库中造成混乱。

title: 20k Issues on GitHub
summary_en: The curl project migrated to GitHub and fully adopted its issue tracker in 2015. It reached its 20,000th issue/pull request on December 16, 2025. The pace of new pull requests has increased over recent years with a high rate of issue closure. The growth remains human-driven.
summary_zh: curl项目于2015年迁移至GitHub并全面采用其问题跟踪器。于2025年12月16日达到了第20,000个issue/pull request。 近年来，新的pull request的提交速度有所提高，问题关闭率也很高。 增长仍然由人工驱动。
best_quote_en: We work hard in the project to keep the number of open issues and pull requests low even when the frequency rises.
best_quote_zh: 我们在项目中努力保持未解决的 issue 和 pull request 的数量较低，即使频率上升也是如此。

title: Show HN: Shipped Wan 2.6 (Image-to-Video and Text-to-Video) on FreyaVideo
desc:
Hi HN, we just launched Wan 2.6 on FreyaVideo.

Wan 2.6 adds two workflows:

Image-to-Video (I2V): upload an image, describe the motion, generate an MP4. Text-to-Video (T2V): generate video directly from a prompt. What’s included:

Duration options: 5 / 10 / 15 seconds Multiple output sizes (e.g. 720p/1080p, portrait/landscape depending on mode) Optional prompt expansion + multi-shot segmentation Output as MP4 If you try it, I’d love feedback on:

Prompting: what kinds of prompts produce the most consistent motion for you? Quality vs speed tradeoffs: which presets/sizes feel best? UI/controls: anything confusing between T2V and I2V? Link: https://freyavideo.com/ (Wan 2.6 page: https://freyavideo.com/video-models/wan-2-6)

Happy to answer any questions about the implementation, pricing/credits, or the model settings.

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46299329

Points: 1

# Comments: 0
summary_en: FreyaVideo is an AI video generator that turns text, images, and clips into videos. It offers features like image-to-video, text-to-video, and text-to-image generation. It allows users to create high-quality videos quickly without editing skills and supports various aspect ratios for different platforms.
summary_zh: FreyaVideo 是一款AI视频生成器，可以将文本、图像和片段转换为视频。它提供图像转视频、文本转视频和文本转图像等功能。用户无需编辑技能即可快速创建高质量视频，并支持各种宽高比以适应不同平台。
best_quote_en: Just your idea, AI-powered cinematics, and export-ready videos without the wait.
best_quote_zh: 只需您的想法，AI驱动的电影效果，以及无需等待的导出就绪视频。

title: U.S. Military Willing to Attack "Designated Terrorist Organizations" in America
summary_en: The commander of U.S. Northern Command is willing to attack designated terrorist organizations within the U.S., raising concerns about the legality of military actions. This follows extrajudicial killings of alleged members of DTOs near Venezuela. The White House refuses to rule out summary executions of Americans on a secret enemies list. The military has carried out attacks, killing civilians claimed to be associated with DTOs. Concerns are raised about potential abuse of power.
summary_zh: 美国北方司令部指挥官表示愿意攻击美国境内指定的恐怖组织，引发了对军事行动合法性的担忧。此前，委内瑞拉附近发生了对所谓恐怖组织成员的法外处决。白宫拒不排除对秘密敌人名单上的美国人进行即决处决的可能性。军方已发动袭击，造成平民死亡，声称他们与恐怖组织有关。人们对权力滥用表示担忧。
best_quote_en: "The founders designed our government to be a system of checks and balances. Defendants, however, make clear that the only check they want is a blank one."
best_quote_zh: “建国者们将我们的政府设计成一个制衡系统。 然而，被告明确表示，他们想要的唯一支票是一张空白支票。”

title: Extending ts-Wolfram: dropping OOP, kernel/userspace interop, better printing
summary_en: The author describes recent updates to ts-wolfram, including dropping OOP in favor of algebraic data types for cleaner code, enabling kernel/userspace interop to allow mixed definitions in expression evaluation, and improving printing functionality with shorthand support. While progress was made, further work is needed for better pretty printing.
summary_zh: 作者介绍了ts-wolfram的最新更新，包括用代数数据类型代替OOP以简化代码，启用内核/用户空间互操作以允许在表达式评估中混合定义，以及改进了对简写的打印功能。尽管取得了进展，但仍需要进一步的工作以实现更好的美观打印。
best_quote_en: Once it works a little, it’s so much fun to keep adding functionality you end up working on it despite yourself.
best_quote_zh: 一旦它开始工作，不断添加功能就变得非常有趣，以至于你会不由自主地继续开发它。

title: P: Formal Modeling and Analysis of Distributed (Event-Driven) Systems
summary_en: P is a state machine based programming language for modeling distributed systems. It allows programmers to model their system as communicating state machines. P supports backend analysis engines to verify correctness. AWS uses P to ensure service correctness. P helps developers think rigorously, find bugs, and increase development speed.
summary_zh: P是一种基于状态机的编程语言，用于建模分布式系统。它允许程序员将系统建模为通信状态机。P支持后端分析引擎来验证正确性。AWS使用P来确保服务的正确性。P帮助开发者严谨地思考，发现bug，并提高开发速度。
best_quote_en: Programming concurrent, distributed systems is fun but challenging, however, a pinch of programming language design with a dash of automated reasoning can go a long way in addressing the challenge and amplify the fun!
best_quote_zh: 并发分布式系统编程既有趣又具有挑战性，然而，一小部分编程语言设计加上少量的自动化推理可以大大帮助解决这一挑战，并扩大乐趣！
